anya-e0806n0:287_0: Tatra yampetaṃ ghaṭate, yathā patīti saddatthāvattānato.
anya-e0806n0:288_2: kato kaṭo ccevamādīsu tyādippabhutīhi atihitakammādinissayesupi ekattādīsu dutiyādayo papponti niyamābhāvā,
anya-e0806n0:288_3: tathāhi pañcake nāmatthe kaṭādivacanīyassa sambandhī kammādyattho,
anya-e0806n0:288_4: tyādippabhutīti anabhi hitassa saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassābhidhānāya abhihitesupi kaṭādīsu
anya-e0806n0:288_12: tathāpyekattādayo nābhihitāti tassa saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassāti dhānāya abhihitesupi kammādīsu
anya-e0806n0:288_16: tatra tasmiṃ dutiyādi vibhattividhāne idaṃ codyaṃ siyā,
anya-e0806n0:288_21: dutiyādayo vibhattiyo yathā siyunti jotanāyābhidhānāya cāti yujjamānavasena attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n0:288_24: pañcake tike cā bhihitakammādinissaye sekattādīsu dutiyādippattimāsaṅkāvasena dassetvā catukkavādīnampi pakkhamubbhāviya pariharituṃ ‘yadiccā’dimāha,
anya-e0806n0:288_25: ayantesamadhippāyo “yadesā saṅkhyā pāṭipadikattho tappaṭipajjane kammādayo vibhattivacanīyā,
anya-e0806n0:288_28: yadā panāyaṃ pakkho ‘saṅkhyā vibhattivacanīyā’ti tadā “kamme dutiyā” tyevamādayo niddesā visayasandassanamattāyeva veditabbā”ti,
anya-e0806n0:288_32: na vijjate byatirittaṃ byatireko bhedo yassa taṃ abyatirittaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:288_34: saddatthato sakatthato abyatirittaṃ atthamattaṃ atthasāmaññaṃ yassa odanādisaddassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n0:289_1: tathāpi tehi abhihitepyevameva daṭṭhabbanti nidassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:289_5: satikoti ettha kītoti kammatthe “dissantaññepi paccayā”ti (4- 120) iko,
anya-e0806n0:289_7: evañca dhuhi kimekamudāharaṇaṃ dattamācariyene tyato āha-
anya-e0806n0:289_9: anabhihiteti vacanaṃ vināpīti vacanaṃ vinā evāti avadhāraṇe- apisaddo,
anya-e0806n0:289_13: evañca panettha dutiyādīnamabhihite pasaṅgābhāvo jānitabbo “paccate odano,
anya-e0806n0:289_14: kato kaṭoccādopi yadi dutiyādayo siyuṃ paṭhamāvidhānassāvakāso na bhaveyya tato sāmatthiyānabhihiteyeva
anya-e0806n0:289_17: na nuca paṭhamāyākārakamavakāso rukkho pilakkhoti rukkho pilakkhoti kriyāpadaṃ na sūyateti vibhatyantarassappatti
anya-e0806n0:289_18: maññatebhassāpadīpa kimidamuccate akārakanti yadya kārakaṃ nedampayogamarahati tato yattha visesakiriyāna
anya-e0806n0:289_19: massavanaṃ tattha padatthasahacaritāya sattāya patītiyā ‘rukkho atthi pilakkho atthī’ti apekkhīyatīti
anya-e0806n0:289_20: kārakattaṃ rukkhādīna mattheveti attheveti ññataṃ vatthuṃ paraṃ patipādayituṃ saddo payujjate ññaṇañca
anya-e0806n0:289_21: satoiti yatra kriyāpadantarassa appayogo tatra ussaggato sattā patītitutthīti kriyāpadānusaṅgara kattari
anya-e0806n0:289_24: na ca uccaṃ nīcaṃtyadhikaraṇavācitte vācikā nipātassa atthītyanena natthi sambandhoti uccamatthītyādheyyasseva
anya-e0806n0:289_26: tthi paṭhamāyāti “paṭhamāvidhā nassāvakāso na bhaveyyā”ti yathāvutto-
anya-e0806n0:289_27: yaṃ hetu asiddhoti ca sakkā vattuṃ,
anya-e0806n0:290_0: Yañcāti casaddo vattabbantarasamuccaye aparampi kiñci vattabbamatthīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:290_2: yadetthāna bhihitādhikāro natthi tadā yathā ‘kato kaṭo’ccatrattena kammassābhihitattā dutiyā na hoti
anya-e0806n0:290_3: tathā ‘kaṭaṃ karoti vipulaṃ dassanīya’nti kaṭasaddato uppannāya dutiyāya (vipulādigatassa) kammassā bhihitattā
anya-e0806n0:290_5: tato tyādi tabbādiṇādisamāsehi kammassāna bhihitattamattevāti vipulādīhipi dutiyāvidhānasaṅkhātaṃ anabhihite”ti (2- 3-
anya-e0806n0:290_6: 1) anabhihita vacanassa adhikāre yañca phalaṃ cintayatīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:290_8: paccekaṃ karotyabhisambandhatāyāti ‘kaṭaṃ karoti vipulaṃ karoti dassanīyaṃ karoti’ccevaṃ paccekaṃ paccekaṃ karotissābhisambandhatāyāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:290_11: “kaṭaṃ karomīti pavatto vipulaṃ karomī dassaniyaṃ karomīti ca pavattovāti vipulādīnampi paccekaṃ kammatā attheva,
anya-e0806n0:290_12: tatthekassābhidhāne parekassa sukhamavalokayantīti tadabhidhānāyapi dutiyā bhavissatī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:290_13: pakārantarāvatāro nācariye noparodhitoti tampi panettha dassayissāma-
anya-e0806n0:290_19: kaṭaṃ karoti vipulo dassanīyoti hi vuccamāne vipulādayo kattusamānādhikaraṇatāyeva patīyeyyuṃ tasmā kaṭasaddasāmānādhikaraṇyampaṭipādayatā
anya-e0806n0:290_24: bhidhāniye (kato) ti ktappaccayassa katattā udārādito karotyabhisambandhā dutiyā pappotīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:290_30: Hotu kāmaṃ udārāditopi vuttena vidhinā paṭhamā,
anya-e0806n0:290_33: antobhūto antogadho nāmassa saddassa attho yasmiṃ kammalakkhaṇattheso attho kammalakkhaṇo abhihito kathito sampanno sampajjatīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:290_34: nanu ‘kato kaṭo’ccādo sabhāvato sabbakammavuttiyā antobhūtanāmatthavuttiyā cātthamatte hoti sabbattha
anya-e0806n0:290_35: paṭhamāti ‘kaṭaṃ karoti uḷāraṃ sobhanaṃ dassanīya’nti kaṭāditopi uppannāya dutiyāya kammassābhihitattā
anya-e0806n0:290_36: uḷārādīhi paṭhamāppasaṅgo siyāti abhihitābhidhānappasaṅgopagataṃ codanaṃ manasi nidhāyāha-
anya-e0806n0:291_1: 49) kattuno kiriyāya sambandhi tumiṭṭhatamaṃ tasmiṃ icchitatame kammasaññaṃ vidhāya nibbatyādikesutīsu kammesu dutiyā vidhīyate pāṇinīyehi,
anya-e0806n0:291_3: odanaṃ pacati gāvumpayo dohatityādo(hi) odanādyatthā pacanādikiriyārabbhateti odanapayādīnamicchitatamattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:291_7: puna payādinipphattinimittaṃ yaṃkiñci dohanādikiriyā yuttaṃ karaṇādirūpena akathitaṃ gavādikamicchitaṃ kārakaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:294_7: guṇasaddenettha padhānasādhanaṃ dhammādikaṃ vattumicchitaṃ padhānasādhanañhi kiriyāyopakārakamupakāriyaṃ padhānabhūtaṃ kiriyamapekkhiya guṇo bhavati, co-
anya-e0806n0:294_10: upayujjamānañca taṃ payopabhuticeti visesanasamāsaṃ katvā upayujjamānapayoppabhutino nimittanti chaṭṭhīsamāso,
anya-e0806n0:297_1: tatoyeva‘gāmaṃ gacchanto rukkhamūlamupasappatī’tyatra nevicchitanānicchitassapi rukkhamūlassa kamma saññā
anya-e0806n0:297_7: rukkhamūlopasappanantu pasaṅgāgatanti rukkhamūlānampi kiriyābhisambandho attheva, atrāpi-
anya-e0806n0:300_12: 46) tena tena kammasaññaṃ vidhāya ‘paṭhaviṃ adhisessatī’ti ādo (tattha) tattha “kamme dutiyā”ti (2- 3-
anya-e0806n0:300_13: 2) dutiyā vidhīyate tehi tehi sattha kārehi,
anya-e0806n0:300_14: sabbatthevettha lokassa kammavacanicchāti kamenetaṃññasaññāpubbakaṃ kammamupadassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:300_16: yāya vatticchāya dutiyā siyā tāya vatticchāya kammatā kathaṃhināmāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:300_19: tatthevaṃ kiṃ bhavato manasi dosadhijambhanenāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:300_20: dhammeti etthāpi evaṃ saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n0:300_25: evaṃsaddasamānatthattā tathā saddassa tadatthānusāreneva viññāyatīti tathāsaddassa attho visuṃ na vutto,
anya-e0806n0:300_28: pānatthācāratthadhātusambandhī yo nadyādi ko ādhāro so pānācāravāyevāti āha-
anya-e0806n0:300_32: patiparīhi bhāgecetyavasiddhāti iminā patisaddassa dhātunā ayuttataṃ dasseti…
anya-e0806n0:302_0: Yadā kāladdhānamiccādinā‘māsamāsate kosaṃ sayati’ccādo akammakehipi yoge kālabhāvaddhadesānaṃ parehi kammattamanuññātanti ca,
anya-e0806n0:302_1: yadātviccādinā tu kiriyāva sabbenasabbaṃ na sūyati,
anya-e0806n0:302_2: tathā sati kuto ca kammattanti teheva vuttantī ca dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:302_4: māsamāsateccādīsu āsanādi āsanādīsu (potthake) kiriyānaṃ māsādiyogo viya kalyāṇittaguṇādiyogo ca lokassa patītipathamupayātīti,
anya-e0806n0:302_5: na sijjhatīti kiriyā na honti guṇadabbānīti kiriyāsambandhābhāvā kammattābhāvoti na sijjhati,
anya-e0806n0:302_7: Ajjhayanakiriyāya pabbatena ca māsakosānaṃ sākallena sambandhābhāvā accantasaṃyogābhāvoti māsassātiādīsu na dutiyā.
anya-e0806n0:302_8: Pubbaṇhe samayanti iminā pubbaṇhe samayoti sattamīāmādisamāsaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:302_9: accanta mevāti iminā samayassa sākallena viharaṇakiriyāya sambandhamāha,
anya-e0806n0:302_12: upasaṅkamanakiriyāyaccantameva yuttoti iminā nivāsanaviharaṇa kiriyāhipi pubbaṇhasamayādīnamaccantameva yuttataṃ upalakkheti,
anya-e0806n0:302_15: idha pana sattami yampattāyaṃ sattamyatthe bāhulakena “kamme dutiyā”cceva dutiyāppatti.
anya-e0806n0:303_7: Kārakamajjheti ettha chaṭṭhī samāso kārakasaddena ca sattikārakaṃ gahitanti (āha) ‘dvinnaṃ kattusattīnaṃ majjhe’ti,
anya-e0806n0:303_8: abhinnassāpi hi ekassa devadattādikattuno bhinnānaṃ taṃsamavetānaṃ kattusattīnaṃ majjhe kāladdhānāni,
anya-e0806n0:303_15: isumhi āso asseti vā nipphannena issāsasaddena gammamānaṃ kiriyaṃ dasseti ‘isvasane’ti,
anya-e0806n0:303_20: muttasaṃsayenedaṃ samānanti mutto saṃsayo yasmiṃ avadhyādo tenetaṃ tulyanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:303_23: dvīhe bhuñjissatīti dvīsu divasesu gatesu bhuñjissatīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:303_26: sakasakakārakavacanicchāyevāti hi idaṃ bāhullaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:303_27: dvīhā bhuñjissati kosā vijjhatīti dvīhā nikkhamma bhuñjissati,
anya-e0806n0:303_28: kosā nikkhamma ṭhitaṃ lakkhaṃ vijjhati upāttavisayo-
anya-e0806n0:303_30: kose vijjhatīti kose ṭhitaṃ lakkhaṃ vijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:305_0: Katacatthasamāsāti kato catthasamāso yesu te tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n0:305_2: cattasamāse gatyādīnaṃ visuṃvisuṃ padhānattā tehi paraṃ payujjamāno atthasaddo gatyādīhi paccekamabhisambajjhatīti maññate,
anya-e0806n0:305_3: atha sutte ‘payojje’iccetāvatyuccamāne payojjo sayaṃ kattāti kathaṃ viññāyati yena ‘payojje kattarī’ti vivaraṇaṃ katamiccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:305_6: takkiriyāsamatthovāti tassā gatyādikāya kiriyāya samattho eva niyujjateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:305_9: Dutiyāya siddhāyāti vakkhamānanayena payojjassa kattuno kammattasiddhiyā “kamme dutiyā”ti sutteneva kamme dutiyāya siddhāya.
anya-e0806n0:305_15: payojjo kattā na kammaṃ tyabbhupagamma payojje kattarī’ti vivaritanti attho,
anya-e0806n0:305_18: niyujjamāno payojakabyāpārasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya sambandhīyamānattā kammabhūtova bhavatīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:305_20: tathāpi so payojakena gamanādīsu byāpāriyamāno payojakassa byāpāralakkhaṇāya kiriyāya sambandhīyamāno
anya-e0806n0:305_21: yadi kammaṃ na hoti aññathā kiṃ hotīti aññathānupapattilakkhaṇena sāmatthiyena kammabhūtova hotī”ti (attho)
anya-e0806n0:305_28: nanu vacanappayojanaṃ dassayatā vacanamevopadassiya pañho kātabbo,
anya-e0806n0:305_30: heṭṭhā vuttakkamena niyamatthattā vacanassa evakāro labbhati,
anya-e0806n0:305_31: sambandhivacanattā etasaddassa tena yathāpaṭhitā gatyādayova visessabhūtā saṅkhepena parāmasīyantīti
anya-e0806n0:305_32: ete samevāti katanti maññate evosañcāti maññate (potthake),
anya-e0806n0:305_34: nahotīti) iminā imamatthañca joteti “yadipi kiriyābhisambandhā payojjassa viya kattunopi kammattampasajjati,
anya-e0806n0:305_35: tathāpi payojjeti vuttattā kattari devadatte dutiyā nappasajjatī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:305_37: 52) suttena payojjassa kattuno kammasaññaṃ vidhāya tasmiṃ payojjedutiyābhimatā,
anya-e0806n0:305_39: payojetīti asmiṃ uddese tadā kathaṃ bhavitabbanti sesoti yadācarahiccādivākyassāvasāne payojetīti asmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:305_40: uddese vacanasamīpe’tadā kathambhavitabba’nti pāṭhaseso hotīti attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n0:305_43: yasmā dutiyā pappoti tasmā ‘yaññadattene’ti bhavitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:307_1: sāpi tatiyāpi dutiyāpiti vattabba yadātviccādinā harati nāhāratthe naharatyatthe (potthake) tipi viññāpeti,
anya-e0806n0:310_0: “Vahissāniyantuke”ti gaṇasutte ayamettho “vahissadhātussa payojje kattari niyanturahite dutiyā na bhavatī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:310_1: niyantā sārathi kiriyāsiddhiṃ niyāmakoti vatvā tameva pakāsetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:310_4: niyametvāti ekasmiṃ karaṇīye kiriyā visaye patiṭṭhapetvā,
anya-e0806n0:310_5: vāhayati bhāraṃ devadattenetyatra hi devadatto paññavā puriso niyantāramantareneva bhāraṃ vahatītyaniyantuko kattā,
anya-e0806n0:310_6: vāhayati bhāraṃ balībadde iccatra tu balībaddā niyantā ramantarena na vahantīti saniyantukā.
anya-e0806n0:311_0: “Bhikkhissāhiṃsāya”nti gaṇasuttassāyamattho “bhakkhissāhiṃsatthassa payojje kattari dutiyā na bhavatī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:311_1: atha kathamettha hiṃsatthatā bhakkhissa hiṃsā hi cetanāvati sambhavati,
anya-e0806n0:311_10: padassetvā gantabbaṃ kinnāmāññadassanopagātādhirenāti tuṇhī hoti nikkāraṇissā nikkammissā (potthake) bhavato-
anya-e0806n0:311_12: paratthānubaddhakicchaṃ pana mahāpuññapaññā na kiñci viya maññanti,
anya-e0806n0:311_14: taṃtaṃ mataññuno vā kadāci karahaci yadidamavalokeyyuṃ te cetthāvatāraṃ cetthakāraṃ (potthake) labheyyuṃ
anya-e0806n0:311_15: etādiso ca paññavā paṭiladdhabuddhavacanappasādo’ti tadavatārena ca buddhe bhagavati kamena daḷhaṃ pasādaṃ
anya-e0806n0:311_17: evamevaṃ tattha tattha taṃtaṃbyākaraṇodāharaṇappasaṅgepi tadanusāreneva tantaṃpayojanaṃ veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:312_0: Duhādīnaṃ tyevamādo amhākamparamagurunā ratanamatipañcikālaṅkārādikārena nānākārasāratthavedaveditu vedāvedita
anya-e0806n0:312_12: tena kammadvayayuttānaṃ majjhe duhādīnamappadhānepi gavādo kamme tyādippabhutayoti yojanā.
anya-e0806n0:312_13: Iccāditiādisaddena ‘avarundhati vajaṃ gāvaṃ avarundhīyate vajaṃ go’iccādīnaṃ pariggaho,
anya-e0806n0:312_15: Gamīyate gāmo devadattanti ettha kathaṃ payojjattasambhavoti āha-
anya-e0806n0:312_17: yajjapi gāmo tuṇhī hoti nibyāpārattā purisova tu gamanakiriyaṃ nipphādeti,
anya-e0806n0:312_19: tamubhinnampi gāmapurisānaṃ samānanti purisa kiriyātulyaphalattā gāmopi gamanakiriyāya kattubyapadese kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n0:312_20: tathāhi gāmaṃ gacchanto koci gāme āsanne sati vadati ‘āgato gāmo patto gāmo’ti,
anya-e0806n0:313_0: “Duhi yāci rudhi pucchi, bhikkhi ci bruvi sāsi ca;
anya-e0806n0:314_0: Ji daṇḍi patthi manthī ca, dhātū honti duhādayo.
anya-e0806n0:320_0: Payogo pana sambandhacintāyamiha ca vuttānusārena sabbathā viññeyyā.
anya-e0806n0:322_0: Pubbe kiriyānissayena kārakanissayena (potthake) dutiyāya vihitattā āha ‘idāni’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:322_1: dhisaddassa atthappadhāna niddesena vā ādisaddena vā ‘hā devadatta’ntipi hoti,
anya-e0806n0:322_2: hā devadattadukkhanti tu dukkhena yogā devadattena na yutto hotīti paṭhamāvāmantaṇe.
anya-e0806n0:322_3: Nanuca antarāsaddena yoge yathārājagahanālandāhi dutiyā (tathā) antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nā landa(nti
anya-e0806n0:322_4: tathā) antarāmaggeti ettha maggatopi antarāmaggatopi kasmā na dutiyāti tenāyogā,
anya-e0806n0:322_5: yesañhi taṃmajjhaṃ te tena yujjantīti tehiyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n0:322_6: athavābbhupagatepi taṃyoge taṃsambandhīyeva maggoti mukhyattā tato sabbassa (potthake) na dutiyā,
anya-e0806n0:322_7: atrāpi chaṭṭhīyeva pappoti antarā tañca mañca kamaṇḍaluiti,
anya-e0806n0:322_9: atha kamaṇḍalusaddato dutiyā kasmā na bhavati satīpyantarena yoge tassa padhānattā,
anya-e0806n0:322_13: tatra kamaṇḍaluno sakatthe vattamānattā padhānattenāvatattā pāṭipadikato accutattā parattā paṭhameva bhavatīti jīnindabuddhinyāsa.
anya-e0806n0:322_14: Nindādi lakkhaṇassa sambandhassa sabbhāvā sabbattha sambandhachaṭṭhiyā sampattāyaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:324_0: Lakkhaṇādīsvatthesuti nāmassā kassā (potthake) yamatthaniddesoti āha ‘abhināyo yutto’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:325_0: Kriyāya jotako nāyaṃ, sambandhassa na vācako;
anya-e0806n0:327_0: Ayamettha attho “ayamabhi abhinandatityādīsu viya kiriyāya jotako na hoti,
anya-e0806n0:327_1: chaṭṭhī viya sambandhassa vācako na hoti,
anya-e0806n0:327_2: nikkosambītyatra gamanakiriyāpekkhī nisaddo viya nāpi kiriyantarā pekkhī,
anya-e0806n0:327_3: kiñcarahi sambandhassa tu bhedako visesako bhavatī”ti tamupadassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:327_6: rukkhampatvā vijjotate itievaṃ pattikiriyāya patvātivuttarukkhapāpanakiriyāya janitoti attho,
anya-e0806n0:327_7: tathāhi rukkhassa vijjuyā pāpanābhāve vijjuyā lakkhiyāya tallaṇassa ca rukkhassa yo lakkhiyalakkhaṇabhāvo sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:327_9: nanu sambandhe abhinā jotīyamāne rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā kathaṃ jotīyatīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:327_16: devadattassa sādhuttasaṅkhātaitthampakārappattiyā visayabhāvenāvaṭṭhitā mātā tattha vattati nāmāti āha-
anya-e0806n0:327_18: mātā ca itthambhūte pavattā visaya bhāvena devadatto ca tattha visayībhāvena,
anya-e0806n0:327_19: tesañca visayavisayībhāvalakkhaṇo sambandho itthampattilakkhaṇāya kiriyāya jāto,
anya-e0806n0:327_21: socātinā jotīyatīti mātu tenābhinā yogoti āha-
anya-e0806n0:327_25: evaṃ maññate “kiñcāpi so sambandho devadattenāpyavinābhāvīti tassa sobhinā jotīyate,
anya-e0806n0:327_26: tathāpi mātusambandhobhinā jotīyatīti ‘mātu tena yogo’ti ca (vuccati)…
anya-e0806n0:327_27: saddasattiyā taggatāyeva dutiyāya ubhayagatassāpi sambandhassa jotanato”ti rukkho rukkho tiṭṭhatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:327_28: ṭhitimpaṭiccāti ṭhitinnissāya esaṃ rukkhānaṃ yo ca sambandhoti yojanā,
anya-e0806n0:327_29: rukkhānanti iminā rukkhā kiriyāya pare sambandhinoti ñāpeti,
anya-e0806n0:327_30: ṭhitimpaṭiccāti iminā pana tiṭṭhatisaddavacanīyā sādhyarūpā ṭhitikiriyā rukkhato pare sambandhīti,
anya-e0806n0:327_36: dvibbacaneneva jotanīyāti vicchātthe vuttimatte satīpi vibhattiyā vicchatthe vutkimattetyādivacanaṃ vicāreretabbaṃvitattiyā
anya-e0806n0:327_38: lakkhaṇitthambhūti hi pakativisesanaṃ jotetumasamatthattā vicchāya jotanāya dvibbavacanaṃ kattabbamevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:331_2: hetuttā lakkhaṇattābhāve saccakiriyāya kathaṃ lakkhaṇe dutiyāti hetuttepi lakkhaṇattamassa sādhento sādhammapayogenānvayamāha-
anya-e0806n0:331_4: ettha hi lakkhaṇaṃ sacca kiriyāti paṭiññā,
anya-e0806n0:331_6: yaṃ sakimpi nimittatāya kappate tampi lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:331_7: yathā’api bhavaṃ kamaṇḍalupāṇiṃ sissamaddakkhī’ti sādhammapayogenānvayo daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n0:331_11: kadāci kenaci kamaṇḍalupāṇīsisso diṭṭho so tameva dassanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ katvā pucchati ‘api’tyādinā,
anya-e0806n0:331_12: atha yathā vuttena hetunopi lakkhaṇattamattu tathāpi paravippaṭisedhena hetumhi tatiyā kasmā na siyāti codayamāha ‘na nvevampi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:331_14: tathāhi chaṭṭhiyā pavādo hoti hetumhi tatiyāvidhi…
anya-e0806n0:333_0: Sahatthe-nuno vattane pabbatena yogo kathanti āha‘pabbatene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:335_4: kathaṃ tena yuttattaṃ ukkaṭṭhassāti hīnukkaṭṭhasambandhamukhena vibhāvento’tatthā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:335_10: hīnukkaṭṭhasambandho pana atisāyanādikāya kāyaci kiriyāya katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:337_3: athādhikīvinimutte adhikādhikisambandho kathamavasīyate nahyatrādhikī koci sūyaticcāha-
anya-e0806n0:337_7: Dviṭṭhattā sambandhassa adhikassāpyupasaddena yogā tatopi kasmā na sattamītyāha-
anya-e0806n0:337_9: yathā ekāyeva vibhattiyā ubhayagatassāpi sambandhassa jotitattā vijjusaṅkhātalakkhiyā sattamyabhāvo,
anya-e0806n0:339_8: panītottho sukhena paṭipattuṃ sakkāti pasiddhamanuvadiyamānamappasiddhañca vidhīyamānaṃ diṭṭhantamāha-
anya-e0806n0:339_18: Byatirekamāpādīyatīti kārakachakkato byatirittattā sambandho byatireko taṃ āpādīyati pāpīyatīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:339_20: adhibrahmadatte pañcālāti brahmadattassa pañcālā santakā sāmino (potthake) ti attho,
anya-e0806n0:341_4: pacatyodanaṃ devadattoccādo kamme patiṭṭhitaṃ kiriyaṃ karotīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:341_5: karotīti ca iminā anvattha byapadesova siddho-
anya-e0806n0:341_7: kenaci payujjamānopi sake kamme sayameva padhānattamanubhavatīti‘payutto vā padhānabhāvenā’ti vuttaṃ hoti cettha-
anya-e0806n0:342_0: Padhānatāya yo kattu, kammaṭṭhaṃ kurute kriyaṃ;
anya-e0806n0:343_0: Sā kattā nāmappayutto, payutto vātyayaṃ dvidhāti.
anya-e0806n0:344_3: yamabyavadhānena karaṇādhikaraṇe heva sādhyate kattārā tu dūraṭṭhena,
anya-e0806n0:344_4: tathāsati kathamanekasādhanasādhanīyaṃ kiriyaṃ kattāva karoti mukhyabhāvenāparetvamukhyabhāvenāti vuccate-
anya-e0806n0:345_2: pavivekeca kārakantharāmabhāvedissabhe kattarikriyā atthi bhavati vijjaticcādo titaṭīkā,
anya-e0806n0:347_0: Ayamettha attho “kattuno sakāsā aññesaṃ karaṇādīnaṃ ubbhūtyā sambhavenaca,
anya-e0806n0:347_1: tathāhi pasiddhakaraṇasabhāvopi pharasu kattāyattavuttitāyādhikaraṇambha vati‘pharasumhi ṭhapetvā chindatī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:347_3: kattuno kiriyāya ālocanena dassanena ca ‘devadatto atthi bhavati vijjatī’ti vuthabbhūtassānena ālocanena
anya-e0806n0:347_6: iminā kāraṇena dūrato upakārittepi kattuyeva sappadhānatā siyā”ti, punapi-
anya-e0806n0:350_1: kasmāti ce yato kāraṇā atthe attano abhidheyyesaddassa vutti paṭipatti anādinā micchābhyāsenabhavati tasmā thālyādīnantiādi pakataṃ,
anya-e0806n0:350_4: na hi saddo bāhye vatthumhi byāpāramāpajjati, tathāhi–
anya-e0806n0:351_0: Aññathe vāggi saṃsaggā, dāhaṃ daḍḍhoti maññati;
anya-e0806n0:353_0: Bāhyapadatthassa sabhāvo viya hutvā micchābhyāsena anādinā pana pavattena bāhye vatthūni avijjamānena karaṇabhūtena thālyādīnaṃ kattuttaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0806n0:358_1: saddāvāti sadde tedhammā hontu vā mā vā kattusambandhiyathāvuttadhammavacanicchāya saddatova kattā patīyate,
anya-e0806n0:358_5: atoyevāccantamasantopi aṅkuro jananakiriyāya kattā bhavati ‘aṅkuro jāyate’ti,
anya-e0806n0:362_3: iminā idaṃ dīpeti “karaṇabyapadesāya suttantarābhāvepi karotyaneneti karaṇantyanvatthato pasiddho-
anya-e0806n0:365_4: pasiddhādhikaraṇānampi tadanuttādivisesasambhave thālyā pacatī’ti karaṇattassapi dassanato vacanicchātoyeva karaṇaṃ kārakaṃ viññeyya”nti,
anya-e0806n0:365_10: Pakati yābhirūpoccādo kiriyāyāvijjamānattā sambandhamattaṃ viññāyatīti sambandhalakkhaṇā chaṭṭhī siyā,
anya-e0806n0:365_11: samena dhāvatītyādo tu kiriyāya vijjamānattepi kammattaṃ vattumicchitanti dutiyā siyā,
anya-e0806n0:365_14: pañcakenāti pañca parimāṇassa pañcako pañcakaṃ vaggaṃ katvā pasavo kiṇāti pañcapañca katvā kiṇātītyatthoti
anya-e0806n0:365_26: yaṃ yasmā aññagotto gotamo na hoti atoca gotamo bhavatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:365_27: nanuca dvidoṇa pañcakā kayampaṭicca kammabhūtā honti dvidoṇādinā keyattā tato kimuccate‘kayampaṭicca dvidoṇapañcakā karaṇāni bhavantī’tyā saṅkīyāha-
anya-e0806n0:365_31: tehi pana dvidoṇādyatthaṃ mūlaṃ tādatthiyā bhihitanti na vuttadosāvasaro”ti.
anya-e0806n0:367_0: Yathākkamamāgamanakiriyāya thūlattaguṇena gomantadabbena ca sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ ‘taṃ yathe’ccādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:367_1: udāharaṇamattaṃ dassentopi iminā adhippāyenāpi dassetīti vuttaṃ ‘sabbattheva vā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:367_2: puttena sahāgatotiādīsu āgamanādikiriyampaṭicca dve kattāro padhānāppadhānavasena,
anya-e0806n0:367_3: tesu padhāne kāriyasampaccayañāyena vā bahulaṃvacanena vā padhāne kattari paccayo,
anya-e0806n0:367_8: tulyopi kiriyāsambandhe pitāputtānaṃ pitātra padhānaṃ saddacoditattā, putto-
anya-e0806n0:367_13: tathā vidhā hi saddassa satti yato piturevātra kiriyā sambandhaṃ sakkoti paṭipādetuṃ,
anya-e0806n0:367_18: (Yadi) vuttanayena tatiyā siddhā ‘siddhe satyārambho niyamāya vā vikappāya vā’ na cettha niyamo,
anya-e0806n0:367_24: sāmatthiyāti bhedādhiṭṭhānattā sahatthayogassa puttassāpi kiriyābhisambandho viññāyati kathamaññathā sahatthayogo siyāti iminā attha balena.
anya-e0806n0:367_26: Pariyāyatthanti parito ayanti avagacchanti atthamaneneti pariyāyo attho payojanaṃ yassāti viggaho,
anya-e0806n0:367_28: atoyeva vināpi sahasaddappayogaṃ tappariyāyappayogaṃ vā sahatthena yoge vidhānato asatyapi sahādisaddappayoge
anya-e0806n0:367_29: yattha tadattho gamyate tatthāpi bhavatyeva tatiyā…
anya-e0806n0:369_2: atthe kāriyassāsambhavā taṃvācīhi vibhattīti maññamānena yaṃvivaraṇaṃ kataṃ ‘lakkhaṇe vattamānato’ti,
anya-e0806n0:369_7: Kañcippaṇaramāpannassa lakkhaṇe tatiyā yathā siyā ‘rukkhampati vijjotana’miccatra lakkhaṇamatte mā bhavīti pāṇinīyehi “itthambhūtalakkhaṇe”ti (2- 3-
anya-e0806n0:369_19: rukkhampati vijjotananti ettha kassaci itthambhūtassābhāvā itthambhūtaggahaṇe payojanaṃ na dissati tannivattanato,
anya-e0806n0:369_20: rukkhampati vijjotateti etthatu itthambhūtassa vijjusaṅkhātassa atthassa sabbhāvā tatiyāppattiyaṃ taṃnivattiyā
anya-e0806n0:369_21: yathāvuttaṃ ñāyamantarena nāññaṃ kiñci paṭisaraṇamatthīti saññāpayamāha-
anya-e0806n0:369_33: Atha kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi assāti ādo tatiyā kasmā na siyā tyāha-
anya-e0806n0:369_35: kamaṇḍalussa setassa ca upalakkhaṇa bhāvenānupādānatoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:369_39: Yenāṅgena vikatena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate tato tatiyā yathāsiyāti parehi “yenāṅgavikāro”ti (2- 3-
anya-e0806n0:369_42: tattha yasaddena vikatāvayavo hetuttena niddiṭṭho aṅgasaddo ca samudāyavacano upātto tenāha-
anya-e0806n0:369_44: nanuca kāṇādīnaṃ niyataguṇīnamabhidhāyittā akkhisaddassa payogo na yutto byāvattiyābhāvāti,
anya-e0806n0:369_53: akkhi(nāti) hi vutte sandeho siyā ‘kimassa vattumicchita’nti tato kāṇoti vuccate,
anya-e0806n0:369_56: akkhikāṇamassetyādo kasmā na siyāti āsaṅkiya‘kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi assā’tyatra yo vutto parihāro,
anya-e0806n0:371_1: Ekatra hi diṭṭhasāmatthiyottho taṃyoggatāya kāriya (ma)karontopi hetu vuccate sati saha kārinyasati ca vidhurappaccayo papā(ta) to,
anya-e0806n0:373_1: parāṅgabhūteti parassa bandhattā(dino) vidhānā yāṅgabhūte jaḷattādihetumhīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:373_18: vā pañcamiyā vidhānato tatiyārūpenapi bhavitabbanti codanamanasi nidhāya pañcamyu dāharaṇeyeva kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0806n0:377_0: Nāmabhūtehīti sabbādīsu keci kesañci yadi nāmāni siyuṃ tehi,
anya-e0806n0:379_1: pūjānuggahakāmatta mantarena sammāpadānaṃ na sambhavatīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:381_0: Payojanapariyāye atthasadde sati idanti payojanaṃ parāmaṭṭhuṃ sakkāti ‘tasseda’ntiādi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:381_3: attha kathanametanti iminā vacanicchāya metissaṃ natthi samāsoti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n0:381_4: viggahe vāsmimimasmāyeva nipātanā samāso daṭṭhabbo,so vikatisaṅkhāto attho,
anya-e0806n0:381_11: tesaṃ sambandho tadatthasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ tadatthabhāvo nāmāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:381_12: hetu hetumantabhāvalakkhaṇo sambandho nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:381_13: padhānāvacchedaguṇasmāti vidhīyamānattena padhānassa purisassa ācchedakā visesakā guṇā,
anya-e0806n0:381_16: yadā upādīyateti vatvā upādīyamānappakāraṃ diṭṭhantena phuṭayitumāha-
anya-e0806n0:381_18: yūpo nimittaṃ yassa dāruno taṃ tathā vuttaṃ nāññanimittanti yadā nimityavacchedakattenupādīyate tadā nimittasaddatova catutthī sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:381_20: nimittanimittīnaṃ sambandhassa abhimukhabhāvena tattheva nimitte pavattīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:382_0: Piṇiyamānā kiṃ saddādivacanīyā paro sāduādiko yo-
anya-e0806n0:382_1: ttho so añño kattā yassa so aññakattuko- bhilāso,
anya-e0806n0:382_7: iminā ca kiñcāpi rucirayaṃ yassuppajjateyo vā tassā janako,
anya-e0806n0:382_10: ajanakopi so tāya saṃsattoti tasseva piṇiyamānassa sampadānasaññā,
anya-e0806n0:382_13: iminā ca udāharaṇānamasamāna rūpattameva catutthīvidhāne kāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:382_14: aññathā chaṭṭhīyeva tehipi vidhīyeyya kāraṇāsambhavā kāraṇasabbhāvā hi dīpeti,
anya-e0806n0:382_23: natthi añño kattā yassā sā anaññakattukā ruci,
anya-e0806n0:382_24: bhāya ruciyā sambandhino piṇiyamānassa sampadānasaññaṃ ye pana icchantīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:382_28: uppattiyā ādhāro uppatyādhāro‘devadattāya rocate’ccādo devadattādiṃ upalakkhetīti uppatyādhāropalakkhaṇaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:382_29: ettha ruciyā uppatyādhāropalakkhaṇameva vacananti sāvadhāraṇa mattho daṭṭhabbo…
anya-e0806n0:382_31: tena piṇiya mānavacanamabhilāsassa aññakattukatāsandassanaparaṃ na hotīti byavacchinnambhavati,
anya-e0806n0:382_36: atippasaṅgocāti “kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”tiādo tavāti anabhimataṭṭhānappattica.
anya-e0806n0:383_7: Suttantarena (taṃ taṃ) niyamena niyamitānaṃ tesaṃtesaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ vidhāya catutthī vihitā parehi,
anya-e0806n0:383_19: yocānukūlattambha jatīti iminā idaṃ dasseti “patipubbako āpubbakoca suṇoti abbhupagame paṭijānaneca vattate,
anya-e0806n0:383_20: yadāyamabbhupagamo patthanā pubbato bhavati tadā patthanāya kattu patthayituno catutthī rūpambhavati,
anya-e0806n0:383_21: yadātvapatthatampi kevalamānukūlyena vattamānaṃdisvā deyyamabbhupagacchanti idamidaṃ vodassāmāti kopissasāmāti
anya-e0806n0:383_24: so hi “abbhupagamo nāma parena patthitassa bhavati tattha patthayituyeva catutthīrūpambhavatī”ti vadati,
anya-e0806n0:383_25: pubbassākiriyāya yo kattāti vedavākyena vihitathutikakaraṇa saṅkhātāya ussāhānujānanato pubbabhūtāya kiriyāya yo kattā hotā potā ca,
anya-e0806n0:383_28: rūpasāmyato pana tādatthiyatthasabbhāvāca yathāyogaṃ tādatthha catutthīpi na virujjhati,
anya-e0806n0:383_38: duhanādayo kopappabhavā nānantarena te sambhavantīti dūbhādayopyudāhaṭā “byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-
anya-e0806n0:383_51: thutikaraṇassa kattubhūtā hotāpotāro ussāhanānujānanānaṃ kammaṃ hotīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:383_58: Ettha pana tathā paṭisedhābhāvepi bahulādhikārato ‘na taṃ nāvammaññe nataṃ annammaññe’ccādi bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:383_61: etthaca yadā tiṇāditopi khikaṃsīyate tadā nindāvagamo,
anya-e0806n0:383_62: tattha ca niyogatova nañpayogo ñāthānupa pattiyāti sappaṭisedhamudāhaṭaṃ ‘na maññamāno’ti,
anya-e0806n0:383_64: nañpayogeva niyogato nindāvagamā tiṇanti kammeyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n0:383_65: athavā satīpi nindāvagame vacanicchāto savisayeyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n0:383_67: catutthiṃ icchantīti mattāyāti ettha catutthiṃ icchanti,
anya-e0806n0:383_70: caṇḍassa kukkurassātiādisutte “atha so”ti pāṭhassa vijjamānattā ‘bhiyyoso mattāyā’ti ettha sokāro punaruttoti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n0:385_0: Avadhīyate visilissate etasmātyavadhi, avapubbāya dhādhātuto avadhimhi“dādhātvī”ti (5-45) i.
anya-e0806n0:388_0: Etthāyamattho “yatokutocipi attho kiñci vatthuavadhīyate saṃyogassa vā kiriyānimittaṃ gamanadānādikiriyāpubbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:388_1: visilissate sayaṃ vā apeti aññena vā visuṃ karīyate,
anya-e0806n0:388_2: tamevaṃvidhaṃ calañcā calañca visilesaparicchedabhūtaṃ padatthamavadhiṃ vadanti budhā tabbiduno”ti,
anya-e0806n0:391_0: Tattha niddiṭṭhā vacanopanītā kiriyā visayo yattha so niddiṭṭha visayo vadhi, yathā-
anya-e0806n0:391_2: upāttājjhāhaṭā kiriyā visayo yattha so upāttavisayo, yathā-
anya-e0806n0:391_5: anumeyyā kiriyā visayo yattha so anumeyyavisayo,
anya-e0806n0:391_8: atoyevetthāyameva saññā paripphuṭā viññāyatīti na kācidiha saññā paribhāsīyate byāmohakāriṇī,
anya-e0806n0:391_12: Yathā gāmasmātiādinā idaṃ dīpeti “na kevalaṃ kāyasaṃsaggapubbakova visileso,
anya-e0806n0:391_15: tathāhi corehi bhāyatityādo yo (bhaya)pekkhaṇa sīlo bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:391_17: dhuvaṃ me maraṇanti vicārento te buddhiyā pappoti pappuyya ca tato nivattate,
anya-e0806n0:391_18: tathā corehi tāyatityādo yo ekassa mitto bhavati so yadyetaṃ corā passeyyuṃ dhuvamassa maraṇanti passanto
anya-e0806n0:391_19: te buddhiyā patvā tato nivattayatītyavadhittā avadhismāva sabbattha pañcamī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:391_20: parehi pana etādisesu sabbattha paṭipattuvisesānuggahāya sutteheva papañco kato,
anya-e0806n0:391_21: idha pana sāmaññavacaneneva siddhattā tadanuggahāya udāharaṇeheva papañcitaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_22: bhītibhāyanatthānanti bhīti tāyanānaṃ attho yesaṃ te bhītitāyanatthā tesanti attho,
anya-e0806n0:391_23: nanu bhītyatthānaṃ payoge bhayahetu sambhavati natu tāyanatthānanti,
anya-e0806n0:391_25: tāyanañhi rakkhanamuccate sāyanāhi rakkhanamuppajjabhe (potthake) tañca bhayahetuto vetyāha-
anya-e0806n0:391_68: maññamāno sissā ahaṃ kathannāma byavahito bhavāmīti antaradhāne byavadhāna nimittaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_75: “antaradhāneti kiṃ core na didikkhatī”ti paccudāhaṭaṃ parehi,
anya-e0806n0:391_79: tra hi yo core na didikkhati tehi attano adassanamicchatīti na antaradhānanimittaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_84: Icchatiggahaṇaṃ kimatthaṃ adassanicchāyaṃ sati satyapi dassane yathāsiyā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_102: pakatisaddena kāraṇamattaṃ gahitaṃparehi ‘puttā pamodā jāyate’ccādo puttāditopi yathā siyā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:391_113: navattu paṭibaddhāti lokavacanicchamullaṅgiya ahameva vadāmīti sakajjhāsayena vadanto vattā,
anya-e0806n0:391_134: tena pariyāyappayogepi bhavatī”ti aññehi byākhyātattā āha-
anya-e0806n0:391_136: ārāsaddassa dūratthattā āsavakkhayato ārā dūro bhavatī(tyattho u) pādīyatetyāha‘ārāsaddo dūrattho’ti,
anya-e0806n0:391_137: niddissamānapaṭiyogīti ‘devadatto sūro’ti niddissamānassa kassaci yo so dutiyo,
anya-e0806n0:391_139: Disādesakālavuttīnaṃ disāsaddattena pariggahato āha‘disā desakālavācīnaṃ yoge’ti,
anya-e0806n0:391_149: pāsāda māruyha pekkhati āsane upavisitvā pekkhatīti idaṃ visayo padassanaṃ pubbaṃ yassāti kiriyāvisesane samāso,
anya-e0806n0:391_153: apakkamati tato taṃ dassananti tato pāsādato tassa daṭṭhuno dassanaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ apakkamatyapayātītyattho,
anya-e0806n0:391_157: ccantasukhumabhāvena nikkhamma visālībhavantaṃ visayadesamupagamma sakalamattanā diṭṭhaṃ passati raṃsirūpena,
anya-e0806n0:391_169: indriyādhiṭṭhānampatte visaye viññāṇalakkhaṇaṃ kāriyaṃ karonti sīlenāti pattakārīni,
anya-e0806n0:391_182: manasikārādītiādisaddena cakkhuto cakkhunā (potthake) abhedo rūpāpāthagamo ca dassito,
anya-e0806n0:391_192: koso yañña dattoti pañho vidhirūpovāyaṃ, yo-
anya-e0806n0:391_203: taṃ yuttā pañcamiyutthā parassāddhassa paṭhamā ca sattamī ca vattabbā”ti,
anya-e0806n0:391_207: atra hi yadā rājagahassa yojanañcābhedo vattumicchīyate,
anya-e0806n0:391_211: Tathāhi pāṭaliputtasmā sattasu yojanesu sati rājagahaṃbhavatītyayamattho patīyate,
anya-e0806n0:391_213: Sambandhe chaṭṭhīti iminā “taṃ yuttā kāle sattamī vattabbā”ti (2- 3-
anya-e0806n0:391_224: yadātviccādinā paresaṃ viya karaṇe visuṃ vidhāne payojanaṃ natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:391_227: samānādhikaraṇattenāti ca ‘rañño puriso’tyādo asamānādhikaraṇassāpi visesanattadassanato vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_228: samānādhikaraṇattena visesanabhāvo cāssa thokaguṇānvite calane vattamāno thokasaddo asattavacanova visesananti,
anya-e0806n0:391_233: avadhisambandhalakkhaṇāti avadhisambandhāva lakkhaṇaṃ nimittamāsaṃ pañcamīchaṭṭhīnaṃ tā tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n0:391_235: evaṃ carahi taṃtaṃ kārakavacanicchāyamaññāpi vibhattiyo kasmā nappayujjeyyunti āha-
anya-e0806n0:391_237: ettha vibhattīnaṃ niyame lokiyā eva vacanicchā nibandhanaṃ kāraṇanti attho,
anya-e0806n0:391_241: 36) iccatra ca kārena dūranti katthehi sattamī ca vuttā pāṭi padikatthe sārasaṅgahakārādīhi,
anya-e0806n0:391_242: tadakkhippa aññāpadesena paṭikkhipituṃ kecityādi yaṃ vuttaṃ vuttiyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:391_250: na hi tasmiṃ ṭhīyate’ti visuṃ sambandho vaseyo.
anya-e0806n0:391_258: tathāhyatrāyaṃ mahābhāssa pāṭho “dūrantikatthehi pañcamīvidhāne taṃyuttā pañcamīpaṭisedho vattabbo dūrā gāmassa,
anya-e0806n0:393_0: Guruto kupitā dūrā,bhābyaṃ dūrā ca dassuhiti.
anya-e0806n0:394_3: dūrasmāvasathāti āvasathassa dūreti atthohi bhāssapadīpe keyyaṭo,
anya-e0806n0:394_4: paṭhamo puriso yassa so paṭhamapuriso bhavati “dūrantikā”di (2- 6-
anya-e0806n0:396_0: Nanu phuṭova tesaṃ sālādīnaṃ yogoti kimettha pañhena kassa panetehi yogo’tyāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:396_3: vajjane sambandhe vattamānehīti vajjanasaṅkhāte sambandhe vatta mānehi apaparīhi,
anya-e0806n0:396_5: kimettha vattabbanti iminā apaparīhi yuttasmāva pañcamībhavane pasiddhattamāha,
anya-e0806n0:396_8: yadatthoti yosālādi attho payojanaṃ yassa vajjanakiriyā rambhassa so yadattho.
anya-e0806n0:398_1: tassa kāriyatthanti tassa mukhyassa yaṃ kāriyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:398_4: vinimayeti parivattana nimittaṃ paṭidānecāti ca saddassāṭṭhānappayutti daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0806n0:400_0: Yadi vajjanakiriyāya sambajjhamānassa kammattā kamme dutiyā,
anya-e0806n0:400_3: paṭipadaṃ ujukamevoccāritaṃ vidhānaṃ yassā sā paṭipadavidhānā,
anya-e0806n0:400_5: yajjatra dutiyāvacanaṃ na siyā tadā ritesaddena yoge ujukaṃ vidhīyamānāya pañcamiyā dutiyā bādhīyethāti maññate.
anya-e0806n0:400_6: Yadyatra pañcamiyā dutiyāya bādhābhāvo eva payojanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:400_7: evañcarahi ‘rite vā’ti suttayitabbaṃ evaṃ sati pakkhe dutiyā ca bhavissati,
anya-e0806n0:400_13: āhacca kaṇṭhādiṭṭhāne vāyunāāhanitvā āharitvā vā vacanaṃ āhaccavacanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:402_0: Na dutiyāpi yogavibhāgatoti evaṃ maññate “tatiyā ceti vattamāne tattha yadi cakārena ‘dutiyā ce’ti sambandhīyeyya,
anya-e0806n0:402_1: tatrāpi ca kārena pañcamītyevaṃ na kassāpyapakaṃsoti‘vināññatraputhanānāhi tatiyā ce’tyekayogamakatvā
anya-e0806n0:402_2: yogavibhāgasāmatthiyā ‘tatiyā ce’ti ca kārena jātu pañcamī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:402_3: asahāyatthatte sati ‘vinātthe hī’tyevamavatvā kiṃ visuṃ suttaracanāyetyāha-
anya-e0806n0:404_0: Yantaṃ saddānaṃ niccattā sambandhassa yatthāti parāmaṭṭhaṃ soti,
anya-e0806n0:404_4: tenāyamādhārīyati kattukamma samavetā kiriyāsmintyadhikaraṇe vā taṃ ādhārayatīti kattari vā ghaṇantena daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n0:404_5: kattāraṃ kammañca kiriyānissayabhūtamādhāra yatītyādhāroti vā kattari ghaṇa,
anya-e0806n0:407_4: nahyaññatā taddhāraṇaṃ sambhavati tato kiriyā kāraṇenādhāraṇenādhārotya yamevattho,
anya-e0806n0:407_8: nanu yadyapyujukameva kiriyaṃ dhārayati kattā kattusamavāyiniṃ,
anya-e0806n0:410_2: kriyāsiddhupakāriti kattukammasamavetāya kiriyāya pasiddhiyaṃ upakārī upakubbantaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:410_4: kattukammānaṃ dhāraṇenāpyādhāroti sakkā vavatthapetunti codanammanasi nidhāyāha-
anya-e0806n0:410_13: tathāhi devadattasamavetaṃ nisīdanakiriyaṃ kaṭo devadattaṃ dhārayaṃ dhārayati devadattabyavahitaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:410_14: evaṃ thālīpi taṇḍulasamavetaṃ vikledanādikiriyaṃ taṇḍule dhārayaṃ dhārayatītyopasilesikādhārattaṃ kaṭādino. Yato-
anya-e0806n0:410_15: ññatrādheyyaṃ na vattate sabbathā bhiyyo vā,
anya-e0806n0:410_18: yathā cakkhādippavattīnamaññatrābhāvā cakkhādīnaṃ rūpādayo visayāti vuccante,
anya-e0806n0:410_24: dadhimhi sappi,tyatra tilādikaṃ telādikamādheyyaṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti tilādi byāpakādhāro.
anya-e0806n0:410_27: yassa samīpadese ādheyyaṃ vattate so evamuccate,
anya-e0806n0:410_29: Nanu cātrāpyādhāre sattamī vidhīyate ādhāro ca nissayo vuccate,
anya-e0806n0:410_31: na ca sissādīnaṃ guruppabhutīti devadattasakunyādīnamiva kaṭākāsādīhi saṃyogo,
anya-e0806n0:410_32: telādīnamiva ca tilādīhi samavāyo vā atthi,
anya-e0806n0:410_35: yadāyattā hi yassa ṭhiti so vināpi saṃyogasamavāyehi tassa nissayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:410_36: tathāhi purisassa na raññā saha saṃyogosamavāyo vātthi,
anya-e0806n0:410_37: atha pana tadadhīnaṭṭhitittā rājanissayo purisoti byapadissīyate,
anya-e0806n0:410_38: sissādīnañca guruppabhutina māyattā ṭhitīti tesamayaṃ tenassāyaṃ (potthake) yuttho te pati gurupabhutīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:410_42: nāññathā opasilesikena vā opasilesikeva visayābhibyāpakānamaggahaṇato upasilesasse vā upasilesasseva
anya-e0806n0:410_43: paribyattattā tatheva vohāroti na saṅkaro saṅkanīyoti.
anya-e0806n0:414_0: Yassa kiriyāti yassa gavādyatthassa sambandhinī dohanādikiriyā,
anya-e0806n0:416_3: atra ca jinindabuddhinā “sāmyādīnaṃ bhedeno pādānaṃ pariyāyantaranivatyatthamiha mā hotu gāmassa rājā”ti
anya-e0806n0:416_14: tatthedaṃ siyā “āsevāyanti vakkhāmī tyavassaṃ vacanamidamārabbhanīyamaññathā īsaṃyuttepi ‘āyutto go sakaṭassā’ti
anya-e0806n0:418_8: yathā rukkhassa sākhāti saccametaṃ papañcatthantu vacana”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:418_19: sutato sakāsā sīlaṃ atisayena seyyoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:418_22: tattha tāva niddhāraṇamevettha natthi kuto chaṭṭhīsattamīnaṃ tatthappavatti,
anya-e0806n0:418_35: tathā lopantanakkhattasaddā ca tena tena vacanantarena pāṇiniyehi vihitā,
anya-e0806n0:418_36: taṃ sabbaṃ taṃtaṃkārakavacanicchāyameva sādhetuṃ ‘mātari sādhu’ iccādayo udāhaṭā kesesu pasito pasatto,
anya-e0806n0:418_40: phusseninduyuttena lakkhito kālo soyamityabhedena sambandhā phusse,
anya-e0806n0:420_0: Paṭhamātthamatteti ettake vuttepi vākyattho padattho vā na viññāyate nāmaggahaṇānuvattitoti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:420_8: idaṃ vuttaṃ hotīti nāmassābhidheyyamatteti iminā idaṃ vakkhamānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0806n0:420_15: tabbantopi saddatthoevāti liṅgādivantopi sarūpā byatiritto saddattho eva,
anya-e0806n0:420_17: taṃyuttassāpi saddatthabhāvato ‘uccaṃ gharāni’tyādīnipi uccattaṃ guṇaṃ nimittaṃ katvā soyamityabhedasambandha gharesu vattantīti.
anya-e0806n0:427_0: Taṃ yathā bhava rājeti, nippannattho bhaveti ca.
anya-e0806n0:430_1: kiriyāya kārakehi ca nipphāditoti iminā sambandhassa kiriyākārakasambandha pubbakattamāha,
anya-e0806n0:430_2: tatoyevāyaṃ nākasmīkoti na yesaṃkesañci dvinnaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:430_4: kiriyākārakasambandhapubbako hi kārakehi añño sassāmibhāvādiko sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:433_0: Tattha assutāyaṃ kiriyāyaṃ ‘rañño puriso’ccādo kiriyā kārakasambandhapubbako-
anya-e0806n0:433_7: tattha sassāmibhāvavivacchāyaṃ vijjamānopi kiriyākāraka sambandho na vattumicchito,
anya-e0806n0:433_14: idāni sambandhassetassa kiriyākārakasambandhasañjātattaṃ yathāyogamaññatrāpyavagamayituṃ kiñci udāharaṇamāha-
anya-e0806n0:433_18: sā ayampari pālanalakkhaṇā kiriyā sambandhamassedambhāvahetuṃ janayitvā nivattati,
anya-e0806n0:433_19: atthappakaraṇādinā tvimāya kiriyāyāyaṃ sambandhoti viseso vasīyate,
anya-e0806n0:433_22: suyyamāne eva vā kiriyāsadde kārakabhāvassa hetuno vacanicchāyābhāve assedambhābhāvasaṅkhātasseva phalassa
anya-e0806n0:433_23: vattumicchitattā tatheva sambandho jāto chaṭṭhiyābhidhīyate ‘rajjassa saratī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:436_1: tato pālanādikā upakāra sabhāvā kiriyādvinnampi tesaṃ sambandhinī bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:436_3: tatoyevatassā ubhayasambandhiniyā kiriyāya sambhaveassedanti buddhiyā hetubhūtassa aññamaññāpekkhasabhāvassa
anya-e0806n0:436_7: sambandhi buddhisabbhavassāti sambandhīsu rājapurisādīsu assedanti evampavattāya buddhiyā sabbhavassa.
anya-e0806n0:436_8: Paresaṃ viya “guṇe chaṭṭhī”ti vacanantarābhāve ubhayatthapi (cettha) (yeva) (potthake) chaṭṭhippa-
anya-e0806n0:436_11: saccanti yathā vuttaṃ codanamabbhupagamma codakampati yathāvuttaṃ sambandharūpaṃ tato-
anya-e0806n0:436_14: atheva miccādināsatīpiaññamaññāpekkhālakkhaṇe sambandhe vacanicchāyevettha kāraṇanti codakādhippāyamatropanetvā
anya-e0806n0:436_17: evaṃ vattabbanti evaṃ yadipiccādinā vakkhamānanayena vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:436_18: paṭipādetabbatāyātyādinā idandīpeti “visessaṃ vidheyatāya na parādhīnanti appadhānabhāvato byatiriccate tato-
anya-e0806n0:436_24: ekassa sambandhittāsambhavā vatthuto dviṭṭho visesanagatattena patīyate tato chaṭṭhī visesanamevānudhāvati patītivisaye saddappavattī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:436_25: yo hi vikappanaṃ visayo so saddānanti,
anya-e0806n0:436_27: vatthuto dviṭṭhassāpi taggatattena patītiyā yathā bhātūnaṃ dhananti,
anya-e0806n0:436_29: tathā satyapi visessa bhede visesanagatameva bhedamanu(vidadhā)ti ‘devadattassa assā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:436_32: visessagatattenāpi tappatītiyaṃ niyamena taggatabhedānuvidhānaṃ siyā visesanagatabhedānuvidhānamiva,
anya-e0806n0:436_34: vattupaṭibaddhameva ca dviṭṭhattaṃ manasikatvā taṃvādīhi dviṭṭho sambandhobhidhīyate,
anya-e0806n0:436_43: yadā tu na visessapavatti tadā byatiriccateva ‘nīlassa guṇassa uppalannissayo’ti kārakabhāvalakkhaṇā padhānabhāvā byatiriccate eva nīlādi,
anya-e0806n0:436_46: sanaṃ kiñcideva kārakarūpato padhānabhāvā byatiriccateti visesana mattenāpi sesaṃ sabbaṃ tathā siyāti nāsaṅkanīyanti.
anya-e0806n0:437_2: Sahayuttampaṭicca evanti iminā purisassa appadhānattameva dīpeti,
anya-e0806n0:437_8: aññe tu saraṇassa kiriyārūpattā kiriyantaramantareneva dabbena sambandhopapattimāhuyathā dvinnaṃ jatukato saṃsileso,
anya-e0806n0:437_11: Paresaṃ tatiyatthe dutiyatthe ca kitakappayoge ññatrāpi (pañcamyatthe) sattamyatthe ca (“chaṭṭhī cā”) ti (2- 6-
anya-e0806n0:437_16: etthāpyādo udāharaṇadvaye suttantaramantarena sampadānattābhāvā sambandhavacanicchāyameva paresampi chaṭṭhī, tenāha-
anya-e0806n0:437_20: pañcamyatthe pana vatticchātova sabbe tasanti daṇḍassātyādīni udāharaṇāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0806n0:439_1: 72) suttena tulopamāhi aññehi tulyatthehi yoge tatiyāya vidhīyamānattā pāṇiniyānaṃ anabhimatā,
anya-e0806n0:439_2: yasmā sadisā bhāvā tesaṃ nopamāti ‘ajjunassa tulā natthī’tyādikamuccate,
anya-e0806n0:439_3: tasmā evaṃ yathāvuttanayenāti tadevantīmassa attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n0:441_10: na pubbalopopi āgamappayogānukūlyenātipi sakkā vattunti āha-
anya-e0806n0:441_12: niccamparalopoyevāti na ca sakkā mantunti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:441_23: jhismā yonaṃ ṭāṭetivāti “jhismā yonaṃ ṭāṭe”ti suttaṃ vā,
anya-e0806n0:443_2: tena hi bahuvacane bahuvacanena (potthake) paṭhamādutiyāsu ‘aṭṭhīnī’ti ekameva rūpamudāhaṭanti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:445_2: asati hi ñakāre‘ñānubandho’ti ñakārena visesanena sukāro na visesī yeyya satiyeva tasmiṃ tena so visesīyeyya,
anya-e0806n0:445_3: tasmā “ñakānubandhādyantā”ti sutte ‘ñakānubandhā’ti visesanaṃ visesanabhāvo attho payojanaṃ yassa so visesanattho,
anya-e0806n0:445_8: catutthīekavacane attattha’nti ettha saddhammasavanādikamattanimittanti yo- ttho,
anya-e0806n0:445_11: ññapadatthabhūtassāpi attā attho payojanambhavati nimittabhāvenāti nātthabhedoti ta eta imavajjitānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:445_12: sabbādīnanti ta etaimasaddehi eva vajjitānamaññesaṃ sabbādīnaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:445_13: paṭisiddhesupi kassaci ādeso dissatīti dassetumāha‘tasaddassa cā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:449_0: Ghapasaññehīti idaṃ tetimāmūhi tīmassa aññapadatthasamāsena vā visesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:451_0: “Āgamā tagguṇībhūtā taggahaṇena gayhantī”ti paribhāsā vacanametaṃ tattha tagguṇībhūtāti tasmiṃ āgamimhi guṇībhūtā,
anya-e0806n0:451_2: taggahaṇenāti āgamiggahaṇena taggahaṇena gahaṇatoti āgamibhūtassa naṃ iccassa gahaṇena gahaṇato,
anya-e0806n0:454_4: sutte pana satīti “suña sassā”ti sutte sati.
anya-e0806n0:456_0: Ratti ca ādi ca ratyādayo, tehi.
anya-e0806n0:460_0: Tenāti yato ltuiti visesanattena vattumicchitassa paccayassa gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:460_9: so kriyattho ādi yassa so tadādi,
anya-e0806n0:460_14: nanu ca ‘ltvī’ti visesanattena vattumicchite bhavatu “vidhibbisesanantassā”ti tadantassa gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:460_15: paccayaggahaṇena pana tadādino gahaṇaṃ kathaṃ siyā vacanābhāvātyāha-
anya-e0806n0:460_18: tena vinā na bhavati sīlenāti tadavinābhāvī,
anya-e0806n0:460_20: “Paccayaggahaṇe yato so vihito tadādino gahaṇa”nti ñāyassa yattha paccayaggahaṇaṃ tattha sādhāraṇattā ‘tadādino’ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:460_21: tadādisamudāyassa gahaṇe panettha viseso na dissati…
anya-e0806n0:460_25: vakkhatihi tattha “tuṃtāyetave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṃ tadatthāya”nti (5-
anya-e0806n0:462_1: pakkhe dīghavidhānenevāti iminā akārādese kate pakkhe dīghavidhāneneva,
anya-e0806n0:462_2: aññatthacaritatthatāyāti ltvantādito aññattha bhopurisā bhopurisaiccādo jātipadatthanissayanena katatthatāya,
anya-e0806n0:464_3: tathā bho brahmāti ettha tathāti iminā brahmātirūpassa niruttiyaṃ niddiṭṭhattāva ettha saṅgahitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:464_4: Evaṃ vivarantīti tasmā sa sakhato gassa akāraākārā”tiādinā evaṃ vivaranti,
anya-e0806n0:464_5: te hi aca āca ica īca ecāti dvande pubbasarānaṃ lopaṃ katvā ettupasilesaniddesaṃ vaṇṇenti,
anya-e0806n0:464_7: kimatthanti kiṃ attho payojanaṃ yassa taṃ kimatthaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:464_8: Sāmaññavidhānaṃ kimatthampanevaṃ payojanāsaṅkāyaṃ payojanāsaṅkāvicāraṇaṃ manasi nidhāya ‘āgati gaṇoya’nti vuttattā āha–
anya-e0806n0:464_12: idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ‘āgatigaṇoyanti iminā tadākārasaṅkhātajātippadhānagaṇattappakāsanena yadi sambodhane
anya-e0806n0:464_13: ekārantākārantalābhīnaṃ kattu isi sakha muni bhadantādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ payojanaṃ na siyā,
anya-e0806n0:464_14: aññathā anupapajjanaṃ siyāti evamaññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyato sāmaññavidhāne payojanamāhe”ti,
anya-e0806n0:464_15: soyanti iminā vuttiyaṃ ‘āgati gaṇoya’nti vuttaṃ vacanaṃ nidasseti.
anya-e0806n0:466_0: Ssañca ssāca ssāyoca añca tiñcāti itarītarayoge cattha samāso,ssaṃ ssā ssāyaṃ tiṃsu.
anya-e0806n0:468_2: sāmaññavidhānatoti kassaci liṅgassa aparāmāsā sāmaññena vidhānato,
anya-e0806n0:468_13: kavacanesvaghassa narassattappatīti tappaṭisedhābhāvā’daṇḍi kula’nti rassattaṃ ‘sismiṃ napuṃsake’ti vidhisuttaṃ vadeyyā”ti,
anya-e0806n0:468_17: ettha pana napuṃsake ekavacanantaṃ daṇḍi kulanti vakkhamānattā nodāhaṭaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:468_19: 88) adīghassāpi dīghavidhānasāmatthiyā paṭhamameva dīghassa rassābhāvekāva kathāti nodāhaṭaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:468_22: ettha vijjamāne ge pare okārantassa vā rassāpajjanadosampasaṅgato nossā’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:470_0: Gāvena gavenāti karaṇepi samānaṃ, gāvassa gavassāti chaṭṭhiyāpi.
anya-e0806n0:472_0: Senāti sutattā seiti vuttiyaṃ nimittaṃ parikappitaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:474_0: Saddantarattena koci dosoti sambandho, ādisitabbā ādesā kātabbā.
anya-e0806n0:476_0: Pena pasaññāya yuttā īpī, paca so īcāti vāpī abhedaggahaṇena, aññassāti ikāra ukāraūkārassa.
anya-e0806n0:478_0: Loke devadatto dattoti ekadesena samudāyavohāra dassanato sminotīmassa smiṃ vacanassātyayamattho dassitotyāha-
anya-e0806n0:480_0: Brahmādīsu ‘ito kvaci sassa ṭānubandho’ti pāṭhāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:482_0: So bhasmā anto yassa so tadanto samudāyo, tassa,
anya-e0806n0:490_0: Ṭamuttapakkhoti asantaṃ kubbantassāti ṭādesena muttapakkho,ntussacevanti pasiddhattāva ṭādesamuttapakkhaṃ upameti,
anya-e0806n0:492_1: tippasajjatīti kasmā vuttaṃ nanu tadantassa samudāyassa patte “chaṭṭhiyantassā”ti (1-
anya-e0806n0:492_5: tathāpi ‘jhissā’ti vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyatte issāti vuttatta vuttanthi sāmatthiyato tadantassa ṭādeso-
anya-e0806n0:492_9: bhimato siyā ‘tathā sati kiṃ jhaggahaṇena issatveva vadeyyāti nātippasajjatīti,
anya-e0806n0:492_10: jhaggahaṇe nāmante ikārasseva jhasaññattāti idaṃ pana visesanattena vattu manicchite yujjati.
anya-e0806n0:496_0: Hetukurusaddehi yosu iminā ṭādese “lopo”tīminā yolope vā sampatte “paccayanissitaṃ bahiraṅga”nti yolopato
anya-e0806n0:498_6: ko bhavantānaṃ dvinnaṃ bahunnaṃ vā eko deva datto kaṭhādīhi vā atthe dvīhi bahūhi vā ekassa niddhāraṇe
anya-e0806n0:498_7: sati kimhā niddhāraṇe ratara ratamesu ṇādivuttiyaṃ “ekatthatāya”nti (2-
anya-e0806n0:498_18: sābhidheyyā pekkhāti ettha so sako abhidheyyo attho disādi sābhidheyyoti gahitoti āha-
anya-e0806n0:498_26: ttho disādesādi pubbādisaddābhidheyyassātthassa disāya desādino vāvadhibhāvena niyamavasena pavattati,
anya-e0806n0:498_28: socāvadhibhāvo niyamavasena pavatto pubbādisaddavacanīyaṃ disādesādi mapekkhatīti sābhidheyyāpekkhovadhiniyamoyeva vavatthāti vuccatītyayamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n0:498_32: kosallena nimittenāti kusala saddassa pavattinimittena kosallena,
anya-e0806n0:498_36: kiñci pubbattādikamuddissa kesañci pubboparotyādikā atthānugatā saññā anvatthasaññā.
anya-e0806n0:500_2: yuttatā cāssa pāṭhe byabhicāra dassanatoti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n0:500_5: vikappānuvattiyā anapuṃsakamidameva vacanaṃ tassa kvaci byabhicāratte ñāpakanti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n0:500_8: aññathā yathāvaṭṭhitapāṭhānukkamenātthaggahaṇe sati suttassa suttassā (potthake) mukhyattappatītito kathantamaññassa ñāpakaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n0:502_0: Nanu ca “lakkhaṇapaṭipadavuttesu paṭipadavuttasseva gahaṇa”ntīmāya paribhāsāya lakkhaṇikassākārassa gahaṇaṃ na pappotītyāsaṅkiya paṭipādayamāha-
anya-e0806n0:502_10: kevalaṃ lakkhaṇadassanenāsmiṃ lakkhaṇe satyavassamanena rūpena bhavitabbanti lakkhaṇena paṭipāditaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:502_14: tasmiṃ lakkhaṇavutte paṭipadavutte ca rūpe sati paṭipadavuttasseva gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:502_17: so ca niyamo aniyamapubbake sandehe satyavatiṭṭhate,
anya-e0806n0:502_24: yatra dve rūpāni sambhavanti tatrevā yamparibhāsā sandehāpākaraṇamukhena pavattāti ñāyappattoyevā mattho imāya paribhāsāyānuvādyate,
anya-e0806n0:502_26: tathāpi lakkhaṇavuttaṃ rūpaṃ lakkhaṇe nonnīyamānaṃ dhūmaggi viya jalabalākā viya cānu mānikaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:502_29: paccakkhānumānesu ca paccakkhambalavantaraṃ pamāṇanti ato paṭipadavuttameva gayhatīti.
anya-e0806n0:506_12: aṅgato bahi bahiraṅgaṃ “payyapābahitiro purepacchā vā pañcamyā”ti (3-
anya-e0806n0:506_17: kintu bahiraṅganissitaṃ kāriyambahiraṅgaṃ yathā mañcanissitesu saddāyantesu ‘mañcā saddāyantī’tyuccate
anya-e0806n0:506_18: taṃ viyeti atoyevā saṅkhyasamāsepi liṅgavibhattivacanantarayogo ‘antaraṅgo antaraṅgā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:506_22: masaṅkhyasamāsepi kate paccakkha ñāṇassākkhanissitattañāpanatthaṃ saṅketavasena kato-
anya-e0806n0:506_33: Antaraṅga kāriyassa balavattaṃ sādhetuṃ ‘sabbapaṭhamaṃ vidheyyattā’tiādi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:506_34: idampana antaraṅgakāriyassa balavabhāvasādhane kāraṇaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0806n0:506_35: antaraṅgattā balavabhāvoyeva hi sabbapaṭhamaṃ vidheyyatta kāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:506_37: ‘yo lopato akārassa paṭhamameva bhavane kāraṇamāha antaraṅgattā akārassā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:506_39: antaraṅgabalavabhāvasādhanassa pana lokato icchitattā ayamevatthe pāṭho ghaṭate”antaraṅgameva kāriyambalavaṃ loke tathādiṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n0:506_41: loke tathādiṭṭhattāti antaraṅgabalavabhāvassa loke evaṃ vakkhamānanayena diṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n0:506_42: athavā kenaci vidhurappaccayopanipātena kāraṇave kallena vā kadāci kattumasakkuṇeyyattepi antaraṅgassa
anya-e0806n0:508_0: Ivaṇṇassāti vuttattāti ‘ye passivaṇṇassā”ti ettha ivaṇṇassāti vuttattā.
anya-e0806n0:510_3: ekānekesūti vuttattā saṅkhyāvisese vidhīyamānāsyādayo kathamasaṅkhyehi uppajjitumussahante iccāsayenāha-
anya-e0806n0:510_5: Atha nissaṅkhyehi hotusyādīnamasambhavo uccaṃ rukkhassiccādotu saṅkhyāsambhave bhavitabbameva syādīhiccāha-
anya-e0806n0:510_11: asati hi syādīnamuppattiyamuccamādīnamasaṅkhyānampadattaṃ natthīti yo ādīsu padasmā paresaṃ tumhāmhasaddānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:510_12: savibhattīnaṃ vonoādikaṃ padanimittaṃ kāriyaṃ na siyāti ‘uccaṃ vo,
anya-e0806n0:510_14: sati tu syāduppattiyaṃ luttesupi tesu padattanipphattiyāyeva taduppattito padatte siddhe padalakkhaṇaṃ kāriyaṃ sijjhatevāti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:510_15: Parehi ettha ‘tassaṃ sālāya’nti vacanicchāyaṃ ‘tatra sālāya’nti yathā siyāti “abyayatvā syādino”ti (pā, 2- 4-
anya-e0806n0:510_19: Atha kenātra āppaccayo vidhīyate yenāssāpi lopo-
anya-e0806n0:510_24: tasmā asaṅkhyehi āppaccayassa sambhavoyeva natthītyanatthakamāppaccayassa lopavacananti nānatthakaṃ itthiyanti (3-
anya-e0806n0:510_25: 26) hi guṇippadhāno niddeso itthattavati āppaccayādayo vidhīyante ‘tassaṃ sālāya (micce tasmiṃ padatthe) tatre’ti asaṅkhyamidamitthattavati vattate,
anya-e0806n0:510_26: tasmā siyāye vetasmā āppaccayotyavassamāppaccayassa lopo vidheyyoti yo maññate,
anya-e0806n0:510_30: itthiyanti niddesassa guṇippadhānattaṃ sādhetuṃ ‘itthattavati hi āppaccayādayo’tiāha,
anya-e0806n0:510_41: padattho ca itthattaṃ siyāti yopyāheti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:510_47: evaṃ sati sālāyamiccādisaddantarāpekkhā itthattappatīti tatretyādīsu siyāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:510_52: aviddasu ayanti ubhayatrāpyatrekavacanasissa nivattiyā kataṃ yamekattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:510_54: itthatta vuttinā sālādisaddena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tatretyetassāti etāvatā āppaccayo uppajjatīti ca na sakkā vattunti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:512_1: ekottho yassa pakatyādisamudāyassa so ekattho ‘assa cekatthasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ īyādi vidhānantyāha-
anya-e0806n0:514_0: Yadā cātrādhisaddappayogo tadā teneva vibhatyatthassa vuttattā na sattamī payujjate,
anya-e0806n0:514_3: tenā sakapadeneva viggaho evaṃ dassanīyoti āha-
anya-e0806n0:516_4: yamamādeso pañcamiyampaṭisiddhattā pañcamiyā paṭisedhena sayampi paṭisiddho nāma hotītyāha ‘ādesassevāyaṃ paṭisedho’ti,
anya-e0806n0:516_5: lopapaṭisedhassa ‘nāto’ti pubbavākyena vuttassa ayampaṭisedho neti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:516_9: antarāḷamattapaṭisedhe payojanaṃ natthītyantarāḷagatassa vidhino paṭisedhassa cābhāvānantarotyupa carīyate anantarā gāmātyādi viya,
anya-e0806n0:516_11: ntara mesanti viggahe suttepyanantarassa vidhānantarassāpi diṭṭhattā dvinnamekopyanantarotyuccate,
anya-e0806n0:516_18: sāmatthiyāladdhanti dvinnamatthānaṃ vidhānāya dve vākyāni bhavanti,
anya-e0806n0:516_23: tathāsatyamapañcamiyātidaṃ vākyaṃ yadi na visesatthamālambate tamantarenānupapattito-
anya-e0806n0:516_27: na ekavākyattenāti byatireko ekavākyatāyañhi kāriya dvayassapi pañcamiyampaṭisedho siyā ‘pañcamiṃ vajjetvā taṃ kāriyadvayaṃ veditabba’nti,
anya-e0806n0:516_33: tatra cussaggā duvidhā niyatappattayo aniyatappattayo ceti,
anya-e0806n0:516_46: yena ussaggena nāppatte patteeva samphuṭṭheeva visayetyattho…
anya-e0806n0:517_3: yena tvappatte visaye ārabbhate tassa bādhanaṃ na bhavatītyattho,
anya-e0806n0:517_5: tathāhi yadi ussaggena sabbo visayo gahito siyā, ko-
anya-e0806n0:517_7: tasmā anavakāsattā (na) apa (vāde) pana tassa bādhanambhavatītyavaseyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:517_10: tampati sāvakā sattā tambādhateti vuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:519_4: tattha liṅgena sutte niddiṭṭhato aññena kenaci visiṭṭhaṃ nāmaṃ liṅgavisiṭṭhaṃ, tassa,
anya-e0806n0:519_10: so itthiyampattiyaṃ sati anitthiyanti kato siyāti anitthiyanti paṭisedhavacanamevemaṃ paribhāsaṃ ñāpetīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:521_0: Anapuṃsakassāti pariyudāsoti anapuṃsakassāti ettha nañsaddassa pariyudāso-tthotyattho.
anya-e0806n0:525_2: simhi tu kappaccayā paṭhamameva kato massa sādesoti tappaccaye sati ‘kevā’ti kiṃ sāmaññena sādesavidhānene
anya-e0806n0:525_3: tyāsaṅkiya suttassa sāmañña vidhāne phalaṃ dassetuṃ ‘kenekatthatāyaṃ’tyādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:525_14: nimittassābhāve taṃ hetuto pavattassa nemittikassa phalassāpyabhāvo bhavatī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:525_17: tathehāpi nimittato pavattānaṃ nimittābhāve abhāvoyeva yutti māti maññate,
anya-e0806n0:529_1: “tadādesā te viya hontī”ti paribhāsato sādyādesīnaṃ gahaṇāssāyādesādīnaṃ gahaṇasambhavepi kiṃ ssāyādiggahaṇe
anya-e0806n0:530_0: Desino ādeso tadādeso, tassa, tassa ādesino gahaṇaṃ taggahaṇaṃ, tena.
anya-e0806n0:532_0: Aññathāti guruniddesamakatvā aññena lahuppakārena niddisane sati,
anya-e0806n0:532_2: aññathātiādinā nekadesotivacanapariyantenetena ‘na tvekavibhattiyuttāna’nti paribhāsekadesassa adhippāyo pakāsitoti ñātabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:534_1: aññathā hi sabbādiggahaṇe ko pasaṅgo piyasabbādīnaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:536_7: ettha tu māsena karaṇabhūtena pubbabhūtānanti attho,
anya-e0806n0:538_2: cattho ettha sambhavati kintu sabbādi na catthasamāsavisayoti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:540_0: Kiṃ bahulaṃvidhānā ‘vuddhyabhāvo’ otthābhāvo (pañcikāyaṃ) ti pāṭhena payojanaṃ yene tadatthameva “sumedhādīnamavuddhi ce”ti gaṇapāṭho kato,
anya-e0806n0:540_6: bāṇādīsu abhidheyyesu manādīsu na paṭṭhīyantīti yojanā,
anya-e0806n0:540_8: ahasaddassa manādikāriyāsambhavā ahasaddo manādīsu na daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n0:540_9: rahasīti nipātattā ikārassa ca asabbhavā rahasaddo ca manādīsu na daṭṭhabboti sajjhāhāro sambandho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n0:540_10: ikārassa kaccāyane smino karīyamānassa ikārādesassa ca,
anya-e0806n0:540_14: tenāti yena ahasaddassa manādikāriyāsambhavo rahasītica nipāto, tena,
anya-e0806n0:544_5: sutattāti sotaviññāṇena gahitattā paccakkhattāti vuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:546_0: Daḷho dhammo dhanu assa daḷhadhammā. Rājādīsvimappaccaye paṭhite
anya-e0806n0:547_0: Tadanto paccayaggahaṇa paribhāsāya gayhatī tyāha- ‘iminā iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:549_0: Paccayaiccādinā “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇa”nti ñāyaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:549_1: tattha yato vihito taṃ vinā na bhavati paccayotyanena ñāyena pattoyevāttho ākhyāyate ‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito,
anya-e0806n0:549_4: so pakativiseso ādi yassa samudāyassa so tadādi,
anya-e0806n0:549_11: tadāditadanta samudāyassa tu gahaṇe phalaṃ ‘byajigisī’tiādīsu daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:551_4: ltvanto mandhātusaddo atthīti ‘sakamandhātu’ saddopi ltvantoti sajjhāhāro padasambandho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n0:557_0: Dutiyāggahaṇenāti ‘dutiyāyossa ne vā’tyevaṃ sutta racanāyaṃ dutiyāggahaṇena.
anya-e0806n0:561_3: itthipumannapuṃsaka samūhoti etthāyantesaṃ sādhanakkamo ‘dvandachaṭṭhīhi samāse itthipumanapuṃsakasamūho’ti ṭhite “samāse ca vibhāsā”ti (2- 2-
anya-e0806n0:563_0: Kammādittā enassāpi abhāvapakkheti “nā sse no”ti (2-80) kammādito nāssa enādesakaraṇato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:565_5: kiñcarahi ekassābhidheyyassa pubbasaddena paṭipāditassa dutiyampatipādanamanvādesoti vadati,
anya-e0806n0:565_11: kenaci visesenāyoge vuttasseva punabbacanānupapajjanaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ, tenevāha-
anya-e0806n0:567_1: 26) sāmaññena vidhānato syādyantamajjhepi itthiyampaccayo navirujjhatīti vadati.
anya-e0806n0:569_1: tathāsati ‘dvinnaṃ saddānaṃ dveādesā kamene’cceva kasmā vuttaṃ tyāsaṅkiyāha ‘na naṃvibhattikkamenāpī’ti.
anya-e0806n0:569_8: evamaññate “kiñcāpi jātiniddesena dvepi naṃ rūpāni gayhanti,
anya-e0806n0:571_1: tathā sati kāriyittena tadantāva gayhanti kathaṃ ntantūyevā tyāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:573_4: Ekekasmiṃ yomhi dvinnaṃ ādesānaṃ sambhavā ādesīnampi bahuttasambhavoti sutte ‘dvinna’nti bahuvacananiddeso,
anya-e0806n0:573_5: vuttiyampana paccekaṃ yomhi paccekaṃ dvisaddasambhavā ‘dvissā’ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:575_0: Pakatavasenāti tumhāmhānamādesānamadhikatavasena, kamamanatikkamma na bhavantīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:577_0: Kaccāyanācariyo tumhāmhehi parāya catutthī chaṭṭhī savibhattiyā “sassaṃ”ti (2- 3-
anya-e0806n0:577_1: 3) suttena amādesaṃ vidhāya ‘tumhaṃ amha’nti bahuvacanarūpāni sādheti…
anya-e0806n0:577_2: ekasmimpi attani guruādike ca gārava vasena bahuvacanarūpadassanatoti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:577_5: imasmimpana satthe ekasmimpi sabbathā bahuvacana rūpasādhanakkamaṃ dassetuṃ ‘idha panā’tiādimāraddhaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:579_1: padasaññāvidhāya kavacanābhāvepīti pāṇini yānamiva syādityādyantānaṃ padasaññāvidhāyakassa suttassa abhāvepi,
anya-e0806n0:579_2: anvatthavasena padanti gayhamāne atippasaṅgopi siyāti āha-
anya-e0806n0:579_6: taṃ sabbaṃ ekato saṅgahetvā ‘padasamūho vākya’nti vuttikārena vuttanti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:579_10: ākhyātaṃ sābyayaṃ sakārakaṃ savisesanañca vākyesaññaṃ bhavatītyattho,
anya-e0806n0:579_11: visesananti kārakavisesanassa kiriyā visesanassa ca sāmaññena gahaṇaṃ, sābyayaṃ-
anya-e0806n0:579_20: padasamūho vākyanti vutte ayampi adhippāyavisesovasīyatīti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n0:579_22: yatheccādinā anekākhyāti kampi guṇappadhānabhāve nopakārato vākyamekambhavati…
anya-e0806n0:581_1: tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakanti gāthāpāde tumhehitiādisū tattā na voādeso,
anya-e0806n0:581_2: tumhe tiṭṭhatha nagareti pubbavākyato vākyantarattā ekavākyatā natthi,
anya-e0806n0:581_3: tumhe viya diya dissanti amhe viya dissantīti viggayha ‘disa-
anya-e0806n0:581_4: pekkhaṇe’ iccasmā “samānaññabhavantayādi tūpamānā disā kamme rīrikkhakā”ti (5-
anya-e0806n0:583_0: Pacchā ādeso anvādesoti gahite kathitānukathananti kathaṃ ñāyatīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:585_0: Saha vijjamāno pubbo yassa so sapubbo.
anya-e0806n0:589_6: sāmaññavacanassa paṭisedhoti iminā visesavacane jaṭilakaiccatra ‘āmantaṇaṃ pubbamasantaṃ vā”tīmassa pattindasseti,
anya-e0806n0:589_9: tasmiṃ devadattādisāmaññavacane māṇavake māṇavakasadde parabhūte sati,
anya-e0806n0:589_10: ubhinnampi asatteti iminā idaṃ dīpeti “devadattāti visesavacanattā paṭisedhābhāvā pubbaparānamubhinnampi “āmantaṇaṃ pubbamasantaṃ vā”tīdaṃ pappotī”ti.
anya-e0806n0:594_5: samudāye pavattā saddā avayavesupi vattantīti syādisaddo siādike avayavepi vattate,
anya-e0806n0:594_6: vidhiggahaṇañāyenāti “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā sa vihito tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇa”nti ñāyena.
anya-e0806n0:594_8: Nanu ca “syādisyādinekattha”nti sāmaññena vuccamāne yaṃkiñci syādyantaṃ yenakenaci syādyantena sahekatthībhāvamarahati,
anya-e0806n0:594_11: gato yaññadatto gurukulanti ādopi samāso tyāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:594_14: tena syādyantena sahataṃ syādyantamekatthambhavatīti sambandhato viññāyati avasīyatīti yassātyādisvattho,
anya-e0806n0:597_0: Ayamettha attho “yato gāmamiccetaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyaṃ kiriyaṃ taṃbyapadesajānanayogyamapekkhate gatoti,
anya-e0806n0:597_1: ato sādhanaṃ kāra kaṃ sādhye kiriyāya niyataṃ,
anya-e0806n0:597_2: yato ca kiriyā sayaṃ sādhanamapekkhate kiṃ gatoti,
anya-e0806n0:597_3: ato kiriyāpi niyataṃ sādhanametissāti niyatasādhanā hoti ayaṃ yathāvutto niyamo aññamaññāpekkhāvasena
anya-e0806n0:597_4: vattamāno etesaṃ sādhyasādhanānaṃ sannidhāna mattena aññamaññato pakāsatī”ti.
anya-e0806n0:597_6: gato yaññadatto gurukulaṃtyatra tu gāmanti sādhanaṃ passeti sādhyamapekkhate,
anya-e0806n0:597_8: tato ca gāmagatānaṃ vākyantarāvayavānaṃ natthevāpekkhāti na bhavati samāso,
anya-e0806n0:600_0: Bhede visese gāmantetaṃ sāmaññaṃ visesāpekkhaṃ ‘gāmamāsīsati, jahāti, gato’ti,
anya-e0806n0:600_3: bhilasato tassa tu padhānapadassupasajjanapadassa ca yā pariplavamānatā anavaṭṭhitatā taṃ visese visiṭṭhe
anya-e0806n0:600_4: sambandhini nivesento patiṭṭhapento sambandhovānekappakāro kvaci sādhyasādhanabhāvalakkhaṇo kvaci pakativikārabhāvasabhāvo
anya-e0806n0:600_5: kvaci sassāmi sambandharūpo avachindati sambandhyantarato nivattetīti attho, yato-
anya-e0806n0:600_10: tatra na bhavatītyanupadiṭṭho visayavibhāgo ñāyateti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n0:600_11: bāle abudhetu nissāya vicitto samāsavidhānalopādinānekappakāro paṭipattiyā sādhusaddaparijānanatthamupāyo sambhavati,
anya-e0806n0:600_12: paramatthato tu saddantarattā accantaṃ aññattaṃ vākyasamāsānaṃ bhedo,
anya-e0806n0:600_13: na hi vākye diṭṭhapadāni samāse santi,
anya-e0806n0:602_0: Bhedo vākyasamāsānaṃ, ccantaṃ ññattaṃ (potthake) saddantaraṃ yatoti.
anya-e0806n0:603_0: Atoyevāti yato sāmaññena vuttepiyassayena sambandhotena saha tadekatthambhavatīti sambandhato viññāyatīti nāniṭṭhaṃ kiñcipīha hoti,
anya-e0806n0:603_5: Samatthavacanaṃ na katanti pāṇiniyehi viya “samattho padavidhī”ti (pā, 2- 1-
anya-e0806n0:603_7: Samattho pada vidhīti paribhāsāyamayamattho “vidhīyate vidhīyatīti (potthake) vidhi,
anya-e0806n0:603_9: yokocīha satthe padavidhi,so samattho viggaha vākyatthābhidhāne (satti) veditabbo”ti,
anya-e0806n0:603_12: sāmatthiyañcettha dvidhātyupagamyate vākye byapekkhāvuttiyamekatthībhāvo ceti vuttiyamekatthībhāvo vākye byapekkhāceti (potthake).
anya-e0806n0:603_13: Tattha paṭhamassa pariggahaṃ vacanamantarena paṭipādiya dutiyassa pariggahamidāni vacanena paṭipādayamāha-
anya-e0806n0:603_19: idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “samāse visesanaṃ visessamanupavīsati ekībhavati visesanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:603_20: vākye tu visesanaṃ visessato visuṃyevā vatiṭṭhate”ti.
anya-e0806n0:603_21: Dvandasamāsassa tu padānaṃ visesanavisessābhāvepi sakalapadatthappadhānattā ‘rañño go ca asso ca puriso
anya-e0806n0:603_22: cā’ti vākyato ‘rañño gavāssa purisā’ti samāsassa viseso ekatthī bhāvalakkhaṇo bhavatyeva,
anya-e0806n0:603_23: tathāhi tattha vākye bhinnatthanibandhana samuccayapaṭipādanāya casaddo payujjate,
anya-e0806n0:604_2: so ca taṃ vākyaṃ ceti viggahavākyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:605_0: Tattha sāntarehi sāmyantarehi ca byāvutti chedo,
anya-e0806n0:606_0: ‘Putha bhinno attho yesaṃ padānaṃ tāni puthagatthāni,
anya-e0806n0:606_1: vākye hi rañño puriso tettha rājasaddo rājatthameva vadati,
anya-e0806n0:606_3: vuttiyantu rājapurisotettha rājasaddopi purisatthameva vadatīti dvinnamekatthībhāvo bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:606_4: aññoyevāvayavatthānvito samudāyattho pātubhavatīti tadapekkhāya cekatthībhāvo vuccate,
anya-e0806n0:606_8: Ekatthībhavanaṃ samasananti iminā ekatthanti samāsoti nātthantaranti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n0:607_0: Jahamānāni padāni sakatthaṃ yassaṃ (sā) tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n0:607_8: vākye diṭṭhassupasajjanassa vuttiyaṃ soyevāyantyanvayāvasāyato tadatthāva gatiyāti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:608_1: soyevāyaṃ rājasaddo yo vākyatāle diṭṭhoti vohārīnamekattāvasāyenāsatyapi (rājasaddassa)tthe purisassa visesanambhavissatīti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n0:610_0: Abyayanti yadaññesaṃ pasiddhanti liṅgavacanabhedepi byayarahitattā upasagganipātānaṃ parehi abyayasaññākaraṇato abyayanti paresaṃ pasiddhaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:610_1: tesantvayaṃ samāso abyayatthapubbaṅgamattā anabyayaṃ abyayambhavatīti abyayībhāvo pasiddho,
anya-e0806n0:610_2: asaṅkhyassa sutattā tasseva vibhatyatthādayo visayabhāvena visesanānīti viññāyantītyāha-
anya-e0806n0:611_3: vibhatyatthe udāharitvāti vibhatyatthavisaye vattamānassāsaṅkhyassa itthisaddena samāsamadhitthīti uvāharitvā,
anya-e0806n0:612_0: Asakapadena anattaniyapadena aññapadena viggaho asakapadaviggaho, tena,
anya-e0806n0:612_1: ettha hi yathā kumbhassa samīpaṃtyaññapadavākye samīpa saddenupasaddavacanīyassa vuttattā upasaddo nappayujjate,
anya-e0806n0:612_2: yathā itthī sūti etthādhisaddavacanīyassā (dhā)ratthassa sattamiyā vuttattā nādhisaddoti ‘itthīsū’ti aññapadavākyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:613_0: Adhisaddassa pana puratovaṭṭhitassādhāre vattamānassa taṃsamānādhikaraṇena sattamyantenitthisaddena saha samāsoti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:614_0: Syādilopoti adhisaddato itthisaddato ca paresaṃ sattamī bahuvacanānaṃ lopoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:614_1: Atta (bhāva) sampattīti sarīrasampatti adhippetāti brahmasaddassa sarīraṃ atthoti āha-
anya-e0806n0:617_0: Ravimhi rāhugahite, dāresu ca pariggaho”ti nighaṇṭu.
anya-e0806n0:618_2: tampana nissesa matanissesa (potthake) ggahaṇā puthu bhavatītyāha-
anya-e0806n0:619_4: tampi sākalyeyevāharituṃ sākallenodāharituṃ sāgyadhītetyūdāhaṭanti dassetuṃ ‘tato’tyādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:620_1: pariggahāpekkhāya samattiyā antato sakāsā sākalyaṃ na bhijjateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:622_1: Atthābhāveityatthaggahaṇaṃ itaretarābhāve dhammābhāve ca mā siyāti,
anya-e0806n0:622_4: go asso na bhavatīti hi atthantarattaṃ nisedhīyate,
anya-e0806n0:623_0: Atikkamābhāvetī ettha atikkamāti pañcamiyā asamāsaniddesoti āha-
anya-e0806n0:623_2: na panuppannassa pacchāti iminā atikkamābhāvo nāma uppannassa pacchā abhāvoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:624_5: (ati) lahupāvuraṇanti rūpasiddhīti dassetuṃ lahupāvuraṇassātiādi vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:625_5: vākyeyevāssa ca payogo nāññatreti vākyampi bhavatīti maññate.
anya-e0806n0:626_0: Sadiso kikhiyāti ettha kikhiyā pasiddhabhūtāya sādhiyassa sādhanabhāvena gahitāya sadhammattena koci
anya-e0806n0:626_1: sādhiyo sadisoti vuttoti kimidha sadiso appadhānaṃ padhānamevāti attho tathā sati puppapadatthappadhānenāsaṅkhyasamāsena
anya-e0806n0:627_0: Yathā devadattoti ettha yadi samāso bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n0:631_0: Pañcamyāti kasmā vuttaṃ nanu avuttepi tasmiṃ vakkhamānanayena pañcamyantattā pañcamyanteheva samāso viññāyatītyāsaṅkiyāha‘yadipi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:633_0: Apasaddayoge niccapañcantassa vikappena samāsavidhānāvābhavanenodāharaṇaṃ dinnaṃ (ettha) pañcamyāti payojanābhāvepi
anya-e0806n0:635_7: Vatthuto tu sāmīpyāyāmavantānamaniddesepi sāmatthiyā tadākkhepoti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:637_4: gaṅgāya lakkhaṇabhūtāya pasiddhāyāmaguṇāya bārāṇasī lakkhīyate yāvāyatāyāmā gaṅgā tāvāyampīti sabhāvato
anya-e0806n0:637_5: tūpamānopameyyabhāvo samāse patīyate gaṅgā viya dīghā”ti lakkhiyalakkhaṇabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeti.
anya-e0806n0:637_6: Evaṃ sati bārāṇasīti paṭhamā nopapajjateti maññamāno āha-
anya-e0806n0:637_8: Anugaṅgaṃ bārāṇasiyāti bārāṇasiyā gaṅgāyāmo lakkhaṇanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:639_5: akāro ca nipātanā “gotva catthe cā lope”tyatra (3-
anya-e0806n0:642_1: pāraṃ yamunāyāti samāse kate nipātanā ekāro,
anya-e0806n0:642_3: vuttivikappanatthatoti vuttiyā vikappo attho yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:644_3: pādisamāsaṃ katvāti āsaddassa harasaddena vuttisaddena vuttipadena (pañcikā) kiriyākhyāpyateti asatyupasecanādikiriyāyaṃ
anya-e0806n0:644_6: tato tesaṃ sambhavāyeva samāsantobhūtakiriyā gamyateti maññate,
anya-e0806n0:644_7: tathāhi dadhibhojanaṃtyādo vutte adhyādino saṅkhārakattaṃ bhojanādino ca saṅkhāriyattaṃ patīyate,
anya-e0806n0:645_3: tathā vacanābhāvamiha manasikatvā ‘katha’miccādinā vutti yaṃvuttaṃcodakavacanamāharitvā tatthādhippāyaṃvivarati ‘evamaññate’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n0:645_5: tattheccādinā añña padatthe bhavissatītyetthādhippāyaṃ vivaranto niccasamāsataṃ sabbaliṅgatañca paṭipādayati,
anya-e0806n0:646_0: Atthasaddenāvagatatthatāya etassāti vattumayuttanti ‘etassa attho’ti vākyanivatti siddhāyeva,
anya-e0806n0:646_1: kathañcipi catutthyantā bhinnatthassa samāse katepi tattha virodhamāha-
anya-e0806n0:647_2: pāṇinīyānaṃ ‘etassa ida’nti atthe samāse kate yo-
anya-e0806n0:647_7: tesaṃ kathādīnanti ettha tesaṃ vāyāmādīnanti vattabbaṃ…
anya-e0806n0:647_8: vāyāmotyādinā vuttattā so ca tannimittaṃ hoteva,
anya-e0806n0:647_9: ayametthādhippāyo “etassa idanti vākye atthena samāse sabbaliṅgatā ca ‘etadattho etadatthā etadattha’nti vāyāmādayo ca samāsatthā honti,
anya-e0806n0:647_10: etaṃ anupādāparinibbānamattho payojanametassa etissā etassāti aññapadatthepi esaṃ padānaṃ soyevatthoti nātthabhedo”ti.
anya-e0806n0:648_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ anupādāparinibbānatthāya etadattho vāyāmo etadatthā kathā etadatthā mantanā etadatthaṃ sotāvadhāna”ntiādi (tikaṅguttara,
anya-e0806n0:649_1: 32) kitantena tatiyāsamāsavidhānā tattheva bahulaggahaṇena ‘gāmaniggatā’dīsu samāso vutto,
anya-e0806n0:650_0: So kathanti iha ‘bhāvatittatthehī’ti bhāvappaccayanteneva samāsapaṭisedhavidhānā ‘brāhmaṇassa sukkā’
anya-e0806n0:650_1: iccādo so samā sappaṭisedho kathaṃ sijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:651_2: tasaddenāssa guṇassa parāmāso tasmiṃyeva guṇe avatiṭṭhantīti tadavaṭṭhā,
anya-e0806n0:651_3: guṇeyeva guṇātiṭṭhanti na kadācipi soyamityabhedā dabbavuttayo sukkādayo viya te tadavaṭṭhā guṇā gandhādayo,
anya-e0806n0:651_4: tadavaṭṭhitehi guṇehi chaṭṭhī samassateti vattabbanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:652_1: devadattassāti chaṭṭhiyā gurumhi sāpekkhattepi gurusaddassa sambandhisaddattā sakatthe vākye viya vuttiyaṃ byapekkhā-
anya-e0806n0:653_2: sāmatthiyaṃ gamakattañcatthīti padānamaññoññāpekkhālakkhaṇaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ sāmatthiyābhāvepi viggahavākyatthassa gamakattaṃ vā atthīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:653_4: athātra brāhmaṇassa ucce’iccādo sāmatthiyaṃ gamakattaṃ vā natthīti kuto- vasitaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:656_0: Ruḷhittāti samāsasseva kīḷāvācakattena jīvikāya ca paccāya kattena pasiddhattā,
anya-e0806n0:656_1: na vākyassāti ‘uddālapupphabhañjikā’tyādo ruḷhīvasena niccasamāso bhavissatīti tatra kiṃ vacaneneti maññate,
anya-e0806n0:657_0: Ayampana amādisamāso kammadhārayadigusamāsāti sabbepi paresaṃ tappurisasadisattā tappurisā,
anya-e0806n0:657_1: yathā hi tassa puriso tappurisoti uttarapadatthappadhāno,
anya-e0806n0:657_3: saṅkhyāpubbatta napuṃsakattasaṅkhātehi dvīhi lakkhaṇehi gacchati pavattatītidigu.
anya-e0806n0:660_4: ekatthenetīmassa samānādhikaraṇena saha samāso hotīti evaṃ sājjhāhāro attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n0:661_1: Visessasaddassa visesanena saha samānādhikaraṇattaṃ visesana saddāpekkhanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n0:661_4: adhikaraṇassa samānattaṃ nāma bhinnānaṃ sambandhīnaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:661_5: sambandhino ca sambandhamantarena na hontī hoti (potthake) ti visesanavisessānaṃ sambandho viññāyate,
anya-e0806n0:662_0: Saddabyatirekena hettha atthānaṃ visesanavisessabhāvo na sambhavati,
anya-e0806n0:662_1: tathā hi ‘nīlamuppala’nti pañca vatthūni sannihitāni nīlanti nīlattaṃ guṇasāmaññaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:663_0: Tattha uppalajāti guṇajātīnaṃ nīlajātiuppalajābhadhanaṃ (kātantaṭīkā) tāva na sambhavati visesanavisessabhāvo jātiyā nigguṇattā,
anya-e0806n0:663_2: uppalattassa ca uppaladabbe samavāyino samānādhikaraṇattampi natthi,
anya-e0806n0:663_3: uppalajātiyā nīlassa ca guṇassa atthi samānādhikaraṇattaṃ…
anya-e0806n0:663_5: visesana visessabhāvo tu natthi jātiyā anīlattā,
anya-e0806n0:663_9: evaṃ nīladabba uppaladabbānampi aññamaññaparihārena vattumicchitānaṃ na visesana visessabhāvo,
anya-e0806n0:663_12: vuttapaṭipakkhato pana vakkhamānanayena saddānameva sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ visesanavisessattañca veditabbaṃ, tenevāha-
anya-e0806n0:664_2: bhinnanimittappa yuttānamevāti sāmaññena nīlaguṇādhāre dabbe guṇeyeva vā nīlasaddassa,
anya-e0806n0:664_3: uppalasaddassa ca sāmaññena guṇavati dabbe vattamānattā aññamaññesu bhinnesu saddappavattiyā kāraṇesu payuttānaṃ saddānameva niṭṭhānameva (potthake).
anya-e0806n0:665_0: Samānādhikaraṇattanti nīluppalasaddānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ yoge visiṭṭhadabba vācittassāsambhavā,
anya-e0806n0:665_1: nīlañca taṃ uppalaṃ ceti sāmānādhikaraṇye sannipatite sati sambhavā evaṃ tattha visiṭṭhe vatthumhi pavattānaṃ tesaṃ samānatthatā,
anya-e0806n0:666_0: Nanucetyādi codyaṃ, sīsampātīti sīsapā rukkhaviseso, nayida mevamiccādi parihāro.
anya-e0806n0:667_1: visesavuttīti phalassa rukkhassa ca sāmaññasaddattā bhāvena visese vutti,
anya-e0806n0:667_2: imesanti sīsapādīnaṃ na samodhāritāti na nicchitā,
anya-e0806n0:667_4: avasitā nicchitā vutti yesaṃ sīsapādīnaṃ te avasitavuttayo,
anya-e0806n0:667_5: payatanaṃ vinā tadā pappoti cāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:667_8: sarūpamattakathanāyāti vuttatthānampi sarūpamattakathanāya ‘pūpe bahū ānaye’ti yathā,
anya-e0806n0:668_3: yatrapyubhinnamatthi visesanavisessabhāvasambhavo tatthapitāva bahulaṃvacanatova nivatti hoti, kimpanā-
anya-e0806n0:668_6: ettha pana aññepi puṇṇanāmakā santīti byabhicārasambhavā ubhinnampi visesanavisessabhāvasambhave bahulaṃvacanameva samāsaṃ nivatteti,
anya-e0806n0:668_9: atha kho evaṃ vidhepyañña tarasambhavepityavisaddassa attho.
anya-e0806n0:669_0: Yajjevamiccādi paccekaṃ visesanavisessabhāve sati aniṭṭhā pādanacodanā,
anya-e0806n0:670_0: Aññamaññānupakārittāti aññamaññassa visesanavisessatte nānupakārittā sappadhānattāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:670_1: atha dvinnampi appadhānattaṃ kasmā na siyā tyāha-
anya-e0806n0:670_9: āpubbo labhi hi māraṇe phusane ca vattate,
anya-e0806n0:671_2: na ca nālambhate tasmā guṇo appadhānanti ajjhāharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:672_10: tadā nīlasaddopi guṇavisiṭṭha dabbavācittā dabbavacanamāpajjatīti imesaṃ na koci viseso”ti,
anya-e0806n0:673_0: Visesanamekattheneti siddhepi papañcatthaṃ paripphuṭatthañca udāharaṇabahuttaṃ dassetuṃ pāṇiniyehi bahuṃ suttitaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:673_6: tatthekādīnaṃ vuttiyamudāharaṇāni na dassitānyupalakkhaṇatova viññāyantīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:673_8: eko ca so purisocātyādinā viggaho upalakkhaṇattāyeva ca ‘satta ca te isayo ca sattisayo’ccādikañca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:674_3: tesaṃ upamānopameyyānaṃ sādhāraṇo yo dhammo sāmatātena visiṭṭhaṃ yadupameyyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:674_10: Nanu satthīsaddassasatthiyaṃ vutti sāmāsaddassa tu devadattāya,
anya-e0806n0:674_13: samāno dhammo sāmattādi yassa so sadhammo,
anya-e0806n0:674_16: sāmāsaddopi guṇavacanopi sāmattaṃ vatvā saddhādittavasenābhedopacārena vā devadattāyaṃ vattate,
anya-e0806n0:674_17: nanu ca sāmāsaddassa devadattābhidhāne caritatthatāya satthī guṇena niddiṭṭhātyaniyataguṇappatītippasaṅgo nekaguṇādhārattā satthiyātyāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:675_7: pasiddhasādhammiyā sādhyu sādhanamupamānanti katvā satthiyeva sāmaṅguṇena pasiddhā na devadattā,
anya-e0806n0:675_13: Yatratviccādinā bahulaṃvacanasāmatthiyā sāmaññavacaneneva samāsasabbhāvaṃ vatvā aññenāsabbhāvamudāharaṇena
anya-e0806n0:676_1: taṇḍulattampi vatvā dabbe pavatto sāmaññavacano natu bhavatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:677_1: tabbacanassa ‘muni ayaṃ sīho viya visārado’tyādo visāradādisaddassāppayogeti attho,
anya-e0806n0:677_5: visesanavisessānaṃ yathiṭṭhattā niccaṃ sīhādīnaṃ visessatāyeva vacanicchāti pubbanipātattāppasaṅgoti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n0:678_0: Athātrāpi visesananteva samāsappaṭipādane’muni ayaṃ sīhova visārado’ccādo sāmatthiyatova samāsāppasaṅgepi
anya-e0806n0:678_1: upamāno pameyyānaṃ sādhāraṇavisāradattādidhammavacanāppayoge sati tappasaṅgābhāvatthaṃ vacanamārabbhanīyanti
anya-e0806n0:678_3: sāmatthiyatoti sāmaññavacanappayoge sāpekkhattā samāsāppasaṅgoti sāmatthiyaṃ tasmāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:678_6: tathā hiccādinā sāmaññasaddappayoge sāmatthiyato samāsāsabbhāvā suttantarassānārabbhanīyabhāvaṃ sādheti.
anya-e0806n0:679_0: Visesānantabbhāvāti sāmaññassa samāse antobhāvepi tikhīṇattādito visiṭṭhassa sūrassādivacanīyassa visesassa
anya-e0806n0:680_1: bhirūpo’tettha abhirūpasāpekkhassa purisassa visesanattenevā visesanaṃ tenevā (potthake) ppadhānaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:680_2: samāsāvayavabhūtaṃ rājānaṃ pati visessabhāvenāviphalitasakatthatāya padhānabhūtassa purisassa.
anya-e0806n0:681_0: Ettha hi gehampati visesanabhāvenāppadhānattepi rājānampati padhānabhūtassa purisassa sāpekkhassāpi samāso hoteva.
anya-e0806n0:682_1: naceha gamakattamatthīti ‘muni sīhova sūro’tyatra tu vākyato yottho patīyate,
anya-e0806n0:682_2: nāyaṃ ‘muni sīho sūro’tyato gamyateti gamakattaṃ natthī- ti attho,
anya-e0806n0:682_3: tathāhi munisīhasaddenevo pamānopameyyabhāvanimittassa visāradattassa sabhāvenevopādānato visāradasaddassa tena sambandhābhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:684_0: Puṇṇatābyabhicārāti puṇṇatāsaṅkhātassa bālādiavatthāvisesassa avināppavattito byabhicārī hi visessambhavati yathā nīlatāyuppalaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:684_2: mantāṇiputtānaṃ anekattāti kevalaṃ mantāṇiyā putto puṇṇoyevāti abhāvā tesaṃ bahubhāvato,
anya-e0806n0:684_3: attano attano gahassa patayoti gahapatīnaṃ bahuttaṃ pākaṭameva.
anya-e0806n0:685_2: Visiṭṭhajātivacanāti vuttaṃ kaṇhasappajātiyā lohitasālijātiyā ca visiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0806n0:686_3: atthināmadheyyoti tacchako nāma koci tannāmo atthi,
anya-e0806n0:686_4: kiriyāsaddoti tacchatīti tacchakoti evaṃ kiriyāya pavattinimittattenopādinno vaḍḍhakīvācī tacchakasaddo,
anya-e0806n0:686_7: Atra kenaci na nāmadheyyassetyādi nopajāyatevātyetadavasānaṃ vuccamānamanudyataṃ nirākattukāmo āha-
anya-e0806n0:687_0: Imassāyamadhippāyo “vuttanayena tacchakasaddassa kiriyā saddassātthavisayāpekkhāyābhāvato visessattābhāvā paccudāharaṇamidaṃ kata”nti.
anya-e0806n0:688_2: nāmadheyyassa kiriyāvācino ca atthābhidhānasāmatthiyaṃ tulyaṃ vā na vā,
anya-e0806n0:688_3: avayavappasiddhiyā samudāyappasiddhi balavati vā navetyetaṃ vicāretuṃ yato nādhikatantyattho,
anya-e0806n0:689_2: ca visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ hotī’ti visesanaṃ maggīyate,
anya-e0806n0:689_5: nekatthavuttivā na vetyetadeva vicāretumadhikatanti katthacipi visesanavisessa sabbhāve samāso hotevā”ti,
anya-e0806n0:689_7: tathāpi vakkhamānanayena samāsasabbhāvā na kāci hānīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:690_6: sappavisese manusse ca tannāmake nāmadheyyassa tacchakasaddassa pavattisabbhāvā(ti) visesanavisessasabbhāvato samāsappasaṅgo tadavattho yevā”ti,
anya-e0806n0:690_7: na kevalaṃ sappavisesasseva tacchakasaddo nāmadheyyamapitu manussānampīti pisaddattho.
anya-e0806n0:691_4: iti iminā kāraṇena ‘tacchako sappo’ti paccudāharaṇaṃ na yuttaṃ…
anya-e0806n0:692_1: Avacchedakattāti ettha kattunā bhavitabbanti kāḷassāti kattari bhāvayoge chaṭṭhiyā ajjhāharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:692_2: Pattāpannehi dutiyantassa jīvikampatto jīvikā pannoti samāso ‘kārakaṃ bahula”nteva (caṃ- 2- 2-
anya-e0806n0:692_3: 19) vihito dutiyantena tu tesaṃ samāsatthaṃ suttantaraṃ kataṃ parehi,
anya-e0806n0:692_6: tathā māso jātassāti viggahe parimāṇivācinā chaṭṭhiyantena parimāṇavacanānaṃ kālasaddānaṃ, tadāha-
anya-e0806n0:692_8: parimāṇaṃ māsādi paricchedo tamassatthīti parimāṇī jātādi.
