anya-e0806n0:693_2: pattā jīvikānenāti patto jīvikanti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ vacanicchāyaṃ yo- ttho so-
anya-e0806n0:693_3: ñāpadatthasamāsepyatinno vacanicchābhedamantarenātidassetuṃ ‘aññapadatthe bhavissatī’ti yaṃ vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:693_8: Māso jātassāti vacanicchāyaṃ yo- ttho, so-
anya-e0806n0:694_4: aññathāti yadi māso tassa aññapadatthassa jātādino sampuṇṇo na bhātīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:694_15: tathāhiccādinā visesanassa sātthakatte samāsabbhāvamabhāve cābhāvaṃ sādheti…
anya-e0806n0:694_16: chaṭṭhīsamāse ‘sati sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanassa sātthakambhavatīti visesanassa sātthakattā.
anya-e0806n0:695_1: chaṭṭhīsamāsappasaṅgo carahi vuttanayena byavacchejja byavacchedakattābhāvena visesanānatthakyā na bhaveyya ce vākyenāpi na bhavitabbanti āha-
anya-e0806n0:695_4: yathā kammaṃ kiriyaṃ payojanañca dhāreti evamayaṃ samāso kammamiva dvayaṃ dhārayatīti.
anya-e0806n0:697_2: Pāmanaputtotipāmā kuṭṭhaviseso assa atthīti pāmasaddā “dissantaññepi paccayā”ti (4-
anya-e0806n0:697_5: yadi hettha ñakāro visesanattho na karīyetha,
anya-e0806n0:697_7: tathā ca satyuttarapade parato pāmanasadde nakārassāpi ṭo
anya-e0806n0:698_1: nanu ciha samāsavidhimhi ña kāroccāraṇā ña lopa rahitassa samāso na bhavatīti vattumucitaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:698_2: na tu “ṭa nañssā”ti visesanatthoti ññakāro etthova visesanattho,
anya-e0806n0:698_4: kintviha samāsavidhimhi ña kārassa byavacchajjaṃ na dissate.
anya-e0806n0:699_0: Pariyudāsavuttīti pari tulitamuggayha nisedhanīyassa asanaṃ khepanaṃ vajjanaṃ pariyudāso,
anya-e0806n0:699_3: pasajjappaṭisedhavuttīti paṭisedhanīyameva pasajja patvā taṃsadisamanapekkhiya nisedho,
anya-e0806n0:700_0: Yattha brāhmaṇā aññova bhavatītyevaṃ vākyenātthantaravidhānā vidhino padhānattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:700_2: brāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇassā (potthake) nivattane tadapekkhāyāññassa vidhānayogato sakapadena nañkhyena vidhibhāgī na vuccate,
anya-e0806n0:700_4: pariyudāsanissayinoññasaddasseva vākye payogato’ añño brāhmaṇā abrāhmaṇo’ti,
anya-e0806n0:700_7: añño brāhmaṇā abrāhmaṇoti tattha tattha pariyudāsavuttittā.
anya-e0806n0:701_0: Pasajjappaṭisedhetu paṭisedhassa padhānattā brāhmaṇo na bhavatīti vākyena brāhmaṇassa paṭisedho vidhi atthagammo vākyabhedo,
anya-e0806n0:702_3: tañca ñāṇaṃ dvidhā sammāñāṇaṃ micchā ñāṇañca.
anya-e0806n0:702_5: Tattha sammāñāṇa pubbake abrāhmaṇasaddappayoge natthi nañssa byāpāro,
anya-e0806n0:702_6: na hi tattha tena kiñci karīyati.
anya-e0806n0:702_7: Micchāñāṇapubbake tu vijjate tassa byāpā ro tattha hi tena micchāñāṇappabhavatā parassākhyāyate,
anya-e0806n0:702_9: vinā sadisattaṃ na bhavatīti paṭisedhe sati uttarapadatthasadiso samāsattho jāyateccāha-
anya-e0806n0:703_3: atha na kassaci ānayanaṃ evampi sabbassevā brāhmaṇasaddassānatthakattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:704_3: Ayañcettha attho “nañvacanena ivasaddena ca yaṃ yuttaṃ tadaññasmiṃ tappadatthasadise-
anya-e0806n0:704_5: tathāhyatthasampaccayo loke dissati ‘abrāhmaṇamānayā’ti brāhmaṇasadiso khattiyādi ānīyatīti,
anya-e0806n0:705_6: Anokāsaṃ kāretvāti karaṇena sambandho na okāsena.
anya-e0806n0:705_9: Gamakattavādinoti asāmatthiyepi yatra gamakattaṃ tattha samāso hoteva,
anya-e0806n0:705_10: tato gamakattañca samāsassa nibandhananti yo vadati tassetyattho.
anya-e0806n0:706_4: atippasaṅgābhāvatoti suttantarena samāse avihitepi anabhimatatthānampatītiyā abhāvato.

anya-e0806n0:716_4: viññāyate”ti teneccādinā idaṃ dasseti “tena yathāvuttena pubbe vutto sabbopi samāso pubbaparānaṃ dvinnaṃyeva
anya-e0806n0:717_0: Yajjevaṃ kathaṃ ‘tadahujāto’ti bahulādhikārena visesana samāsagabbhakārakasamāsena vā sijjhati,

anya-e0806n0:724_0: Diṭṭhanteniminā imaṃ dīpeti “yathā pañca parimāṇamesanti pañcakāti ettha parimāṇarūpo-
anya-e0806n0:726_0: Pakatippaccayatthabhedasambhavāti iminā paresaṃ pakatippaccayatthānaṃ bhedābhāvassa icchitattā saññāyaṃ sakatthe kappaccayassa vidhānaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:728_1: tadattho cettha vikappattho vā siyā tadā pana dvinnaṃ gahaṇe na tiṇṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:728_4: tadā tu saṃsayassobhayā lambanarūpattā dvevāti vutte tayo,
anya-e0806n0:728_5: tayovāti vutte dve apekkhīyantīti buddhivisayā pañca atthā samāsābhidheyyo honti.
anya-e0806n0:731_0: Nanu ca samānādhikaraṇānaṃ bahubbīhi vutto pāṇiniyehi ‘pañcahi bhuttamasseti byadhikaraṇānaṃ na siyā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:731_1: tathā paṭhamatthaṃ vajjetvā sabbavibhatyatthesu iṭṭho ‘vuṭṭhe devegatoccatra vuṭṭhadevoti na siyā’ti
anya-e0806n0:731_2: tasmā kathamatra byadhikaraṇānaṃ paṭhamatthe samāso vaṇṇīyateccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:731_4: byadhikaraṇānampi yathābhidhānaṃsamāsasabbhāvato pañcahi bhuttamassetyādo bahulādhikārā anabhidhānato vā na bhavissati,
anya-e0806n0:731_7: tathā paṭhamatthepi kvaci na bhavissati vuṭṭhe deve gato’ti.
anya-e0806n0:732_6: vā) sabhāvato eva nivatto na suttantarato,
anya-e0806n0:732_7: gatatthassāpi hi payoge anavaṭṭhānaṃ siyā piṭṭhapesane viya,
anya-e0806n0:733_3: tasmā oṭṭhova mukhamassāti viggayha oṭṭhamukhoti samāso,
anya-e0806n0:733_5: mukheneva ca pāṇimukhassa sadisattaṃ pasiddhanti sāmatthiyā oṭṭhamukhamiva mukhamassetyattheva tiṭṭhate,

anya-e0806n0:734_9: aya maññapadatthasamāso parehi bahubbīhīti vuccati tathāhi bahavo vihayo yassa so bahubbīhi,
anya-e0806n0:736_3: Ekaṃ sādhanaṃ ekaṃ kiriyaṃ vā paṭicca cīyamānatāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:736_8: Tattha devadatto bhuñjati tiṭṭhati pacaticāti sādhanampaṭicca kiriyānaṃ attarūpabhedena cīyamānatā veditabbā,
anya-e0806n0:736_9: dhave ca khadire ca palāse ca chindāti kiriyampaṭicca attarūpabhedena sādhanānaṃ cīyamānatā veditabbā.
anya-e0806n0:737_0: Soti samuccayo bhavatīti seso, kesanti āha- ‘tulya balāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n0:738_0: Tulyabalānanti iminā visuṃ padhānabhāvena kiriyābhisambandhā aññamaññānapekkhattamāha.
anya-e0806n0:739_3: etthāyamadhippāyo “ettha gavādīnaṃ visuṃ padhānabhāvenānayanakiriyābhisambandhā tulyabalatā gavādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n0:739_4: vuttakkameneva nayanābhāvā aniyatakkamatā gavādīnaṃ yugapadi nayanābhāvā aniyata yogapajjatā ca hoti,
anya-e0806n0:739_12: taṃ karaṇe yadi gāvopi passati tāpyānayati,
anya-e0806n0:740_1: vuttivayena sāriputtasaddo moggallānattho hoti moggallānasaddo sāriputtatthopīti aññamaññatthe padhānato
anya-e0806n0:740_3: yamadhikaraṇa samudāyo ubhayapadānugataubhayatthavasena catubbidhopi yugapadi buddhiyā gayhamāno kadāci
anya-e0806n0:740_5: nanu ca jananamaraṇānīti viruddhānaṃ kathamekenābhidhānanti vuccate-
anya-e0806n0:740_8: tathāpi yathā sāriputtamoggallānāti ettha bahuvacanassaññathānupapattiyā yugapadyadhikaraṇavacanatā hotī,
anya-e0806n0:741_0: Bahuttāti kiñcāpi vākye nesaṃ vākyenevesaṃ (potthake) visuṃ bahvatthatā,
anya-e0806n0:741_1: na hi sāriputtamānayāti vutte moggallānassāpi sampaccayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:741_2: tathāpi yato vuttivisaye sahabhūtānamevesaṃ visuṃ bahvatthatā,
anya-e0806n0:741_3: tato tattha vacanīyassa atthassa saṅkhyātedena bahuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:742_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi itarītarayogassa samāhārassa ca bhāvarūpattā adabbarūpatā,
anya-e0806n0:742_1: tathāpītarītarayoge tu yathā guṇavaca nānaṃ sukkaṃ vatthaṃ sukko kambalo sukkā gāvīti nissayabhedato liṅgavacanasiddhi,
anya-e0806n0:742_2: tathā taddhammānamabhidhānato nissayato liṅgavacana siddhi veditabbā,
anya-e0806n0:742_3: saṃhatippadhānattācekavacananti yadā bahunnaṃ samudāyo tirohitāvayavabhedo saṃghāto pakkamīyate,
anya-e0806n0:742_4: tadā samāhārocceva saṃhatippadhānattā ekavacanaṃ hotīti attho.

anya-e0806n0:772_7: Itthiyeva hi esāti liṅgīyati saṅketīyatīti liṅgaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:772_8: Itthiyā esāti pasiddhimato atthassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ bālayuvattādi lakkhaṇaṃ itthattaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:777_0: Atthesu yesu esā eso etanti pasiddhi lokassa hoti etāni yathākkamaṃ itthipurisanapuṃsakaliṅgānīti lokena vuccantīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:777_1: Evañcakatvā vuccate “liṅgaṃ nānusāsanīyaṃ lokanissa yattā liṅgassā”ti.
anya-e0806n0:777_11: Tato veccādinā paccayatthabhāvino ye dosā tesametthanāvakāsoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:777_13: Iminā idaṃ dīpeti “itthattassa paccayatthatte sati padhānattāssa byatirekalakkhaṇāya chaṭṭhiyā ‘kumārittaṃ (devadattāyā’tibhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:777_14: tato ca na siyā kumārī) devadattā’ti samānādhikaraṇattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:777_16: Pakatiyattha visesanapakkhe tu pakatiyā itthattavisiṭṭhaṃ dabbamevoccate,
anya-e0806n0:777_17: āādayo tu jotakatāti tattha byatirekābhāvā chaṭṭhiyā appasaṅgo ca bahuvacanampi anekattāva dabbassa yuttanti
anya-e0806n0:778_3: no papajjate nopapajjeyya (pañcikā) devadattāsaddavacanīyassāpi itthattato abyatirittattā ‘itthattaṃ devadattāyā’ti bhinnādhikaraṇatā na yujjate,
anya-e0806n0:778_5: Samānādhikaraṇattameva siyā itthisaddavacanīyato anaññattā devadattā saddavacanīyassa itthī devadattāti.

anya-e0806n0:779_3: 3 kāsikāyaṃ) “sāmaññavisesā itthattādayo gottādayo viya bahuppakārabyattiyoti sāmaññāni ca tulyajātiyapadatthasādhāraṇattā
anya-e0806n0:779_4: tāni visesā ca añña maññehi vijātiyeti ca visissante byāvattanteti sāmaññavisesā.

anya-e0806n0:779_7: (kāsikāvivaraṇa pañjikā.) te hyevaṃ maññante “yathā gottādayo samānajātiyesu sabbesvanuvattante,
anya-e0806n0:779_10: Vicittattā pana sāmaññavisesanissayānaṃ byañjakānaṃ kociyeva sāmaññaviseso kenacideva nissayena byañjate,
anya-e0806n0:779_12: tattha yenatthena itthattameva byañjate na pumattaṃ nāpi napuṃsakattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:779_13: sā itthiyeva bhavati na pumā nāpi napuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:779_19: 3 kāsikāvivaraṇapañjikā) tasmā pabbato yathā vuttaitthattavato atthassa abhidheyyassāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0806n0:780_0: Atheccādinā yathāvuttadosaparihārāya jinindabuddhinā yadupavaṇṇi taṃ taṃ parikappeti.
anya-e0806n0:780_2: Masimakkhitakukkuṭoviyāti yadā koci aññakukkuṭo aññasmā bhīto siyā,
anya-e0806n0:780_3: tadā vijayino kukkuṭassa mukhaṃ masiyā makkhetvā upanenti so paṭhamaṃ tato bhītopi puna aññoti mantvā yujjhitumussahate.
anya-e0806n0:784_0: Ttimhāti ettake vuttepi ttippaccayantatoti vacane kāraṇamāha-
anya-e0806n0:788_4: Itthiyaṃ vattantīti soyamityabhedavacanicchāyaṃ yadā bhariyāsaṅkhātāyamitthiyaṃ vattante,
anya-e0806n0:788_5: nadādipāṭhāti vutte viññāyati ‘ākatigaṇattā nadādipāṭho honto evaṃ hotī’ti dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:790_0: Puthusaddato saññāyaṃ vīppaccayaṃ samattheti‘puthubhūtā pathavīti hi mahī vuccatī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:790_1: puthubhūtāti hi iminā pathavīsaddassa puthusaddabhūtattaṃ viññāpeti,
anya-e0806n0:790_2: mahī vuccatīti iminā nadādipāṭhā saññāyaṃ vīppaccayattaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:792_0: Parādhikārato paccayassa paravidhināva sāmīpyassa siddhattā sādhīpyavacanassantasaddassa gahaṇamanatthakaṃ
anya-e0806n0:792_1: siyāti mantvāvayavavacano yamantasaddo gayhatīti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:792_8: Pallavitassa rukkhassa pallavānamavayavattaṃ viya samāsato uttarakālaṃ vidhīya mānassa akārassa samāsāvayavattaṃ na virujjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:794_2: dve aṅguliyo pamāṇamassāti viggahenevaṃ samāso tato mattappaccaye tagghappaccaye vā tassa “lopo”ti (4-
anya-e0806n0:794_3: 123) iminā lope kate visesanasamāsā akāroti dassetuṃ ‘katha’miccādinā yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ ‘aññapadatthe’ccādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:794_7: māne paccayalopavasena vināva appaccayena niṭṭhappattīti mantvā ‘aṅgulasaddo vā’ccādinā yaṃ vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ tattha āsaṅkaṃ viracayati ‘athe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:794_8: Dvaṅgulasaddassa pamāṇinivattanato kathañcipi aññapadatthatā siyāti ‘yathā tathā aññapadatthe vattatū’tivuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:794_10: tathā sati kimaṅguli saddā appaccayavidhānenetyāsaṅkiya payojanantaraṃ apadisitumāha-
anya-e0806n0:794_12: Aṅgulisaddato appaccaye avihite niraṅguliccādipi siyā tannivattanamettha payojananti dasseti ‘aṅgulisaddanivattanattha’nti.
anya-e0806n0:796_0: Dīgharattantyādo nānusiṭṭhattā liṅgavisesassa kathaṃ napuṃsakattameviccāsaṅkiya codeti ‘nanuce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:797_2: samudāyasaddassāpyavayave vutti sabbhāvato ekadesavacano pubbarattādo rattisaddoccāha-
anya-e0806n0:798_1: Pubbā atikkantā ratti pubbarattī(ti ratti saddo) nekadesavacanoti samāsantābhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:800_1: Syādilopassiccādinā sulabhasyādi lopato pyasulabhataddhita lopova alopetīminā parāmaṭṭhuṃ yuttoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:802_0: Rattindivaṃ bhuñjatīti payoge ādheyye bhojanasaṅkhāte apekkhite ratyādayo ādeyyasāpekkhā,
anya-e0806n0:802_1: tesampi iminā nipāta nenevātimatā samāsassa siddhīti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:804_2: nanu dve aṅgulī pamāṇamassa dārunoccādiṃ mukhyo aṅgulisaddogahitoti sambandho sambhavati kimevaṃ vuccateccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:804_19: 29) sissākārādesābhāvā niccamokārantarūpaṃ sampajjatīti parikappiyatassāyuttabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ yaṃ vuttaṃvuttikārena,
anya-e0806n0:804_26: abyañjanantattāti iminā tiṇṇamesaṃ saddānaṃ sakkate byañjanantattameva bodheti,
anya-e0806n0:806_1: iminā sutte kiriya saddābhāvepi vītiharaṇasaddeneva kiriyābyatihāreti labbhatīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:812_0: Āparicchedāvasānā na pare parena (potthake) tato paraṃ ṇādikāriyavidhānā.
anya-e0806n0:814_4: 27) mahato bhāvoti vākye“tassa bhāvakammesuttatā ttana ṇya ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā”ti (4- 56) tto,
anya-e0806n0:820_0: Apavādavisayepīti “vijjāyonisambandhānamā tatra catthe”ti (3-64) imassa apavādasuttassa visayepi.
anya-e0806n0:822_0: Atha vijjāyonisambandhānamityuccamāne vijjāsambandhīnaṃ yonisambandhīnanti kathaṃ vivaraṇamiccāha-
anya-e0806n0:822_2: vijjā ca yoni ca vijjā yonī tāsaṃ sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:822_3: so yesaṃ atthi te hotādayo mātādayo ca abhedopacāreneha vijjāyonisambandhisaddena gayhantīti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n0:822_5: Te ca ltupitādayoti tasaddena parāmaṭṭhā ltupitādayo ca,
anya-e0806n0:822_6: atthe kāriyā sambhavā taṃvācako saddo gayhati.
anya-e0806n0:828_1: taggahaṇe sati ‘itthiyaṃ vattamāne’ti vuttiganthassa itthisaṅkhāte atthe vattamāneti attho gayheyya,
anya-e0806n0:828_5: Atha itthiyanti ettake vutte kathaṃ taggahaṇaṃ siyāti āha-
anya-e0806n0:828_7: ekattheti vuttepi itthiyaṃ vattamāneti ayamattho viññāyatīti itthiyanti vacanamanatthaṃ siyāti samatthamaññathānupapattiyanti
anya-e0806n0:828_11: Byavacchejjābhāvā visesanamanatthakaṃ siyāti ekattheiccaneneva itthiyaṃ vuttiyā (gamma) bhāvatoti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:830_0: Vattanaṃ ekasmiṃ atthe adhitthiccādo itthivisiṭṭhe sattamiyatthādo,
anya-e0806n0:830_4: Sāmañña gahaṇatthanti iminā mattasaddassa kasiṇatthe pavattimāha.
anya-e0806n0:832_0: Evanti iminā itarītarayoge catthasamāsaṃ vibhāveti. Jānijāyā,
anya-e0806n0:832_1: saddantarenāti jānisaddena tathāsaddopadiṭṭhena daṃ jaṃ saddantarena ca,
anya-e0806n0:834_0: Nanu sutte‘sare’ti ettakaṃ vuttaṃ‘sarādo’ti kathaṃ laddhanti āha-
anya-e0806n0:834_3: vaṇṇe parabhūte yaṃ kāriyaṃ vidhīyate taṃ so vaṇṇo ādi yassa taṃ tadādi,
anya-e0806n0:834_6: na visuṃ akārenāti dassetuṃ na ākkhātaṃ anakkhāta “byañjane dīgharassā”ti uttarapadādi sarassa rassatta’nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:836_0: Saññāsaddesucātiādinā avayavatthanirapekkhānampi yathākathañci nipphattiṃ dassento sabbesameva saddānaṃ nipphannavācitañcāttano dīpeti,
anya-e0806n0:836_6: na itthi pumanti samāse nipātaneniminā napuṃsakādeso napuṃsakaniddeso (potthake) ti dasseti ‘na itthi’ccādinā. Khī- khaye, khara-
anya-e0806n0:836_7: vināse cāti hi etehi ‘na khīyati na kharatī’ti atthe “bhāvakārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti (5-
anya-e0806n0:836_8: 44) appaccaye’ na khaya na khara’iti ṭhite khattādesoti āha-
anya-e0806n0:838_0: Evanti iminā gacchatīti vākye kvippaccayādiṃ dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:840_0: Tattha tasmiṃ parabhūte, yassa ca jhattanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:842_4: Kapotādibhāveti katthaci gharādo kapotavātamaṇḍalikādīnaṃ dassanavasena sabbhāve sati.
anya-e0806n0:844_0: Sakatthe vattamānassa sahasaddassāti vattabbe vattamāno tappadhānoyevāti āha-
anya-e0806n0:848_0: Samāno pati yassā sapattinī sapattī iti nipphannānamekadeso ‘pattinī pattī’ti dassitoti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n0:848_2: Vayasaddassa “saravayāyavāsacetā jalāsayākkhayalohapaṭamanesū”ti gaṇapāṭhato akkhaye vattamānasso manādittā okārantattanti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:852_0: Tumhe viya dissantīti tumhādī amhādīccādiṃ “sabbādīnamā”ti (3-86) ā.
anya-e0806n0:854_0: Gabbhenāti iminā kucchigatena gabbhena saha dvihadayattamassāti dasseti, pubbapadeti dusadde.
anya-e0806n0:856_0: Guṇā paṭalā dve padāni assa iti bhavitabbaṃ dve pādā esaṃ dve satāni assa,
anya-e0806n0:856_2: dvinnaṃ satānaṃ dvinnaṃ sahassānaṃ vā samāhāroti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:860_0: Dve ca tiṃsā ca, dvīhi vā adhikā tiṃsāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:869_0: Nanu ca ‘ṇo vāpacce’ti vacanato kathaṃ pakativisayāvagamo siyā.
anya-e0806n0:869_1: Yathākathañci pakativisayāvagamepi sāmaññavacanato pana dhammenāpaccantyādo yato kutoci dhammeniccāditopi
anya-e0806n0:869_4: apaccavatāti “ṇo vāpacce”ti vasiṭṭhādyatthasseva pariggahaṇāya sāmaññavacanato yo apaccavā tato,
anya-e0806n0:869_5: atthato pana asambhavā dabbācakasaddāva sāmatthiyena chaṭṭhiyantā sabbaliṅgavacanā jāyateti viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:870_5: dhammenāpaccaṃ kassāti pucchitvā devadattassāti apekkhiyamānaṃ vadati.
anya-e0806n0:870_8: Na hettha ṇādivutti aññattha nahetakāmantattha (potthake) sāpekkhattā kambalo vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṃ devadattassāti ettha pana vasiṭṭho-
anya-e0806n0:871_2: Na hettha sambandho vasiṭṭhassa kambalāpekkhattena apaccassa ca devadattāpekkhattenātthantarāpekkhāya
anya-e0806n0:871_3: vasiṭṭhassāpaccena sambandhābhāvāyeva vasiṭṭhassa apaccaṃ vāsiṭṭhoti ṇādivuttiyā bhāve sāmatthiyaṃ natthi,
anya-e0806n0:871_4: samatthañhi vasiṭṭhaṃ rājapurisādi samāsavuttiyamekatthattamiva vāsiṭṭhādiṇādivuttiyaṃ ṇādippaccayamupajanayati,
anya-e0806n0:872_1: tadā visesato yassāpaccena sambandho tatova janakato so siyāti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:873_0: Yo janakoti yoyo yassa yassa apaccassa janako.
anya-e0806n0:873_2: Siyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ apaccatthe ṇādippaccayo siyā.
anya-e0806n0:873_6: na mūlappakatitoti paramappakatito na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Hetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:874_1: sambandhābhāvā (tādisavacanābhāvā) ca mūlappakatito ṇādippaccayassābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni mūlappakatitovāssābhimatabhāvaṃ
anya-e0806n0:875_0: Kathampanidaṃ viññāyaticcādinā janakassevābyāhitassāpaccena mukhya sambandhamānīya idamayuttantyādinā
anya-e0806n0:875_2: evaṃ hiccādi kathaṃpanidamiccādinā yathāvuttassa samattha navākyaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:875_3: hiyasmā taṃ disvā tathā pucchito devadattassavātiādinā uppādetārameva niddisati,
anya-e0806n0:875_5: tasmā uppādetāyevāpaccena sambajjhati na pitāmahoti yojetvā adhippāyo veditabbo.
anya-e0806n0:875_7: tena apaccena saddhiṃ uppādetuyeva janakasseva yogo sambandho paṭipādetuṃ na sakkāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:876_4: soti yoso yassātyaniyamaniddiṭṭho so ñātuṃ na icchitoti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:876_6: “napatatyanena naraketyapaccanti vuccati apaccenānena yassakassaci avisesenāpatanambhavati narake soso tāya pucchāya ñātuṃ na icchito”ti.
anya-e0806n0:876_7: So vāti kassāyaṃ puttoti pucchāyānurodhane so uppādetāyeva ñātumicchitoti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:876_13: yassa taṃ taṃnimittaṃ tasmā katvā (potthake) evaṃ diṭṭhiko hiccādinā yathāvuttaṃ samattheti.
anya-e0806n0:877_3: Kasmā evaṃ diṭṭhikoti āha ‘yaṃ nimittaṃ hi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:877_7: idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “tena byavahitajanitenāpi pumunā pubbajopi narakaṃ na patati so pubbajassāpya paccaṃ bhavati yathāvuttena nibbacanenā”ti.
anya-e0806n0:877_11: Pubba pubbabhāve satīti pubbassa pubbassa vijjamānatte sati.
anya-e0806n0:877_12: Byavahitena janite apaccepi nimittaṃ apāyāpatakāraṇabhāvo atthiye vāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:877_17: Abhedopacārenāti pubbapubbabhāve saticcādinā vuttanayena janakassa viya pārampariyenapubbesampinimittatā
anya-e0806n0:877_18: vato janakasadisattā janakāva nāma te siyunti evamabhedena upacaraṇato cintanatoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:877_20: evamubhayathāpi mūlappakatiyā paccenābhisambandhā kathamanantara manantarādi (potthake) (tattha) potthake
anya-e0806n0:879_1: paccasāmaññena ṇādippaccayaṃ vavatthapetvā idāni apaccāditopi hoteva ṇādi sāmaññavidhānā.
anya-e0806n0:879_2: So ca bahulādhikārato gurujanāyattattā tanniyogācaraṇena pasatthe yevāpacce byavahitajanitepi itthivajjite siyāti dassetumāha ‘nattādīhi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:879_4: paccetu nattādīvuttīhi vasiṭṭhādīhi ṇādippaccayo hoti vāsiṭṭhotiādi,
anya-e0806n0:880_1: Apacce vidhīyamāno paccayo apaccavatā jāyamāno tassāpaccanti atthe jāyati.
anya-e0806n0:880_2: Socāya matthaviseso cha(ṭṭhiyanta) tābhāve kathaṃ siyāti idamettha sāmatthiyaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:880_9: Apacceti ekavacanena niddese pumunā napuṃsakena kariyati,
anya-e0806n0:880_17: Tassa vacanicchābhāvatoti tassa liṅgavacanassa sutte vattumicchāyābhāvatoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:881_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ sutte liṅgavacanāvacanicchāyaṃ tassāppadhānattā yenakenaci liṅgādinā niddeso-
anya-e0806n0:881_9: bhidheyye vidhi hoticcevaṃ kāriyappaṭipattiyā vattuṃ na iṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:883_0: Satipanāti vākāre sati tu aniccattā ṇappaccayassa.
anya-e0806n0:883_4: Pakkhe vākyasamāsāpi siyunti pakkhe samāsavuttiyā eva bādhitattā pakkhantare ṇādivutti na bādhīyatīti vākyavuttiyopi siyunti attho.
anya-e0806n0:885_0: Vacchakaccādinā kaccādigaṇaṃ dassetvā tassa vibhāgena nipphattiṃ dassetuṃ ‘vacchādīhī’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n0:885_2: Tattha kaṇhasaddo brāhmaṇe vattamāno ṇānaṇāya nappaccaye uppādayatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:885_7: tesu pāṭhāti taṃsuttappadese “katā ṇiyove”ti pāṭhābhāvepi diccā dīnamākatigaṇattā paṭhitameva nāma tanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:886_3: Soyeva gāvaṃ sajāti sādhāraṇaṃ vijātivinivattanaṃ sakaṭādivacanaṃ tāyatīti gottanti vuttaṃ, tenāha-
anya-e0806n0:886_9: Vacchādayo nattādino apaccassa apaccaṃ tadapaccādi cāti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:888_2: atthi paṇhiādayo keciyeva kattikādīsu antogadhā hontīti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n0:890_3: Tasmā tasmiṃ gaggādikepi parasatthapaṭhite yoyo payogo āgame dissati vaccho aggivessoccādi.
anya-e0806n0:890_7: Gottassa gaggavaṃsassa ādibhūtena gaggena upalakkhito gaṇo gottādigaṇo,
anya-e0806n0:892_1: Āti nāmavisesanesati “vidhibbisesanantassā”ti tadanta vidhinā akāranto gayhatīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:896_2: Jātisaddāeteti idaṃ manusso mānusoti ettha apaccatthābhāve hetuvacanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:896_3: Apaccattho ettha natthevāti ca idaṃ visuṃ manussamānusa saṅkhātassa paccatthassābhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:898_2: pañcālānaṃ janapadānaṃ rājāti vā evamettha vi(bhāgo) veditabbo okkākānaṃ apaccaṃ rājā vā okkāko.
anya-e0806n0:901_6: tena sutte rāgāti vuttepi tabbācakā kasāvasaddāti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n0:901_7: rāgāti pana tenāti rāgasseva niddiṭṭhepi tabbhāvenā tabbāvakabhāvenā-
anya-e0806n0:901_9: tabbācakā ca honto‘tena ratta’nti atthe hotīti kasāvena rattanti viññāyatīti rāgavācino tatiyantattaṃ sampajjati,
anya-e0806n0:901_10: tena ‘ṇa rāgā tena ratta’nti vuttepi labbhamānatthavasena vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n0:901_12: Sutte pana rāgena rattantetasmiṃ atthe rāgā rāgavācīsaddā tatiyantā ṇappaccayo hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:903_1: Sutte ayamattho “induyuttena nakkhattena lakkhito ce kālo,
anya-e0806n0:903_2: tadā tena lakkhite kāletyasmiṃ atthe tatiyantato nakkhattā ṇo hotī”ti.
anya-e0806n0:903_5: kāleti pana atthaniddesato ṇappaccayādheyyassa kālo ādhāroti viññāyatīti ‘lakkhite kāle’ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:903_6: visessagatavibhattiyā vicāritāya visesana gatā ca (vicāritā) nāmāti āha-
anya-e0806n0:903_10: Tasso bhayassapi kālassa candayuttena phussādinā lakkhiyabhāvā lakkhaṇe tatiyā yuttanti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n0:904_6: Kattikāya lakkhito muhuttoti ettha candaṃ vinā kattikāya tu kevalāya muhutto kālo lakkhito ‘kattikā muhutto’ti.
anya-e0806n0:904_7: Phussena lakkhitā atthasiddhīti ettha phusseninduyuttena atthasiddhi lakkhitā na kālo phussoti.
anya-e0806n0:904_8: Nakkhattayuttassa kālassa ratyādivisesāparāmāsena nakkhattavācito uppannassa paccayassa suttantarena
anya-e0806n0:904_9: lopaṃ vidhāya puna aññena suttena yuttāti desavidhānena sakaliṅgasaṅkhyāyuttehi-
anya-e0806n0:905_0: Ratyādivisesāparāmāsenāti phussī ratti phusso ahoti evaṃ ratyādivisesassa aparāmāsena asammassena aggahaṇena.
anya-e0806n0:905_1: Sakaliṅgasaṅkhyāyuttenāti phussakattikādīnaṃ yaṃyaṃ liṅgaṃ yāyā saṅkhyā,
anya-e0806n0:905_2: attaniyehi tehi tehi liṅgehi tāhitāhi ca saṅkhyāhi yuttena nakkhattasaddena.
anya-e0806n0:905_3: Na tadupalakkhito kāloti kattikā saddobahuvacananto bahutārakattā kattikāya,
anya-e0806n0:906_0: Sattamī siyāti nakkhattasaddā taddhitalopantā phussena pāyasaṃ bhuñjeyya,
anya-e0806n0:906_1: phusse pāyasaṃ bhuñjeyyā’tyādo ādheyyantarāpekkhā siyā sattamī,
anya-e0806n0:906_9: tañca na vinādheyyena hotītyādheyyantarāpekkhāyaṃ tesu sattamīyeva siyā,
anya-e0806n0:906_11: Attanodāni dassane sattamiyā appasaṅgaṃ paṭhamāyevopapattiṃ dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:906_14: Evañcarahi vacanamantarena paresaṃ viya sattamīvidhāyakaṃ kathaṃ kattikāya jātoccāsaṅkiya tampaṭipādetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:906_19: Lopenāti kattikāhi induyuttāhi lakkhito kāloti viggayha kataṇappaccayassa lopena.
anya-e0806n0:908_5: Yāgasampadānampi loke devatāti pasiddhanti yāgassa yajitabbassa puroḍāsādino sampadānampi paṭiggāhako
anya-e0806n0:908_6: pindādi loke deyyassa puroḍāsādino devatā sāmīti pasiddhantyattho,
anya-e0806n0:909_0: Mantathomanīyampi devatāti pasiddhanti yena manthena yo thūyate so tassa mantassa devatā sāmīti loke
anya-e0806n0:909_1: pasiddhantyattho mahindo yamo varuṇo devatā assāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:909_6: 21) suttayitvā phussī puṇṇamāsī asmiṃ phusso māso phusso addhamāso phusso saṃvaccharoti saññāyaṃ paṭipādenti,
anya-e0806n0:909_7: tena tesaṃ phussī puṇṇamāsī asmiṃ pañcadasaratteti ettha ca bhatakamāse ca taddhito na bhavati.
anya-e0806n0:909_8: Idha pana ‘saññāya’nti vacanābhāve bhatakamāsepi chaṭṭhyatthe bhavatītyāsaṅka viracayati ‘bhatakamāsepi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:909_9: Puṇṇo mā iccatra māsaddo candapariyāyoti āha-
anya-e0806n0:909_11: Puṇṇo mā assanti nibbacanāti ettha puṇṇamāsīsaddassa puṇṇo mā assanti nīharitvā vacanāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:909_16: bhatakassa bhatiyā kammakārakassa yo tiṃsati ratto māso paribbayaniyamito,
anya-e0806n0:910_1: Atoeva ca nipātanāti imasmāva nipātanā, tenevāha-
anya-e0806n0:910_4: Assāti sāmaññavacanepi ‘sāssa devatā puṇṇamāsī’ti sutte assāti avisesavacanepi soyeva puṇṇamāsīsadde
anya-e0806n0:911_1: Atha addhamāsasaṃvaccharānampi udāharaṇatte nopaññāso kasmā na katoccāha-
anya-e0806n0:911_3: Evammaññate “addhamāsasaṃvaccharānaṃ na paccayenojukamabhidhānamapi tu saṃvaccharepi phussādimāsasambhavāsmiṃ
anya-e0806n0:911_5: yathā ca phussādimāsassa sambandhī addhamāso phusso addhamāsotyupacārīyate,
anya-e0806n0:913_3: kociyeva hotīti hontīti ito bhinditvā ānetabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:913_4: Tadā desassāti iminā “tadādesā taggahaṇena gayhantī”ti paribhāsamupalakkheti.
anya-e0806n0:913_5: Katayādesassāpīti kato yādeso yassa tassa katayādesassāpīti.
anya-e0806n0:913_10: 29) ntyādisutte ekova tasaddo bahūhi paccayattehi sambajjhate,
anya-e0806n0:913_14: tattha paṭhamaṃ dassento jānaniccādinādhippāyamāvīkatvā dvitaggahaṇamiccādinā padatthamāha.
anya-e0806n0:914_1: ‘yo yamadhīte jānāti cā’ti iminā dvitaggahaṇābhāve paccayatthāvayavassa samuccayappasaṅgamāha.
anya-e0806n0:914_5: na (jānāti) tattha na siyāti bodhayituṃ byabhicāramāha‘na paccekāti sambandhene’ti.
anya-e0806n0:914_6: Yathā “tena kathaṃ kīta”miccādo “tena jitaṃ jayati”ccādi paccekasambandhena bhavati evammāviññāyīti yatheccādi kassāttho.
anya-e0806n0:914_7: ‘Tena kataṃ kīta”miccādīhi avatvā “tena jitaṃ jayati”ccādisuttekadesavacanamatthabyatti tathā vutte hotīti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:914_8: tena jitamiccādo jayanādikā kiriyāne kadabbasamavāyittena pasiddhāti yutto tattha paccekābhisambandho,
anya-e0806n0:915_7: Yato ca uppannena vidhinā ajjhena ñātu abhidhānampasiddhanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:915_10: tathā ca vuttaṃ subodhālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṃ pakkantavisayo tathā pasiddhavisayo anubhūtavisayo ca taṃsaddo yaṃ saddaṃ nā pekkhate’ti,
anya-e0806n0:915_11: tasmā pasiddhivisayena tasaddena puthageva pasiddhiyā upasaṅgahatthaṃ dvitaggahaṇaṃ kattabba”nti.
anya-e0806n0:915_12: Atthattaye vattamānassa tu tasaddassa savisayo viseso tatovātthikehi veditabbo.
anya-e0806n0:925_0: Paccayantanāmeti paccayantanāmaṃ yassa sattamyatthabhūtassa desassa hasminti attho,
anya-e0806n0:925_1: nāññasseti bhūmādivisiṭṭhatthayuttato aññassa paccayantanāmaṃ na hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:925_2: Badarā babbajā asmiṃ dese santīti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:931_0: Majjhe bhavo majjhimo, ante bhavo antimo iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:933_0: Magadhesu araññe gaṅgāyaṃ pabbate vane kule bārāṇasiyaṃ campāyaṃ mithilāyaṃ sambhavoti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:933_3: Paccayantaradassane sati imināva suttena ito aññatrāpi paccayantarāni hontīti seso,
anya-e0806n0:933_4: gāme bhavo udare bhavo pañcālesu bhavo bodhipakkhe bhavoti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:937_10: iminā vīṇādisaddā dabbatthavuttino vādanādikiriyaṃ kiriyā visesañca sippamupacārena vadantīti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n0:938_2: kathaṃ vīṇādisaddehi dabbavuttīti vādanā vuccatīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:938_8: Kiriyātyāsapubbakaṃ ñāṇakkhamaṃ kosallaṃ vādanakiriyā visayattā vīṇāvādanamiccanena kiriyāsaddena vuccatītyattho.
anya-e0806n0:939_3: Phalanirapekkhanti iminā idha loke cīvarādihetu paṇidhāya paṃsukūla dhāraṇādiṃ paṭikkhipati,
anya-e0806n0:939_7: Ticīvaraṃ sīlamassāti viggaho tesaṃ guḷo paṇyamassāti viggaho tomaraṃ,
anya-e0806n0:939_10: Kāmakkhandhakilesābhisaṅkhārā vā upadhi upadadhāti sukhaṃ dukkhaṃvāti katvā.
anya-e0806n0:941_2: sutte vuttāya ekasaṅkhyāya vuttamānakā lasseva ca vattumanicchitattāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:942_1: Taṃ nānantarīya kattāti upalakkhaṇavasena tesaṃ vacanakālantarānamavinābhāvittāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:942_2: Hanticcādityādyantassa kiriyāppadhānatte kathaṃ ṇādīnaṃ tadatthe jāyamānānaṃ sādhanappadhānatta miccatra hetumāha ‘sabhāvato’ti.
anya-e0806n0:942_5: diṭṭhova sandiṭṭhanti iminā saṃsaddassa visuṃ atthabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:942_7: phaladhammopi heṭṭhimo sakadāgāmivipassanādīnaṃ paccayabhāvena uparimaggādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato pariyāyato dissamānova vaṭṭabhayaṃ nivatteti,
anya-e0806n0:943_4: Amanuññampi kadāci sappayojanaṃ yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṃ bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:943_13: Athavā ehi āgaccha imaṃ dhammaṃ passāti yo appatte-
anya-e0806n0:945_2: ukkaṃsenāti ukkaṃsādhānena utkaṃsasādhanena (potthake) ca bhavitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:945_7: tattha paccayamudāharaṇena dassetvā vijjāya saha saṃsaggassāvijjamānatte kāraṇaṃ vadati ‘rūpī dhammattā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:946_6: devadattikoti hi vutte devadattena kītotyayamattho nappatīyate…
anya-e0806n0:946_8: avagamo ca nāma sati sāmatthiye siyāti imamatthaṃ saṅkhepato dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:947_0: Abhidhānalakkhaṇattanti abhidhānaṃ sati sāmatthiye vākye vacanīyassātthassa vuttiyā kathanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo yesante abhidhānalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0806n0:951_0: Pavuttepīti kaccāyanena pavuttanti atthe “aññasmiṃ”tismiṃṇo hotevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:955_0: Mātāpitunnaṃ mātāpitaroti mātuyā mātāpitaro pitussa mātāpitaro,
anya-e0806n0:955_1: na ekamekato dvīsūti ekato ekato vuttanayena dvīsudvīsu atthesu na bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:959_0: Sena rūpena ñātepi visesarūpena aññāto aññātaviseso.
anya-e0806n0:959_2: Sambandho sassāmīlakkhaṇo assa atthīti sambandhi kassāti kiṃ saddaniddiṭṭho,
anya-e0806n0:959_5: Payogāsambhavāti ayamassoti vutta assappakatiyāpi payogā sambhavā.
anya-e0806n0:959_6: Tathāhi yadi yassāccantamajānanaṃ siyā tathā sati sabbathā vatthujānanābhāve pakatiyeva na siyā,
anya-e0806n0:959_7: na hi sabbathā aviññātattho saddo payogamaharati,
anya-e0806n0:959_8: tasmā sarūpena ñātassa yassa viseso aviññāto,
anya-e0806n0:959_11: ssokassa aññāto sesaññassa (potthake) vā kutotivā kiṃ sabhāvo veti hi assakoti.
anya-e0806n0:959_12: Kappaccayanto hatthikaiccayannāmadheyyaṃ nāmaṃ yassa hatthiviyāti dassitapaṭibhāgassa so kappaccayantanāmadheyyo.
anya-e0806n0:959_13: Abhinivesena vā sijjhanti yathā ajjunādivesadhārini ajjunādisaddenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:960_0: Paṭimāyāti ettha pūjanatthā eva paṭimā gahitā,
anya-e0806n0:960_3: idha pana taṃ sadiso puriso manusso cañcā.
anya-e0806n0:960_8: tasmiṃ ākasmikebhidheyyo sati ivasaddatthe vattamānato īyo hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:962_4: Nanu pañcakaṃ ganthajātanti vatvā aññaṃ vā saṅghādikanti vuttaṃ taṃ kathaṃ pāṇiniyehi viya “saṅkhyāya saññāsaṅghasuttājjhayanesū”ti (5- 1-
anya-e0806n0:962_6: “Ādasahi saṅkhyeye vattantī”ti pañcasaddassa saṅkhyeye vuttattā āha-
anya-e0806n0:962_11: rūpānīti ca pariyāyantarena āvuttisaddasse vātthaṃ byattaṃ karoti.
anya-e0806n0:964_0: Nanu sutte saṅkhyāyanti na vuttaṃ katyādayo ca payogā saṅkhyā parimāṇeyeva dissanti kathaṃ nāmetthāyaṃ vidhīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:964_2: Saṅkhyāparimāṇeyevāyaṃ vidhīti kiṃ sadde saṅkhyāparimāṇa visayeyeva vattamāne ayaṃ ratyādiko vidhīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:964_3: nanu cettha kiṃ saddo pañhe vattamāno kathaṃ saṅkhyāparimāṇe vattateti vuccate,
anya-e0806n0:964_5: tathāpi saṅkhyāparimāṇassa pucchiyamānattā saṅkhyāparimāṇavisaye vattate vāti.
anya-e0806n0:964_9: Ayametthādhippāyo “yadākimidaṃ saṅkhyā parimāṇamesaṃ dasannaṃ na kiñci appakamevetanti saṅkhyāparimāṇameva kiṃ saddena nindīyate,
anya-e0806n0:964_10: tadāpi saṅkhyā parimāṇassa nindīyamānattā saṅkhyāparimāṇavisayattameveti khepe vattamānāpi kiṃ saddā raticcādi siyā,
anya-e0806n0:966_1: 59) kattari kte ñimhi ca bubhukkhito pipāsitoti siddhepi vattamāne payogatthaṃ bubhukkhāpipāsāti pāṭho.
anya-e0806n0:971_1: Paṭikkhitte tasmiṃ vidatthimattaṃ ratanamattaṃ vātiādi(nā) yaṃkiñci daṇḍapubbaṇṇādikaṃ paṇṇādikaṃ (potthake) saṃsayitaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:971_2: tena mānasaṅkhātassa paricchedassābhāvā kathamete payogā siyunti āsaṅkiya tattha kāraṇamāha-
anya-e0806n0:971_4: Tathābhyūhanatoti vidatthimānampamāṇamassa ratanammāna massātyādinā tenappakārena abhyūhanato abhyupagamatoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:971_5: Saṃsayo ca nāma ubhayapakkhaparāmasane sati siyāti yathāvuttamabbhūhanaṃ sādhetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:971_7: Pakkhadvayehīti vidatthi mānamassa ratanammānamassāti evamādikehi pakkhadvayehi.
anya-e0806n0:977_0: Saccutīsāsadasantāya saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asmiṃ satasahasse adhikā saṅkhyāti atthe ḍo bhavatīti suttattho.
anya-e0806n0:977_2: Nanu ca sutte ‘satasahassa satasahasse ḍo’ti na vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:977_3: tathā sati vuttiyaṃ kathaṃ ‘sataṃ sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ vā’ti vuttantyāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:977_5: Ubhayathāvagamāti sataṃ sahassanti ca satasahassanti ca ubhayappakārenāvagamā,
anya-e0806n0:977_6: ubhayathāvagamo payoga dassanañcettha evaṃ vivaraṇe kāraṇanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:977_7: Paccayatthena samānajātiye pakatyatthe satīti yenakenaci suvaṇṇakahāpaṇādinā paccayatthena samānajātiye.
anya-e0806n0:979_0: Nanu ca saṅkhyāsaddo saṅkhyāne saṅkhyeyye ca vattate,
anya-e0806n0:979_1: kathamettha saṅkhyānevasitā vutti yenevaṃ vivaraṇaṃ katamiccāha-
anya-e0806n0:979_6: Yatoti vuttayaṃ saddasambandhinā taṃsaddena seti ulliṅgitassa saṅkhyātiatthamupadassiya sāyeva pūrīyatetīmassa
anya-e0806n0:979_7: kammabhāvena tiṭṭhatīti dassetuṃ tena pūraṇena pūrīyate’ti āha.
anya-e0806n0:980_1: Anenetaṃ dasseti “(na) ghaṭikādīnamiva dabbānaṃ dabbantare nātirittīkaraṇaṃ saṅkhyāya pūraṇaṃ kiñcarahi tassa samappattiyevā”ti.
anya-e0806n0:980_3: yāvatā sāti yasmā paccayo vihito tassa saṅkhyāsaddassa parāmāso tassa ca pūraṇena abhedoccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:980_5: saṅkhyeyyapūraṇe ḍo na hotīti vatvā tadatthaṃ vibhāvetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:980_7: So ghaṭo tāsaṃ ghaṭikānaṃ pūraṇo dabbānaṃ dabbantare nāti rittīkaraṇavasena.
anya-e0806n0:982_1: 42) suttena dvitisaddehi tiyappaccayaṃ vidhāya “tiye dutāpi cā”ti (2- 8-
anya-e0806n0:982_2: 43) dvitīnaṃ dutādesena dutiyaṃ tatiyanti ca “catuchehi thaṭhā”ti (2- 8-
anya-e0806n0:982_3: 41) suttena catuto thappaccayaṃ vidhāya dvittena catutthanti ca nipphāditaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:982_4: Idha tathā bhāvena kathaṃ te sijjhantīti āsaṅkiya vuttiyaṃ ‘katha’miccādi vuttanti dassetumāha ‘saṅkhye’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:982_5: Vuttiyaṃ ‘dutiyassā’tiādinā suttekadesā dassitāti tāni sampuṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ‘dutiyassā’tiādinā ‘catutthatatiyāna’miccādinā ca vuttāni.
anya-e0806n0:984_2: Bahuttavisaye payogo na siyāti saṅkhyāvacanassa ekatthe niyatattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:986_0: Taro hotīti vuttepi tehi taro hotīti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n0:986_1: vacchādīhīti sutattā pana vacchādīnanti ca viññāyatīti vacchādīnantiādinā vuttiganthopadassanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:986_5: tasmā kathamatra sabhāvasseva tanuttaṃ viññāyate yenevaṃ vivaṭamiccāha-
anya-e0806n0:986_7: vacchādīhi pakatīti paccaye vidhīyamāne tāsaṃ pavattinimittaṃ vayovisesādi,
anya-e0806n0:986_11: na ca kisattassa bhāvā dabbe vacchādisaddā pavattante.
anya-e0806n0:986_12: Ato tasseva saddappavattinimittassa tanutte yuttaṃ paccayena bhavituṃ,
anya-e0806n0:987_2: Dutiyañhi vayaṃ pappontassa vacchassa paṭhamo vayo vacchasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ kiñcimattāvasesaṃ bhavati amumevāha-
anya-e0806n0:987_6: Tatiyañhi vayappattakāle dutiyassa vayassa ukkhasaddappavatti nimittassa kiñcimattā vasesato vasissate
anya-e0806n0:987_10: yadātu tassa bhāravāhakatte sāmatthiyaṃ mandaṃ bhavati parikkhīṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:989_0: Samudāyo nāma dvyavayavo vā siyā bahukāvayavo vā,
anya-e0806n0:989_1: tattha dvyavayavasamudāyā niddhāraṇe sāmatthiyā ekasseva niddhāraṇaṃ viññāyati tamevānusarati.
anya-e0806n0:989_2: Bahukāvayavasamudāyāpye ‘kassa niddhāraṇe’ti sutte ekassāti vacanābhāvepi ekasseva niddhāraṇaṃ viññātabbaṃ
anya-e0806n0:989_4: Kataro bhavataṃ devadatto kataro bhavataṃ kaṭhotyādyudāharaṇabahuttena niddhāraṇavācīnamabahutthepi niddhāriyamānavācīhī’ti bahuttena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:989_8: caraṇasaddā ca kaṭhā yo kiriyāsaddā bhavanti kaṭhādīhi vuttajjhayanatthaṃ yathā sakaṃvatacaraṇakiriyānimittattenājjhetūsu
anya-e0806n0:989_9: pavattāti tesaṃ sambandhisaddānaṃ kesañci atthassa kiriyāsaddānaṃ cātthassa asatyapi jātitte jātinibandhanaṃ
anya-e0806n0:991_4: Devehi datto brahmunā dattotiādīni kattari karaṇe vā viggahavākyāni.
anya-e0806n0:992_1: devalo deviyotiādīnampana vacanantareneva nipphattiṃ dassetuṃ ‘devehi datto’tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:992_2: Parasaddasatthakārānampi devalo deviyoti vacanantareneva sādhanaṃ sādhanākārañca tesaṃ dassetuṃ ‘kecīhī’tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:992_3: Ekadesatoyeva paccayamicchanti tena tesaṃ devalo deviyo datti loccādi bhavati.
anya-e0806n0:994_0: Na ca sabbetiādinā bahulādhikāre phalaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:994_1: Bhāvasaddo katthaci kiriyāyaṃ vattate ‘bhāve ayaṃ vidhī’ti.
anya-e0806n0:994_12: nenāttho pacceti attha miti vā paccayoti vuccati.
anya-e0806n0:995_0: Nanu ca ‘bhavanti etasmā buddhisaddā’ti vuttaṃ tasmā pavattinimittamubhinnampi bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:995_1: tathāsati ‘saddappavattinimitta’nti saddasseva pavattinimittatā kasmā vuttāti vuccate.
anya-e0806n0:995_2: Pākaṭabhāvena abhidhānābhidheyyasambandhassa saddasseva pavattinimittataṃ vatvā visuṃ buddhiyā nimittassa
anya-e0806n0:995_4: Dabbeguṇoti dabbe vuttiyaṃ guṇo nimittanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:995_6: guṇassa jātiyā visuṃ jātinimittassābhāvato nidhittassa bhāvato.
anya-e0806n0:995_9: Tesaṃ devadattādīnaṃ avatthāvisesena avatthābhedena sāmaññaṃ tadavatthā visesasāmaññaṃ. Tenāha-
anya-e0806n0:995_11: Vijjamāno padattho visayo yesaṃ devadattādīnaṃ saññāsaddānaṃ tesaṃ pavattinimittaṃ jātilakkhaṇamācikkhitampaṭipāditanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:996_0: Anena ca devadattādayo saññāsaddāpi samānā jātisaddāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0806n0:997_1: Abhāvassabhedatoti ghaṭapaṭādīnaṃ sambandhīnaṃ bhedena abhāvassa bhedato abhedepi bhedā upacaritā santīti yojanā.
anya-e0806n0:997_4: Niravayavāvijjamānavisayānantiye ākāso viya niravayavā abhāvo viya asantā ca,
anya-e0806n0:997_5: te visayo yesaṃ saddānaṃ tesanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:997_8: brahmaññaṃ jāti cāpalyaṃ nepuññaṃ guṇo vā.
anya-e0806n0:1001_9: Anapekkhito kiriyāguṇānaṃ nissayo dabbasaṅkhāto yesanti viggaho,
anya-e0806n0:1001_11: tisayattaṃ hontampi nissitānaṃ kiriyā guṇānaṃ vaseneva siyā nāññathāti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1002_3: kassa carahi guṇassa go ayaṃ yo sakaṭaṃ vahati, gotaro-
anya-e0806n0:1002_5: jātiyā hi niccāyekarūpāya nokkaṃsāpakaṃsayogo sambhavatīti dabbassāpi nātisayasambhavo.
anya-e0806n0:1002_6: Tathāhi tulyappamāṇassa guṇakatova mūlato ukkaṃso dissati samānepi hi āyāme vitthāre ca paṭassa kāsikassāññovāggho bhavati māthurassāñño vāti.
anya-e0806n0:1002_9: Yadaggena kiriyāguṇānaṃ nissitānamatisayavasena nissayabhūtampi dabbaṃ kathañcidapyatisaye vattati nāma,
anya-e0806n0:1002_10: tadagge tabbācikāpi pakati attano vacanīyatthavasena tattha vattatiyeva nāmāti ‘atiyaye vattamānato’ti pakativisesanavasena vuttaṃ, tenevāha-
anya-e0806n0:1003_7: tisaye jātattā sakatthikehi yathāvuttanayena pakatyatthabhūtetisayo jotanīyo hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1004_1: Ukkaṃso samānaguṇavisayeyeva loke diṭṭho paviṭṭho (potthake) tena sāmaññavacanepi tādithavisayeyeva soyeva kāraṇa vasena hotīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1005_1: tarappaccayo na hotīti eko māthuro dutiyo pāṭaliputtako imesaṃ sukumārānaṃ dvinnameko māthuro-
anya-e0806n0:1005_3: ekamaññesaṃ dvinnamukkaṃsetathāññesaṃ dvinnamekassāti evaṃ dvinnaṃdvinnamekekassa ukkaṃse tarappaccayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:1005_5: tathāhi sukumārattenukkaṃsiyamānānaṃ samudāyānamavayavā māthurā bahavo pāṭaliputtakāpi nikkaṃsiyamānā tathevāvayavā bahavo honti,
anya-e0806n0:1005_6: evaṃ māthurā pāṭali puttakehi sukumāratarā’ti tarappaccayena sijjhati.
anya-e0806n0:1005_7: Imasmiṃ gāme aḍḍhatarā vāṇijjāccādopi kathitena ñāyena dvinnaṃdvinnamekekassa ukkaṃse tarappaccayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:1005_8: bahuvacanantu katthaci avayavāpekkhanti sabbaṃ sakkate kicchena sādhenti.
anya-e0806n0:1005_9: Iha tu tathāvidhassa suttassā vidhānā “taratamissikiyiṭṭhātisaye”ti tarādīnamatisaye sāmaññena vidhānā sabbattha tarappaccayena sukhasādhanaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0806n0:1006_6: Pañcasvetesūti etesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ tarādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ majjhe,
anya-e0806n0:1006_9: Issika iyaiṭṭhā sarādī tato (aññato) na honti bahulādhikārā.
anya-e0806n0:1008_0: Tassāti sāmaññena vuttepi vikārasambandhīyeva chaṭṭhiyanto gayhati,
anya-e0806n0:1008_1: chaṭṭhiyantasambandhīyeva ca vikāro gayhati sambandhavasāti dassetumāha ‘yassā’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1008_5: rukkhā pupphaphalūpagāti rukkhosadhīnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vadanti tallakkhaṇenettha rukkho sadhayo na gayhanti,
anya-e0806n0:1012_1: Rājaññamanussānampi jātiyamapacce ññassappaccayānaṃ vidhānā vuttaṃ ‘gottappaccayantā’ti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1012_9: ṇikaacittāti iminā ṇiko acittavāca keheva dissatīti ñāpeti.
anya-e0806n0:1014_1: 13) kaccāyanasuttassāya mattho “tadassaṭṭhānamiccetasmiṃ atthe chaṭṭhiyantato īyappaccayo hotī’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1014_2: Tena madanassa ṭhānaṃ madanīyaṃ bandhanassa ṭhānaṃ bandhanīyaṃtyādikaṃ sādhenti.
anya-e0806n0:1014_3: Idha pana tathāvidhassābhāvā kathaṃ taṃ sijjhatītyāsaṅkiya ‘madanīya’ntiādikaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1015_2: 14) kaccāyanasuttassāyamattho “upamatthe āyitattappaccayo hotī”ti tena dhūmo viya dissatīti dhūmāyitattaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1015_5: dhūmo viya dissatīti dassito yo kammattho sopi dhūmāyīti kattuvasena sakkā parikappetunti kattusādhanato
anya-e0806n0:1015_6: dhūmāyitasaddā sakatthettappaccayepi dhūmo viya dissatīti atthe āyitatthappaccayepi nātthabhedo-
anya-e0806n0:1019_0: Pavāse dūragamane sādhu pavāsiko, upavāse ratyabhojane sādhu upavāsiko.
anya-e0806n0:1021_2: sapatimhi dhana patimhi sādhu upakaraṇaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1025_2: Nanu ca yaṃ yassa hoti taṃ tasmimpi hoti (yaṃ yasmiṃ hoti) tassāpi taṃ hoti teneva vuccate-
anya-e0806n0:1025_4: tatrañña taraniddeseneva siddhe kimatthamiha chaṭṭhīsattamīnaṃ bhedenopādānaṃ karīyatīti vuccate-
anya-e0806n0:1025_6: tattheva chaṭṭhīsattamīnamatthassa aviseso vatthuto (potthake) yathā ‘rukkhesākhā rukkhassa sākhā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1026_0: Nanu ca sambhave byabhicāre ca sati visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ bhavati yathā ‘nīlamuppala’nti,
anya-e0806n0:1027_0: Nanu ca suttesu kālo padhānaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0806n0:1027_2: tathā hi kāyikaṃvācasikaṃ tyādo na kālasampaccayo,
anya-e0806n0:1027_4: atthīti tu vattamānasattāya eva pariggaho kathamavasīyate yena kālavisesanaṃ siyāti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1027_5: kintu padatthassa sattābyabhicārābhāvepi atthītivisesanopādānasāmatthiyātra visiṭṭho sattā atthīti visesanattenopāttā,
anya-e0806n0:1027_8: atthi ca tassā byabhicāro sāmaññasattāyāti yujjateva visesanavisessabhāvoti maññate.
anya-e0806n0:1028_0: Na bhuñjaticcādiviyāti yathā na bhuñjatīti nañssa paṭisedhattā viruddhatthapadassa sannidhāne-
anya-e0806n0:1028_1: tthantarassa paṭisedharūpassatthassāvagati padanibandhanassa vidhino abādhikā bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:1028_5: Kati payasambhave na pana gomā rukkhavāti yojanā,
anya-e0806n0:1028_11: Saṃsatto daṇḍo assa atthiccanena gehaṭṭhitena vijjamānenapi daṇḍena daṇḍīti nābhidhīyatīti vadati.
anya-e0806n0:1028_14: bhavaṃ bhaveyyāti yadākadāci bhavanto yadi bhaveyya.
anya-e0806n0:1032_0: Dve hontīti iko īceti dve honti,
anya-e0806n0:1032_15: asannihitopādhikā atthantā ca ika īppaccayo bhavatītyattho.
anya-e0806n0:1033_8: Tīsu vaṇṇesu bhavo tadantogadhattā tevaṇṇikoti bhavatthe ṇiko.
anya-e0806n0:1034_1: taṃ brahmaṃ nibbānaṃ dhammaṃ vā tepiṭakaṃ caratīti brahmacārī, yati.
anya-e0806n0:1034_7: Padumagaccha pokkharaṇīnaṃ vācakassāti iminā padumāni assaṃ santīti paduminīti pokkharaṇīpi vuccatīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1036_0: Ihāpi pasajjeyya madhu asmiṃ ghaṭe atthīti etthāpi payoge madhuranti rappaccayo pāpuṇeyya madhumhi abhidheyyati adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1036_3: tathāpi ñusādivato paccaya(ttha)ttena vacanicchābhāvā ñusavā ghaṭoccādi na sijjhati tasmā pahūtādivisayātthitāsambhavepi taṃvato-
anya-e0806n0:1036_4: tthassa paccaya(ttha)ttena ñusaro desoti vattu micchāyaṃ paccayo yathā siyā aññatramābhaviccevamattho veditabboti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1038_0: Parehi vācāsaddā ālo vihito nindāyaṃ, neha tatheti codanamubbhāvayati ‘nindāya’miccādinā.
anya-e0806n0:1044_0: Akārādeso ca ṇasanniyogenāti iminā yattha ṇakāro tatthevāyamakārādesoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1044_1: Upādānatoti iminā nissayakaraṇameko satthiyo ñāyoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1044_2: Antassa avidhānasāmatthiyācāti iminā satipi pubbalopena payoga nipphattiyaṃ akāraṃ vidhāya tassa lopo niratthakoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1046_0: Kappo yogyatā assa atthīti kappiyo, jaṭā hānabhāgo, senā assa atthīti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:1048_0: ‘Ohāka cāge’ iti sakakārassa hādhātuno payoge toppaccayaṃ nisedhetvā‘satthā hīyate satthā hīno’ti udāharaṇaṃ dassitaṃ. Tenāha-
anya-e0806n0:1048_4: 119) vutto cīppaccayo avasāne ye santi viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:1048_7: Kaccāyane tu toādīnaṃ vibhatti saññattā na tato puna vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0806n0:1050_0: Vuttiyaṃ ‘etassa ṭa eta’ iti atoiccatra etassa ṭādeso etto iccatra etaādesoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1052_7: apañcamyantā pana “ādyādīhī”ti sutte sasaṅkhyassādisaddassa gahaṇena taṃsadisā sasaṅkhyāevopalakkhīyantītipi
anya-e0806n0:1052_8: viññāyeyya tato apañcamyantehi abhyādīhi to na siyāti abhitoccādi na sijjhatīti “abhyādīhī”ti suttanti
anya-e0806n0:1054_0: Nanu ca toicceva sāmaññena suttite yatokutoci pañcamyantā vā apañcamyantā vā bahulaṃ vā tomhi iṭṭhappasiddhīti kiṃ ādyādīhīti suttenāti saccaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1054_1: tathāpi vibhāgena dassite vibhāgaso visesāvasāyo siyāti na dosoti.
anya-e0806n0:1056_0: Pubbenevāti “sabbādito” (4-99) ccādināva. Etassāti etasaddassa, imassāti imasaddassa.
anya-e0806n0:1060_0: Yatrāti vutte yatthāti uppalakkhitameva siyāti na vuttaṃ. Evamuparipi.
anya-e0806n0:1062_0: Hiñcanaṃ vidhīyate “hiṃ haṃ hiñcana”nti (2-5-9) suttena. Hiñciādīnanti hiñcidācirahaciādīnaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1068_3: Ettha pana mammatāḷanaṃ nimittaṃ pāṇa haraṇaṃ nimittī,
anya-e0806n0:1068_5: Upari tyādikaṇḍe karahasaddo tu cisaddasaṃyuttova dissati karahacīti.
anya-e0806n0:1070_3: tattha yadi sopi gayheyya dabba guṇānaṃ liṅgasaṅkhyāhi yogā dhāppaccayanta(mpi tabbisayoyeveti) cettha
anya-e0806n0:1070_8: kiriyāvisaye tu tasmiṃ gayhamāne ekadhābhuñjati dvidhābhuñjati dvidhāgacchaticcādo bhojana gamanādikiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:1070_9: sabbathā liṅgasaṅkhyāhi yogābhāvā yathāvutta doso na siyāti pāṇinīyavuttikārena jayādiccena kiriyā visayoyevettha
anya-e0806n0:1071_1: Rūpa rasa gandha phassa saṅkhyāparimāṇa puthuttasaṃyogavibhāga parattāparattabuddhisukhadukkhecchādosapayatanā ca guṇā,
anya-e0806n0:1071_2: casaddena gurutta davattasinehasaṅkhāradhammādhammasaddā ceti catubbīsati bahudhā guṇo.
anya-e0806n0:1071_3: Atrāpi yathāvuttakāsikāvuttiyā pañcikākārena jinindabuddhinā navadhā dabbaṃ bahudhā guṇotyatrāpi “kiriyājjhāharitabbā
anya-e0806n0:1071_4: navadhā dabbaṃ bahudhā guṇo upadisīyati viññāyati byākhyāyate vijjatevā”ti kiriyāvisayoyeva pakāro paṭipādito,
anya-e0806n0:1071_5: payogadassanato byavacchejjabhāvā sabbattha kiriyeveti visesanopādānamayuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1072_0: Navadhā dabbaṃ bahudhā guṇoti payogadassanato dabbaguṇavisayānampakārānaṃ gayhupagattā byavacchedayitabbānaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1072_1: dabbaguṇavisayānampakārānaṃ bhāvā sabbasmiṃ dabbaguṇavisaye jinindabuddhinā vuttanayena kiriyā atthevāti
anya-e0806n0:1072_2: kiriyāvisayova pakāro gayhatīti vuttikāra pañjikākārānaṃ visesanopādānamayuttanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1073_0: Tatoyevāti yato visesanopādānamayuttaṃ tatoyeva dvīhiccādikamāheti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1073_5: Tatoyeva kiriyāpakāropādāne pakārotisayane (potthake) atra dhāppaccayantappayogo na siyāti viññāpetuṃ ‘dvīhi’ccādikamāhe”ti tenāha‘atre’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1074_0: Dabbaguṇavisaye pakāre gayhamāne yoyaṃ doso sambhāvito parehi,
anya-e0806n0:1074_3: saṅkhyantarāpādane gamyamāne dhāppaccayo vihito pāṇiniyehi, tadāha-
anya-e0806n0:1074_4: ‘dabbasse’ccādi saṅkhyāntarāpādanepīti pubbaṃ yā vavatthitā saṅkhyā, tato-
anya-e0806n0:1076_1: tasaddena pakārassa parāmaṭṭhattā tabbatītettha pakāravatīti attho vuttoti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1078_0: Kiṃ saṅkhyānamparimāṇamesanti atthe “kimhā rati rīvarīvataka rittakā”ti (4-
anya-e0806n0:1078_1: 44) suttena ratippaccayaṃ vidhāya katīti siddhattā vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n0:1078_3: kati ca so saṅkhyā parimāṇavisayattā saṅkhyā ceti katisaṅkhyā, tāya.
anya-e0806n0:1080_0: Paccāsattīti sambandhimhi ekamhi dassite dviṭṭhattā sambandhassa paro sambandhī viññāyamāno parova viññāyati yuttitoti ‘sambandhatovā’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1084_0: Khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaso, puthu pakāro puthuso.
anya-e0806n0:1086_0: Nanu ca abhavanannāma sabbathā anuppattiyā vā avatthantarena vā,
anya-e0806n0:1086_5: Kathamavatthāva tasaddena parāmasīyatīti ce abhūtasaddo yadyanuppannavācī siyā,
anya-e0806n0:1086_12: Bhavanaṃ bhāvo tāya avatthantare bhāvo tabbhāvo tasmiṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1088_0: Dissantīti vutte payoge dissantīti ayamattho viññāyatīti āha ‘disi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:1088_1: idaṃ suttaṃ vijjhaṅga paribhāsā bhavatīti seso. “Ṇovā-
anya-e0806n0:1088_3: 1) suttena vuttesvanekavidhesu atthesu pari samantato bhāsatīti paribhāsā,
anya-e0806n0:1090_2: na vijjatentaramesanti antarāḷamattapaṭisedhepayojanaṃ natthīti katvāntarā ḷaṭṭhassābhāvāntarāḷaṃ natthītyupacarīyati,
anya-e0806n0:1090_3: evañhi loke payujjate ‘anantarā ime gāmā anantarā ime pāsādā’ti antarāḷagatassa ññassa gāmassaññassa pāsādassa vābhāvā tathā byapadisīyate,
anya-e0806n0:1090_7: Antaraṃ karotīti vā khādiippaccayaṃ ṇippaccayaṃ (potthake) vidhāya antarāyati byavadhānaṃ karotīti kattari
anya-e0806n0:1090_8: appaccayaṃ vidhāya antaro byavadhāyako natthetesanti anantarā.
anya-e0806n0:1091_1: tasmā byañjanāti bahuvacanena saṃyogoti ekavacananiddeso ghaṭate,
anya-e0806n0:1091_2: nanu ca vaṇṇānamuccāritappadhaṃsittā yogapajjamaṭṭhitamānānaṃ na sambhavati samudāyattanti samudāyattamayuttanti nāyuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1091_3: tathāhi uttaruttaraggāhini buddhi pubbaparībhūte byañjanāvayave samudāyarūpena saṅkappentī samudāyavohārampavattayīti.
anya-e0806n0:1092_1: uḷumpasaddassa saṃyogavisayattā oḷumpikoti etassa visayoti tattha rāghavo venateyyo meniko decco dosaggānti rūpāni.
anya-e0806n0:1094_0: Kosajjanti ettha tassa jattañca nipātanā, ajjavanti etthha “uvaṇṇassā vava sare”ti (4-129).
anya-e0806n0:1100_0: Satissāti vutte satisaddo viññāyati satyantepi visesanattena vattumicchitesatyanto kathaṃ viññāyaticcāsaṅkiya “saṅkhyāya saccutīsāse”ccādinā (4-
anya-e0806n0:1102_1: Pañcikāyampana pakatipi saddoyevāti dhātutoiccādinā adhātusaddassa atthamattaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1103_4: Pubbaggahaṇamantarenātipāṇininā ikārādesavidhāyake imasmiṃyeva suttekakārato pubbassa ikārādesavidhānatthaṃ pubbaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1103_10: siyā etanti bahuparibbājakāti etaṃ rūpaṃ hoti.
anya-e0806n0:1104_0: Nanu ca asyāditoti ettha pasajjappaṭisedho naña kasmā gahito,
anya-e0806n0:1104_1: na pariyudosoti āsaṅkiya pariyudāsesmiṃ gahite sati dosaṃ vattumārabhate ‘pariyudāse’iccādinā.
anya-e0806n0:1104_6: Asyādismā paroti katvā bahuparibbājakasaddato na syādyuppattīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1105_1: Pasajjappaṭisedhena nañasaddena aññapadatthasamāsepi siyāva dosoti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:1110_13: Titikkhakiriyattāti iminā paresaṃ viya khādyantānaṃ dhātusaññāvidhāna manatthakanti dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1111_5: Niccaṇyantassa curādikassa hi tādise payojane sati bahulaṃ vidhīyamānepi niccattamattano nātivattati.
anya-e0806n0:1111_10: Kadāci pana assādinopi dutiyassa gahaṇaṃ siyā atthappakaraṇā dippabhāvato.
anya-e0806n0:1112_0: Nanu ca vīmaṃsāyaṃ sappaccayavidhāna manupapannamitaretaranissayadosa duṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n0:1112_2: sati ca tasmiṃ vīmaṃsāti rūpaṃ sampajjatīti itaretaranissayo,
anya-e0806n0:1112_3: itaretara nissayāni ca kāriyānī nopakappantīti tenāha-
anya-e0806n0:1118_1: Tato ceti yato tuṃsmāti paccayasseva gahaṇaṃ yato ca visesana niddeso,
anya-e0806n0:1118_4: “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino gahaṇa”nti ñāyato.
anya-e0806n0:1118_9: So kiriyattho ādi yassa samudāyassa so tadādi so paccayonte tassa (so tadanto).
anya-e0806n0:1118_12: Nanu ca tuṃsmāiti visesanattena vattumicchite bhavatu “vidhibbisesanantasse”ti tadantaggahaṇaṃ paccayaggahaṇe
anya-e0806n0:1118_15: Yato vihito tena vinā na bhavati sīleneti tadavinābhāvī tassa bhāvo tasmā.
anya-e0806n0:1118_17: yamākhyāyate ‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino gahaṇa’nti.
anya-e0806n0:1119_1: Kha cha suppattābhāvāti kha cha sānaṃ uppattiyā abhāvā.
anya-e0806n0:1119_2: Vuttappakārasseva tuṃppaccayantassa pakatibhāvena gahaṇā sapādito kha cha sānamanuppattīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1119_6: nemittike ekāre nivatte ‘jisa jisa iti dvitte anādibyañjanalopo “jiharānaṃ gī”ti (5- 102) gī.
anya-e0806n0:1119_9: “Ā ī ū mhā ssā ssamhānaṃ vā”ti (6-
anya-e0806n0:1119_11: Yadi tu sapādito sassa uppatti siyā,
anya-e0806n0:1119_12: tadā byajigīsīti ettha dvibbacanaṃ karīyamānaṃ sappaccayantassa paṭhamassekassarassa dvibbacanaṃ bhavatīti “kha cha sāna”miccādinā (5-
anya-e0806n0:1119_13: 69) vijiya iti samudāye ādibhūtassa visaddassa siyā īmhi ca vihite sapādino pakatibhāvoti visadda pubbe añāgamo siyā,

anya-e0806n0:1120_6: Pāṇinināpīha sappaccaya vidhāyake sutte vākyampi yathā siyāti vāvacanaṃ kataṃ,

anya-e0806n0:1121_3: Icchāyapavattito upaladdhīti icchāya upaladdhi upālambo parijānanaṃ pavattitoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1121_4: Cetanāvaticāti vuttaṃ tasmā cetanāvati pavattito upaladdhiṃ dassetvā tadapadese nācetanepi dassetuṃ ‘yopesā’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n0:1122_1: Sā sunakho mimarisatīti mara=pāṇacāge’icchāyaṃ tumantā so.
anya-e0806n0:1122_7: Sā mimarisatīti satipi sacetanatte visattajīvitassa sunakhassa maraṇicchā sambhavatīti paṭipāditaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1124_1: Tañca nāma jāti guṇakiriyādabba sambandhato pañcadhā bhavati.
anya-e0806n0:1124_2: Tattha nāmakammaṃ’ ḍittho ḍavitthoti nāmena piṇḍassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n0:1124_4: Guṇakammaṃ sukkonīloti sukkādinā guṇena dabbassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n0:1124_5: Kiriyākammaṃ pācako pāyakoti pācakādikiriyāya dabbassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n0:1124_6: Dabbakammaṃ daṇḍīvisāṇīti daṇḍādinā dabbena piṇḍassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n0:1124_7: Evaṃ kammassa pañcappakārasambhavepicchāyamatthe īyassa vidhānato icchāsambandhiyeva kammaṃ gayhatīti
anya-e0806n0:1125_3: ettha tva(tta)ggahaṇamantarenātta sambandhinyeva puttādo kathaṃ viññāyate visesavacanābhāve hi parasambandhinyapi pappotītīmaṃcodyamubbhāvaya māha-
anya-e0806n0:1126_5: Yadi attano puttamicchatīti vattumicchāyaṃ sāpekkhettepi siyā,
anya-e0806n0:1127_2: Uppajjamānena īyeneva attatthassābhihitattā attasaddassāppayogoti cetampi na saṅgatanti paṭipādayamāha ‘na ca sakkā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1127_5: Apūpādikāya pakatiyā samānatthasseva visesanassa vuttipade antobhāva dassanāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1127_10: Natu bhinnatthassāti byatirekaṃ dassetvā taṃ diṭṭhantena sādhetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1127_14: Devadattassa dhuruno kulanti sāmyantarabyavacchedāya devadattasaddasso pādānato gurukulanti vuttipadena devadattatthassānto bhāvoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1127_17: Athāttano puttamicchatītyetasmiṃ vākye padassānvākhyānato attasaddassāpphayogo kinna siyāti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1128_8: Atthappakaraṇādyupalakkhaṇantyanena atthato pakaraṇāditopi puttassatta niyatā gamyate,
anya-e0806n0:1129_0: Nanu ca sutte kammāti vuttattā kammasamudāyatopīyo siyā tyāsaṅkiyeva (mabhā)vaṃ sādhayamāha-
anya-e0806n0:1129_2: Vattuṃ iṭṭhā ekasakhyā yassa kammasāmaññassa taṃ tathāvuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1129_5: Kimpanāvayavato na siyā’ mahantamputtamicchatī’ccatra puttamiccatoccāsaṅkiyāha ‘avayavatopi sāpekkhattāyevā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1129_7: Evañcarahi idampi na sijjhatīti codento āha ‘carahi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1129_8: Mahā cāyaṃ puttoceti mahāputtamicchatīti yadevaṃ karīyati tadāyampayogoti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:1131_4: tassa sādhamyā samāna rūpatāya yampasiddhassa gavayādino sādhiyassa sādhanaṃ tamupamānantyattho.
anya-e0806n0:1132_0: Puttamivācaratīti ettha ‘āvasathamāvasati’ccādo viya ādhāratthassa viññāyamānattā putte viya māṇavake
anya-e0806n0:1132_3: Pasiddhena sādhanabhāvenupamānabhūte putte ācaraṇampi pasiddhanti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1132_5: Tadācaraṇena tena ācaraṇena puttamāṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṃ vā puttamāṇavaka saddenupacārato gahetvā visayīvasena visayabhāvavohārotipi yujjati.
anya-e0806n0:1132_6: Vākyattho panetasmiṃ pakkhe ‘puttamiva puttavisaya māṇavakamiva ācarati māṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṃ karotī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:1133_0: Nanu ca yajjatropamānopameyyabhāvo vuttiyaṃ īyeneva jotitoti ivasaddo nivattate,
anya-e0806n0:1133_2: taṃ kathamupameyyavacanassa māṇavakasaddassa vuttatthassa payogo yuttoccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1134_1: Upamānopameyyabhāvassānivattattāti etthāyamadhippāyo ‘upamāna visiṭṭhācaraṇe upamānavacanato īyassa vidhāne
anya-e0806n0:1134_3: Aññathāti yadyupamānopameyyabhāvassa īyeneva jotitattā tadantassupameyye vutti siyātyattho.
anya-e0806n0:1136_0: Yathānantarasutte upamāne upameyyassa māṇavakassa payogo upapanno,
anya-e0806n0:1136_4: Nanu kimatthamidamuccate yavatāyo pāsāde ivācarati so pāsādamivācaratītipi vattuṃ sakkāti nātthabhedo-
anya-e0806n0:1138_5: Pabbatāyati hatthiccevamādinā hatthyādi saddena samānādhikaraṇatte satīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1140_1: 119) cīssa abhūtatabbhāve karādiyogesati vidhānā ‘abhūtatabbhāvo karādivisiṭṭho’ti āha.
anya-e0806n0:1140_2: Abhūta tabbhāvassa karādivisiṭṭhattā karotyatthanivattiyāvassaṃ pāṇiniyā viya bhuviggahaṇaṃ kattabbamaññathā
anya-e0806n0:1140_5: Yeneva karotyādivisiṭṭho abhūtatabbhāvocyattho teneva hetunāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1140_7: nena kāraṇena laddhe karotyatthopyaniṭṭho labbhaticcāsaṅkiya tannivattimpaṭipādayamāha-
anya-e0806n0:1140_9: Adhavalaṃ dhavalaṃ karoti dhavalīkaroticceva cīppaccaye kattabbe kammeneva karotissābhisambandhassa diṭṭhattāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1140_12: Itisaddo hetumhi yasmā iha kattutoti vattate tatoceti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1141_0: Asatyatthassa pana bhavatyattheyevāntobhāvā na tannivatti paṭipāditā.
anya-e0806n0:1144_0: Nanu ca asati sutte dutiyāggahaṇe dutiyantehiccāyaṃ viseso kuto labbhate yena ‘saddādīhi dutiyantehī’ti vivaraṇaṃ katanti saccaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1144_1: tathāpi paccayavidhimhi yuttepi pañcamiyā niddese ‘saddādīnī’ti dutiyāyopādānasāmatthiyā tathā vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1145_5: Yadīpi adhīteccādīsu vattamānakālena kattunā ekavacanena ca niddeso,
anya-e0806n0:1145_6: tathāpi tesamappadhānattā aññasmimpi bhūtādike kāle kammādo sādhane bahuvacanena ca paccayo siyā eveti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:1146_3: tato ca saddādīhi dhātvatthe ippaccayena na bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1146_8: tena bhinnavākyabhāvenāyassa ippaccayassa ca samuccayatoti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1146_13: saddādīni karoticcasmiṃ atthe āyo bhavatī’ti paccekamākhyātāpekkhāya vākyaparisamattiyā bhinnatā,
anya-e0806n0:1146_25: māḍharāya vatthayugalaṃ dīyatū’ti māḍharo brāhmaṇabhāvena bhojīyate vatthayugalañca labhate,
anya-e0806n0:1146_26: tenojukaṃ vuttena vatthayugaladānena sāmaññavuttaṃ bhojanaṃ na bādhīyate,
anya-e0806n0:1146_27: tathehāpi ujukaṃ vihitenāyena sāmaññavihito ippaccayo na bādhīyate lakkhiyānurodhena satthakārassa vākya bhedābhedoti nānavaṭṭhitidosoti maññate.
anya-e0806n0:1147_0: Yappaccayo na vihito pāṇinīādīhi viyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1147_8: Jalamānāti aṭṭhakathāvacanatoti iminā kiriyāsamabhihāre yappaccayābhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1147_9: Iminā ca sakkate viya bhusābhikkhaññepi kiriyāsamabhihāro kiriyāparivattanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1147_14: dittiya’nti imasmā “māno”ti sāmaññena vihito mānappaccayo bhusatthe ābhikkhaññe ca bhavissati.
anya-e0806n0:1149_1: saddaṃ karoti saddamuccāretīticcevamattho (na) gahetabbe anissayanato anabhidhānato vā.
anya-e0806n0:1151_3: Ayantu kiriyārūpo padattho pacatyādīnaṃ vikledanādipadhānakiriyārūpo ca tadavayavarūpā pubbaparībhūtauddhanāro
anya-e0806n0:1151_5: Tasmā yathā vuttalakkhaṇe dhātvatthe dhātuto vidhīyamāno tyādippaccayo tathābhūtameva vadatīti bhedābhāvā abhedasaṅkhyāyekavacanenoccate,
anya-e0806n0:1151_9: Na yatokutocītiādinā yato yattha na dissati,
anya-e0806n0:1151_12: sa tassa sambandhī bhavatīti nāmehi vacanīyatthato-
anya-e0806n0:1152_1: Atha atihatthayaticcādo pādivisiṭṭhe eva dhātvatthe ippaccayassa vidhānā tadatthavihiteneva ippaccayena pādivisiṭṭho dhātvattho vutto,
anya-e0806n0:1156_0: Asati sutte sakattheti kathaṃ labbhatīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1156_2: natidesāti atthavisesassa kassaci sutte aniddesāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1156_4: natidesamattena sakatthoyeva ṇinā vāccoti kathaṃ viññāyateccāha-
anya-e0806n0:1156_6: Cura=theyye iccādīsu theyyādikassa sakatthassa sutattāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1156_8: rajjaṃ kāretīti ettha sāmyamaccādikaṃ sattaṅgaṃ rajjaṃ pavattetīti vā attho,
anya-e0806n0:1158_0: Payojako codako byāpārakoti attho nanu ca vuttiyaṃ ‘kattāraṃ payojayatī’ti vuttaṃ kathaṃ payujjamānassa kattuttaṃti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1158_2: Nāvassaṃ kiriyāpavattakatteneva yoggatāmattenapi kattuttaṃ siyāti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:1158_7: Dāsādino hīnassa katthaci atthe niyojanaṃ pesanaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1158_9: Taṃ pesanajjhesanādikaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo yassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n0:1159_3: Bhikkhā hi pacurabyañjanavatī labbhamānā vāsānukūlaṃ tittivisesamupajanayati.
anya-e0806n0:1159_4: Kārīsopi nivāte padese suṭṭhu pajjalitojjhayanavirodhi sītakatamupaddavamapanayanto-
anya-e0806n0:1160_0: Payojakabyāpāretīdaṃ paccayavisesanaṃ vā siyā pakativisesanaṃ vā.
anya-e0806n0:1160_2: tadā payojakabyāpāre vattamānā ṇīṇāpī vidhīyantīti (gamanaṃ) pati yo niyogo tadattho gami,
anya-e0806n0:1160_4: tassa cāyaṃ payojjoti ‘gamayati māṇavakaṃ gāma’nti gatyatthassa payojje “gatibodhāhāre”ccādinā (2-
anya-e0806n0:1161_2: Kattāraṃ yo payujjati yo ca karaṇādīnaṃ payojako tesaṃ sāmaññena gahaṇe satīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1161_3: Byāpāretvevāti payojakaggahaṇamantarena byāpāreicceva vacanaṃ kattabbaṃ siyāti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n0:1161_11: Taṃ visuṃ curādīhi ṇividhānameva vakkhamānappakārena saphalaṃ siyā nāññathāti attho.
