anya-e0806n0:1164_3: na hi ‘ṭhīyate’ccasmā bhāvo kattā ca patīyate,
anya-e0806n0:1165_1: Parasamaññābhi paresaṃ kaccāyanā naṃ parokkhāicceva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1165_3: Aparokkhesūti ettha parasamaññāvasena parokkhāiccanena saha samāsaṃ dassetvā idāni aññathāpi paṭipādetuṃ ‘athavā’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n0:1165_5: Parokkhevihitā paccayāti iminā upacārena taddhitappaccayavasena vā parokkhāti saddanipphattimāha.
anya-e0806n0:1166_0: Nanu pubbapakkhe ‘aparokkhesū’ti ettha ‘parokkhāvajjitesū’ti attha vacanaṃ yujjati,
anya-e0806n0:1166_2: tathā sati kathamettha ‘parokkhāvajjitesū’ti atthavacanaṃ yujjatīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1166_6: 6) ‘parokkhe’ti pakativisesananti paccayānaṃ parokkhe vihitatā kathanti manasi nidhāyāha ‘parokkhe’iccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1167_1: Pubbaparībhūto padhānakiriyāvayavabhūto kiriyārūpo attho lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo yassa dhātvatthassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n0:1167_6: tathāpi kriyatthāiccādhikārato mānādīnamaññatthālabbhanato ca kiriyā sambandhova gayhate, su-
anya-e0806n0:1168_0: Pāṇiniyehettha “bhindati kusūlaṃ’tyādo yā bhedanādikiriyā kammani dissate,
anya-e0806n0:1168_1: sā yadā sukarattamattena sappadhānattavacanicchāyaṃ kattuttepyupalabbhati ‘bhijjate kusulo sayameve’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n0:1168_2: tadāssa kattuno suttantarena kammasarikkhabhāvo vidhīyate ‘kammanissayaṃ kāriyaṃ yathā siyā’ti.
anya-e0806n0:1169_1: Atthatoti ‘kammeyeva kyo’ti (na sakkhi) tasmā vuttanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1169_2: Tathāhi ‘bhijjateti savanā kammatāvagamyate’ti iminā atthato kammeyevakyotipaṭipāditameva.
anya-e0806n0:1169_5: Aññathāti yadi kammeyeva tepaccayo na siyā.
anya-e0806n0:1169_9: Kiṃ vacanenāti pāṇinīyānamiva kiṃ suttattarenāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1170_0: Vacanābhāvepi kammakattari padasaṅkhārakkamopadassanamukhena vutti ganthaṃ vivaritumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1170_2: Vākyato uddharitvā padesaṅkhariyamāneti ‘bhijjate kusūlo sayameve’ti vākyato visuṃ katvā bhijjate’ti pade saṅkhariyamāne nipphādīyamāneti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1171_0: Asmiṃ pakkheti asmiṃ kattuttena vivacchite pakkhe.
anya-e0806n0:1171_2: Bhāvakammesūtīmassa kattariccassa ca paccayavisesanatthe sati sāmatthiyaladdhampayojanaṃ dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1171_9: Yadi bhāvakammesu kattari ca tena tena dhānena suttena mānādayo na siyuṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1171_10: kathantaṃ visesitesu mānādīsu paresu kyādayo siyuntīminā sāmatthiyena ( ) (sati) bhāvakammesu kattari
anya-e0806n0:1171_12: 1) suttehi yathālābhaṃ bhāvādīsu paccayā hontīti viññāyatīti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:1172_0: Natadatthaṃ vacanamāraddhanti bhāvakammesu kattari mānantatyādividhānatthaṃ pāṇiniyehi viya suttantaraṃ nāraddhanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1172_1: Atha bhāvakammesu kattari ca mānādividhānatthaṃ vacanaṃ nāraddhaṃ dhātuniyamanaṃ dhātuniyamatthaṃ tvassa
anya-e0806n0:1172_4: Akammakā dhātuto bhāve kattari ca sakammakā kamme kattari ceti kiriyatthaniyamo yathāvuttena sāmatthiyā labbhateti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1172_6: sakammakānañca satopi bhāvassāppadhānattā akammakā kattari bhāve ca bhavanti na kamme,
anya-e0806n0:1172_7: sakammakā kammasabbhāvā kattari kamme ca bhavanti na bhāvetīdaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1173_0: Kammamapekkhateti pacādito kattari paṭhamapurisekavacane kate pacaticcādīsu pacādino pacanādikiriyā odanādikaṃ kammamapekkhate.
anya-e0806n0:1177_2: Sabbattheva yattha kattari paccayo tattha vikaraṇāpi kattariyeva,
anya-e0806n0:1177_5: Tasmā sahābhidhānānaṃ mānādivikaraṇānaṃ kathannāma sahāsambhavaṃ gaccheyyunti vidhīyante.
anya-e0806n0:1179_4: Tabbādīnantu kesañcussaggānampi apavādavisaye pavatti hoti bahulādhikārā.
anya-e0806n0:1179_7: 30) apavādo taṃvisayepi tabbānīyā honti ‘gantabbo gamanīyo’ti veditabboti.
anya-e0806n0:1183_0: Annatotīminā ‘bhoggamañña’ntettha aññaṃ nāma annavatā aññanti atthamāha.
anya-e0806n0:1185_0: Kammakaro bharitabbatāyeccādinā kiriyāsaddattaṃ bhaccasaddassa dassento saññābhāvamapākaroti.
anya-e0806n0:1186_0: Abharitabbāpiccādinā idaṃ dīpeti duvidhā saññāsaddā keci daccanta vigatāvayavatthā yathā ḍitthādayo,
anya-e0806n0:1186_3: yathā satta paṇṇāni assāti sambandho pavattinimittaṃ sattapaṇṇasaddassa,
anya-e0806n0:1186_5: kvacideva tvatthavisese satyasati vā tasmiṃ nimitte saddo vattatī”ti.
anya-e0806n0:1188_2: Kāmacārānuññāti kattumicchato yathiccha manujānanaṃ atisaggonāmāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1189_1: tathā ca sati vijjhatthavihi tehi eyyādīhi te bādhīyanticcāha-
anya-e0806n0:1189_3: Vidhivisesatte pīti vidhānaṃ vidhi niyojanaṃ kiriyāsu byāpāraṇā,
anya-e0806n0:1189_6: vuttañhi tena “kimatthaṃ pesādīsu kiccasaññino tabbaanīyaṇyatyappaccayā vidhīyante,
anya-e0806n0:1189_9: kāsikāvutti pesvādīññasvatra ca bhavissantīti visesavihitena vidhyādīsu paccayena bādhīyante,
anya-e0806n0:1189_10: vāsarūpavidhinā bhavissanti evañcarahi etaṃ ñāpeti ‘itthīadhikārato parena vāsarūpavidhi nāvassambhavatī’ti kimatthamiccādi codya,
anya-e0806n0:1189_14: ato tena visesavihitena kiccā pesādivisaye bādhīyeranti punabbiyate,
anya-e0806n0:1189_16: evaṃ carahiccādinā pesādīsu kiccavidhānassa ñāpakattaṃ dassayati.
anya-e0806n0:1189_18: Asarūpavidhi asarūpāpavādappaccayo vā vikappena bādhako hoti ussaggassāti etaṃ avassaṃ na hotīti ñāpanatthampi na vidhīyateti yojanā. “Vā- sarūpo-
anya-e0806n0:1189_21: Dhātvadhikārevihito asarūpo apavādappaccayo ussaggassa bādhako bhavati itthi adhikāre vihitappaccayaṃ vajjayitvāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1190_12: Avassakādhamīṇatāvisiṭṭhe tu kattari kiccānaṃ tadaññesañca bhāvāya visuṃ- suttitaṃ, tena,
anya-e0806n0:1192_6: Muṇḍanaṃ dhammo sabhāvo yesaṃ te muṇḍanadhammā.
anya-e0806n0:1192_7: Vadhuṃ katapariggahaṃ sāviṭṭhāyanā muṇḍayanti etesaṃ kuladhammo.
anya-e0806n0:1194_2: Kiriyā visesakattuvisayāti kiriyāvisesassa yo kattā so visayo yassā sā tathā vuttā.
anya-e0806n0:1194_5: Assā jīvanakiriyāya nandana kiriyāya bhavanakiriyāya vā kattā taṃkiriyaṃ sampādento bhaveyya bhavatūti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1194_6: Jīvatu nandatu bhavatūti āsiṃsāyaṃ payogena jīvaka nandaka bhavakasaddānaṃ taṃsamānatthatā dassitā.
anya-e0806n0:1195_0: Akenevāsiṃ sanatthassa gamitattāti āsiṃsanā eva attho,
anya-e0806n0:1195_2: Nāsiṃ sanatthassa payogoti āsiṃsanā attho yassa jīvatu nandatu bhavatviccādino saddantarassa,
anya-e0806n0:1199_0: Jahanti udakanti vīhīsu hāyanasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:1201_0: Nanu ca vitoti pañcamīniddiṭṭhattā ‘vito parasmā ñāiccasmā’ti vattabbaṃ kathaṃ vipubbāti vuttanti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1201_3: Visaddato dhātumhi parabhūte sati visaddo pubbo nāma hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1205_0: Nāmajātiguṇakiriyā dabbasambandhato pañcavidhattepi kammassa kriyatthassāvadhirayamupādinnoti kriyatthasambandhā kiriyākammasseha gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1206_2: Nanu ca kvaciggahaṇeneva ‘ādiccaṃ passati’ccādopi (nivatti) vattuṃ sakkā kasmā ‘bahulādhikārā’ti vuttanti āha ‘tene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1206_3: Tenāti yena kvaciggahaṇaṃ kutociyevāti dassanatthaṃ kataṃ tenāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1206_5: Atha ādiccaṃ passaticcādo viya kammakarādīsupi nivattimadassetvā ‘kvacīti kiṃ kammakaro’ti kasmā vuttanti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1207_3: Atheha kasmā na hoti devadatto sayati dāttena lunāti sunakhānaṃ dadāti nagarā apeti thāliyaṃ pacati mātu saratī”ti,
anya-e0806n0:1207_5: tathāpi kammatteneva yaṃ vattu micchitaṃ na kārakantarattena nāpi sambandhabhāvena,
anya-e0806n0:1207_7: aññathā syāditocceva vadeyya kiṃ kammāti vacanenāti.
anya-e0806n0:1209_0: Vedanti ettha atthamāha vittinti, tuṭṭhinti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1211_1: Bhedena vivaraṇanti samānādīhīti avatvā bhedena vivaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1213_2: Kattādīnaṃ kiriyānimittattantu sayameva ‘tattha kattā’tiādinā bhedena pakāsayissati.
anya-e0806n0:1213_4: nibbattakesu kattādīsu chasupi ruḷhattā tenettha kattāvāttappadhāno,
anya-e0806n0:1213_6: aññathā kārakasaddena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ na siyāti.
anya-e0806n0:1213_13: Tesu dabbā dīsu tiṭṭhatīti tatraṭṭhā, satti.
anya-e0806n0:1213_15: Atha dabbādīnaṃ mukhyato kārakatte sati kimāyātantyāha ‘yadi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1214_1: Aññamaññabyāvuttarūpattāti aññamaññato byāvuttaṃ nivattaṃ rūpaṃ karaṇādisabhāvo yesaṃ kattādi kārakānaṃ te tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n0:1214_3: Karaṇa rūpanti karaṇaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassa adhikaraṇassa taṃ tathā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1215_5: Tadattheti tāya kammasamavāyiniyā pacanādikiriyāya atthe adhissayanādayo pavattento kiriyāya nimittanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1216_0: Odanaṃ pacati devadattoti kammaṭṭhakiriyāya nimittabhūtassa kattuno udāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1217_2: “eonama vaṇṇe”ti (137) sutte ‘avaṇṇeti yogavibhāgato gakāre ikārassa attaṃ hotīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1218_5: Vināliṅgavacanehi pāṭipadikatthaṃ niddisituṃ na sakkāti bhāveti sabbaliṅgasaṅkhyāsambandhayoggapāṭipadikatthasāmaññe
anya-e0806n0:1218_6: paccayanimittattena gahitepi sāmaññe caritatthattā liṅgavacanaṃ nappadhānanti iṭṭhiāvudhantī itthi napuṃsakebhāve,
anya-e0806n0:1220_0: Sapādīhi apādīhicāti pādisahitehi pādirahitehi ca dādhāhi.
anya-e0806n0:1226_0: Calanādīnaṃ sīlādīsu nipphādanatthaṃ visuṃ suttitaṃ parehi,
anya-e0806n0:1229_0: Āsiṃ sāyaṃ gammamānāyaṃ saññāvisaye dhātūhi tippaccayo kiccappaccayo ca yathā siyāti “tikiccāsiṭṭhe”ti (7- 2-
anya-e0806n0:1230_1: Sakiya satthe avuttadosaṃ suttadosaṃ pariharitvā vakkhamānanayena yutyabhāvā tathā vidhāne ayuttataṃ dassento ‘nacāsiṃ sāya’miccādimāha. Guhanaṃ, rujanaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1230_5: so kathaṃ yakāre parabhūte asatīti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1234_11: Na hi eva dīhi kāro vihitoti akkhare heva kārassa vihitattā akkharasamudāyato na pappotīti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:1234_13: Evādisaddavācakā evakārādayo sādhavoti atha matanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1235_1: Niyamahetuno abhāvāti akkhareheva kārappaccayo vidheyyo na pana evādīhiccassa niyamassa yo hetu tassa hetuno abhāvā.
anya-e0806n0:1237_4: Kiriyāvisayarucivisesānumitanti uṇhabhojanasaṅkhātā kiriyā visayo yassa so (kiriyā) visayo ruciviseso,
anya-e0806n0:1237_9: Āse vā tapparatāti tamevābhikkhaññaṃ pariyāyehi phuṭīkaroti.
anya-e0806n0:1239_3: Āvassakaggahaṇāyeva siddhoti vuttaṃ kathametthāvassambhāvo patīyati ccāha-
anya-e0806n0:1240_7: Vatañca bhojane atthitāyaṃ saddhaassaddhabhojanavisayāyaṃ pavattiyaṃ yadi bhuñjati assaddhameva bhuñjati na saddhanti satthe vuttaniyamo,
anya-e0806n0:1240_9: evañhi viññāyamāne yadevāssaddhaṃ na bhuñjati tadeva vatalopo siyāti atthitāya (bhojanākaṅkhitattā) yathecchaṃ
anya-e0806n0:1240_10: sāmaññena bhojane pavattiyaṃ mattāyaṃ asaddhabhojanaṃ satthavihitamupalabhamānassa saddhato nivattitvā
anya-e0806n0:1240_15: tatrādime niyame yadevā saddhaṃ na bhuñjati tadevavata loposiyā (ra- 3-
anya-e0806n0:1242_1: Kammakattarīti ubhayatthāpi kammakattari paccayo bahulādhikārāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1242_2: Ettha pana ekopi padattho kammañca hoti kattāca kārakasattibhedato.
anya-e0806n0:1242_3: Yathā ‘pīyamānaṃ madhu madayatī’ti ekassāpi sattibhedā kammattaṃ kattuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1242_5: Yo paraṃ bhañjati tatthapi siyā sāmaññavidhānatoti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1245_2: sati ca tte bhūtasaddassa nipphattīti phuṭo yevitaretaranissayadosoti. Nesadoso,
anya-e0806n0:1245_6: Ktavantā dayopi carahi saddasattisabhāvato bhūteeva bhavissantīti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1245_10: Bhūteti cāyaṃ pakativisesanaṃ vā siyā ‘bhūtatthe vattamānā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:1245_17: Paccayatthassa kattuno anabhikkantattā ayanti payogo nopapajjateti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:1249_5: Kiriyārambheti sāmaññena vuttattā kiriyatthavisesanaṃ vā etaṃsiyā paccayatthavisesanaṃ vā ubhayathāpi na dosoti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1249_7: Paccayatthavisesanapakkhepi sāmatthiyā ārambhe kiriyatthassāpi pavattī hotīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1249_11: sopi sāmaññena vacanato bhāvakammesu ārambhepi hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0806n0:1249_14: Bhāvakammesuceti evaṃ na vuttanti ‘yathāpattañce’ti vadatā vuttikārenevaṃ na vuttanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1250_6: Evaṃ maññate “bhāvakamma gahaṇaṃ cākārenānukaḍḍhiya ‘bhāvakammesu cā’tyanena ktevidhīya māne idamāsaṅkīyate
anya-e0806n0:1250_7: ‘pubbeneva sāmaññena siddhe punabbacanā punabbacanaṃ kiriyatthāniyamena ttassuppattī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:1250_8: yathāpattañceti hyuccamāne cakārena yathāpattampi kāriyamanuññāyateti pubbeneva vacanena bhāvakammesvārambhepi yathāpatto kto bhavatīti viññāyate”ti.
anya-e0806n0:1250_9: Evañcarahi bhāvakammesvārambhepi pubbeneva siddhattā “kattariārambhe”icceva vucceyya kiṃ cakārene ccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1251_1: bahūhi kiriyākkhaṇehi kaṭe parisamatteyeva bhūto kālo ca bhavatīti kiriyāphalassāparinipphannattā vattamānova kāloti tatrakto na pappoticcāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1251_3: Kaṭekadesassāpi kaṭattā tassa ca nibbattattā bhūtavacanicchāti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:1251_6: na ca tadavatthā te eva kaṭoti kathaṃ ‘pakato kaṭo’ti bhūtakālena pakatasaddena kaṭasaddasamānādhikaraṇattamiccāha-
anya-e0806n0:1253_3: Sakammakatthanti vatvā sakammattamesaṃ pādiyoge sati hotīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1255_7: Sā ca bhūtā yevātīminā kāraṇasāmaggiyā atītakālikattamāha.
anya-e0806n0:1257_0: Ādhāreceti anuvuttiyā ettha cakārato ‘yathāpattañce’ti sambandhā vuttanti seso.
anya-e0806n0:1257_1: Evaṃ na kutoci apakassanaṃ siyāti evamādhārādike anuvattamāne sati kutoci ādhārādito apakassanaṃ visuṃ karaṇaṃ na siyāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1257_2: Tathā sati heṭṭhā suttenekayogameva kareyyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1258_0: Bahulassa bhāvo kammaṃvāti bahvatthādānamevātra bahulasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ bhāvo kammaṃceti tattha paccayo.
anya-e0806n0:1260_1: Kaṭṭhasaddassa phalahetubhūte agyādike vattamāne evaṃ hotu phalevattamāne kathanti āha-
anya-e0806n0:1262_0: Nanu ca bhāveiti bhavatināyaṃ ghaṇantena niddeso karīyatīti bhavativisayova paccayatthaniddeso kato bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:1262_1: tato ca bhavatino yo bhāvo tasmiṃyeva vācce paccayo siyā,
anya-e0806n0:1262_2: so ca bhavatito yevuppajjamānena paccayena sakkābhidhātuṃ tato tasmāva paccayena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1262_3: tasmā kathaṃ pacituṃ pāko cāgo rāgotipacādīhibhavati ccāha-
anya-e0806n0:1263_1: tena kiriyāsāmaññavācinātthaniddeso karīyamāno sabbadhātuvisaye kato bhavati tasmā pacādīhipi bhavatītyadhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1264_0: Nanu cātra tumādayo bhāve bhavantīti vutte na viññāyate kiṃvisesite bhāve tumādayo bhavanticcāha-
anya-e0806n0:1264_3: Yo vattabbo bhāvoti yo vācco bhāvo.
anya-e0806n0:1264_6: Tumādīnaṃ yā pakati tāya vācceneva bhāvena saha sambandhāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1264_8: Atha kriyāyaṃtyanena tabbādyabhihitassa dabbarūpāpannassa bhāvassa kathaṃ gahaṇaṃtyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1264_10: Sakanissayakiriyābyapadesoti dabba rūpassa attano nissayabhūtāya kiriyāya byapadeso daṭṭhuṃ cakkhuccādo
anya-e0806n0:1265_0: Nanu ca tumādīnaṃ bhāve vihitattā kiriyāyeva padhānattanti kamma kārakaṃ nappatīyateti kathaṃ ‘kaṭaṃ kātuṃ gacchatī’ti siyāccā saṅkiya paṭipādetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1265_3: Atthīti iminā yattha ‘supyate deva dattene’ccādo natthi,
anya-e0806n0:1266_1: 12) kaccānena atadatthāyampikiriyāyaṃ tumādayo yathāsiyunti visuṃ suttitaṃ, tenāha-
anya-e0806n0:1266_3: Yathā ‘bhottuṃ pacatī’tyādo bhojanakiriyā payojanā pacanakiriyā hoti,
anya-e0806n0:1267_0: Icchatthassa dhātuno payogāti iminā ‘icchanto karotī’ti ettha icchantoti icchatthassa dhātuno payogatthameva,
anya-e0806n0:1267_2: Devadattaṃ bhuñjamānamicchatītettha bhottunti na hoti samānakattukesūti vacanato,
anya-e0806n0:1267_4: icchatissa aññoyevātipi suttassa visuṃ payojanaṃ na vattabbanti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n0:1268_1: Sādhanaṃ ‘devadattaṃ bhuñjamāna’nti vuttakammasaṅkhātaṃ attho payojanaṃ yassa so sādhanattho- icchati.
anya-e0806n0:1268_4: Niratthakanti etadatthameva samānakattukaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ tañca yathāvuttena pasaṅgābhāvā niratthakanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n0:1269_0: Sakādyatthesu dhātū sūpapadesu dhātu mattā tumādayo suttantarena vihitā pāṇiniyehi, tenāha-
anya-e0806n0:1269_3: Bhujikiriyatthāti bhujikiriyā attho yassā sattiyā sā bhujikiriyatthā patīyate.
anya-e0806n0:1269_16: Sakkoticcādino upapadassa bhojanādikiriyatthatā na gamyate tasmā akiriyatthesupi sakādīsūpapadesu tumādayo bhavantī”ti.
anya-e0806n0:1270_0: Patīyamānesvapyetesvatthantaresu tādatthiyamatthiyevāti pubbena vihitassa tumādinotra na bādheti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1270_2: Tādatthiyamatthiyevāti bhojanakiriyatthatā sakkotiādīnaṃ atthi yevāti attho siddhāyeva “tuṃtāye”ccādinā.
anya-e0806n0:1270_3: Alamatthavisiṭṭhesu pariyattivacanesūpapadesu dhātuto tumādayo vihitā parehi,
anya-e0806n0:1270_10: Yathā bhottumanotiādinā paresampi ayameva nipphattikkamoti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n0:1270_12: bhavati bhojanaṃ bhāvoti bhojanaṃ bhuñjanaṃ bhāvo bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1270_13: Natugamissakiriyātadatthāti gamanakiriyā bhojanatthā na hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1271_4: ‘Kattariltu’ccādinā yoyaṃ ṇako tīsupi kālesu sāmaññena vihito,
anya-e0806n0:1271_7: na cāssa visesavihitena tuṃpaccayena bādhā bhinnattā,
anya-e0806n0:1271_8: tuṃpaccayassa hi bhāve vidhānaṃ ṇakassa tu kattarīti.
anya-e0806n0:1271_14: Hi yasmātyatthe yo eso vajati so kattā,
anya-e0806n0:1271_17: na pana tehi tādatthiyaṃ gamyateti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1271_18: Codako ltvādīhi sāmyamāpādayituṃ sāmarisaṃ vuttavidhinevāppattiṃ ṇakassāpyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1271_20: Agatthaṃ apakatatthaṃ (potthake) yadipi ṇakena tādatthiyaṃ na gamyate pakaraṇato gamyateti ṇako bhavissatītyāsaṅkiya codako āha-
anya-e0806n0:1271_26: Tadevaṃltvādīnampipattitoṇakaltvādīhi tādatthiyānavagame vinicchite tādatthiyavisesena tesaṃ sambhavoti
anya-e0806n0:1271_33: Bhavissati kāle kriyatthāyaṃ kriyāyamupapade bhāve ca ṇappaccayādayo vihitā, tatrāha-
anya-e0806n0:1273_0: Sotunādīsu ‘savanaṃ kātuna’iccādinā viggaho. Suteneti savananti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:1275_7: Yadipi ‘pubbaṃ byāpāra’nti samudāye ekadesabhūto byāpāro niddhāriyamānoti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n0:1275_8: tathāpi pubbasaddena byāpāravācako kriyattho vuccate upacārā,
anya-e0806n0:1275_9: teneva ‘tesu yo pubbo tadatthato kriyatthā’ti vuttiyaṃvuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1275_17: Eka kattukānaṃ byāpārānaṃ kamābhidhānāya tunādayo vidhīyamānā bhāveyevuppannā sakkonti kamamabhidhātunti bhāvetyatrābhisambajjhate.
anya-e0806n0:1276_4: Byādāyāti dādhātussa viāpubbassa tvāppaccaye “pyo vā tvāssa samāse”ti (5-
anya-e0806n0:1277_2: varo visesī yateti appatvā nadimpabbato’ti vutte nadiyā orabhāge pabbatoti attho. Bhavati,
anya-e0806n0:1277_4: Avarena pabbatena parā nadī visesīyateti atikkamma pabbataṃ nadīti vutte pāre nadiyā ore pabbatoti attho patīyate,
anya-e0806n0:1277_5: tato ca orabhāge pabbatavisiṭṭhā nadī viññāyate.
anya-e0806n0:1277_6: Bhavatino sabbattha sambhave sati ekakattukatā pubbakālatā yathā gamya te tathā dasseti ‘paṭhamaṃ na pappoti’ccādi.
anya-e0806n0:1278_11: Kiṃ ṇampaccayenāti idaṃ vuttaṃ hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1278_14: Kiṃ visiṭṭhanti pucchitvā jīvaggāhena visiṭṭhanti dassetuṃ jīvaggāha’nti āha.
anya-e0806n0:1279_0: Ākhyātanti agāhayīti ākhyātaṃ kattabbarūpanti imānā gahaṇa kiriyāya kammattaṃ bodheti.
anya-e0806n0:1279_3: Tathā ceti kiriyāvisesane dutiyāya ṇamante jāte sati.
anya-e0806n0:1279_4: Ṇamanta rūpanti ṇamantassa rūpaṃ yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:1281_0: Yo sādhayitumāraddho naca niṭṭhamupagatoti yo kaṭādisādhayituṃ nibbattayituṃ āraddho niṭṭhaṃ parisamattiṃ na copagato nappatto. Pavatto-
anya-e0806n0:1281_2: avirato teneva niṭṭhaṃ nopagatosovattamānoti vuccateti yojanā.
anya-e0806n0:1281_4: idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yathāvuttakaṭādīnaṃ vattamānattā tabbisayā kiriyāpi vattamānā evāti taṃdvārena kriyatthavisesana”nti.
anya-e0806n0:1282_0: Bhuñjati devadattoti ettha yajjapi bhuñjamāno hasati khajjati vadati pāniyaṃ pivati,
anya-e0806n0:1282_1: tathāpi yuttā vattamānatā kattumicchitassārambho na parisamattoti vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n0:1282_3: Tiṭṭhanti pabbatātiādīsu niccesu pabbatādīsu bhūtānāgatānamasambhavā tannisedhino vattamānassāpyasambhavā yadīpi kālavibhāgo na viññāyate,
anya-e0806n0:1282_4: tathāpi āraddhassa ṭhānassāparisamattiyā vattamānā evāti vuttaṃ- ‘pavatto-
anya-e0806n0:1283_16: Yathācātiādinā apaṭhamāsamānādhikaraṇādīsu ‘saṃvijjamāno virocamānaṃ jappamāno’ccādīsu māno nto viya daṭṭhabboti vadati.
anya-e0806n0:1289_1: Katipayadhātvādipariggahenāti dhātavo pakatibhūtā ādī yeyaṃ kālādīnaṃ te dhā tvādayo tesaṃ pariggahenāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1289_3: kārakaṃ kattādi pakaṃsena niyamena paccayo karīyate etasmāti pakati.

anya-e0806n0:1292_5: evaṃ sati napuṃsakena vivaraṇaṃ kathaṃ yujjatīti āha-

anya-e0806n0:1296_3: tesañhi dvibbacane ekāya dvibbacanassuppattiyā na sabbesaṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ hoti nāvayavantassa samudāyassa
anya-e0806n0:1296_4: ca katanti puna tesaṃ dvibbacanāya satthappavattiyā bhavitabba”nti.
anya-e0806n0:1296_7: Iha ṭhāne dvibbacanaṃ dvippayogo dvibbacananti dve pakkhā.
anya-e0806n0:1296_8: Tatra ṭhāne dvibbacanapakkhe dosadassanato dvippayogo dvibbacanantyayameva pakkhobbhupagatoti dassento

anya-e0806n0:1299_1: Yadi hyatrāpi chaṭṭhī abhimatā siyā tadā “kha cha sa parokkhānamekassarodidve”ti ekameva yogaṃ kareyya.

anya-e0806n0:1445_5: arahattassātipatti ca pabbajjānimittābhāvena bhāvavirahena (potthake) liṅgenāvasīyateti liṅgena bhūta kriyātipatti pana veditabbā,
anya-e0806n0:1445_6: yadi panevamabhiññālābhī payuñjati tadā paccakkhañāṇeneva sabbaṃ viññāya payuñjatīti veditabbaṃ.

anya-e0806n0:1461_9: Nanu tumhāmhasesesūti ettake vuccamāne ‘tumhāmhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesū’ti ayaṃ viseso kuto gamyate yenevaṃ vivaṭaṃtyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1462_5: Tumhāmhasesesu hontā majjhimuttamapaṭhamā kathaṃ bhāvādīsu viññāyanti kathañca tumhāmhādisaddavacanīyassa
anya-e0806n0:1462_6: kārakatthassākhyātena tattha vihitena saññāvibhattā tumhāmhādisaddappayogābhāvoccāsaṅkiya yaṃ vuttaṃ

anya-e0806n0:1462_8: vidhānameva nopapajjatī’ti iminā sāmatthiyena tumhādīsu kārakesu majjhimādīnaṃ bhāvo viññāyati teneva
anya-e0806n0:1462_9: tumhādikārakatthassa tattha vihitenākhyātena saññāpitattā tumhādisaddappayogo nāma na hotīti dassetuṃ
anya-e0806n0:1463_5: Tathāhi tayeccetaṃ kattuvācī paccateccetaṃ kammavācī kamme ākhyātappaccaya vidhānato.
anya-e0806n0:1464_7: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “maññase tvaṃ rathena gamissāmīti vattabbe maññe tvaṃ rathena gamissasīti bhavatīti (vutta”nti).
anya-e0806n0:1464_8: Ehi maññeccādi na kiñci vuttaṃ vuttiyaṃ.
anya-e0806n0:1465_0: Yadevamabhisambandhoti ‘maññase tvaṃ rathena gacchāmī’ti yadā evamabhisambandho karīyatītyattho.
anya-e0806n0:1465_1: So cevamanugatoti ‘maññe ahaṃ tvaṃ rathena gacchasi’ccevaṃ so ca payogo anugatotyattho.
anya-e0806n0:1467_0: Tenacāti samāsitattena ca,ssatyādīnamaggahaṇanti yadi tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ siyā āīssādīsūti na samāsena vadeyya.
anya-e0806n0:1469_1: niccā balavāti paṭhamaṃ vuka bhavatīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:1473_1: 161) lopo siyāti ‘karassa ku’nti vattabbanti codanamanasi nidhāyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1473_3: Aññatrapayogānusaraṇā payogānusaraṇaṃ vinā olopo viññātuṃ na sakkāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1475_0: Kāriyaṃ āhaṅsaṅkhātamassa atthīti kāriyī, tena aparo kāriyī haññati hiṃsīyatīti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1476_0: Sahossehīti karassa okārena ssena ca saha hāssa ssena sahāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1476_1: Atha kathaṃ ossehi saheva vuttā desotiviññāyatīccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n0:1476_3: Saha saddassa sahattha(ssa ca) sossa ssenāti kathanasāmatthiyāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1476_6: ossāna manādesitte iccādinā pāṭhena bhavitabbamiva lakkhīyate…
anya-e0806n0:1476_8: Na tu ‘evaṃmaññateossānamantādesatte hāssacāti vacanamanatthakaṃ siyā hā to cetveva vadetya ossānamanādesitte’ccādinā pāṭhena…
anya-e0806n0:1476_11: sossāti visesanachaṭṭhiyāppadhānāya ssenāti sahatthe tatiyāya ca niddiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0806n0:1478_0: Pubbasaralopoti vikaraṇalopo ākārādese ca dvīsu vāresu pubbasaralopo.
anya-e0806n0:1480_0: Agāti īmhi lalopo, ākārādese ca pubbasaralopo.
anya-e0806n0:1486_0: Sutte āti iminā ubhayattha paṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ gahitanti āha- ‘ā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:1492_3: 5) pubbacchakke paṭhamapurisekavacana ākārena ca sahacaritākārānameva paccāsattiyā sahacaritā pattivasena pavattañāyena gahaṇanti attho.
anya-e0806n0:1500_0: Kriyatthavihitānampi dhātuvihitānampi aññesaṃ tabbādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ na gahaṇanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n0:1508_0: Cha ca khā ca cha khā.
anya-e0806n0:1557_0: Sāmī me gurupuṅgavo vijayate sārīsuto-yaṃ bhuvi.
anya-e0806n0:1559_0: Rājā vikkamabāhu bāhitaripū tātvassa bhātāssa lokissaro,
anya-e0806n0:1561_0: Nibbhīto tisūro vijayādibāhu vijayī so āsi laṅkissaro,
anya-e0806n0:1562_0: Taṃ nissāya phalaṃ cirāya phalatañcetaṃ sataṃ santataṃ.
